Xa'k'ut jla' ix qaxlal xa' jun kix wab'aqwa' chikolo' jn tyojnem chir xk'ut chiwach chirij yoloj chir qab'i'm chiw chirij lewa' wuj chir qatz'ib'am chiw,

re'k'ut Jesucristo chir Qaqjaw, ch'il Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw, re'k'ut chir xjuloq'oj xoq'je' xujorob'saj qanme' rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, xoq'je' xuya' jn utzlaj ukub'ul k'u'x chqe rimal jn loq'laj ritzil ranme'.
Kuya' uchoq'ab' iwanme', xoq'je' kukub'a' iwanme' che nejel utzlaj yoloj, xoq'je' che nejel utzlaj chak.
Xa'k'ut jla', ix qaxlal, chib'ana' ich'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios pqawi' oj, rechwa' chir kb'in uyoloj Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' knimerses uq'ij jla' chpa' xib'an ix xinimersaj uq'ij.
Xoq'je' rechwa' qojto'taj pe kiq'ab' tzeltaq wnaq, xoq'je' ajmakib', mpa' jn kojb'al kecht kinejel.
Pumul suk' ranme' Qajwal Dios chir kukub'a' iwanme' xoq'je' kxukol che jn tzel.
Kub'e' qak'u'x chirij ikojb'al chir iyo'om chirij Qajwal Dios, chir kib'ono, xoq'je' kib'anna chir kux ix qatoqom chub'anik.
Ruk'ut Qaqjaw kuk'am ub'ej iwanme' che loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' che jn kuyb'ul uk'u'x Cristo.
Qaya' jn taqnike' chiw, ix qaxlal, pub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo, chir chitoso' iwib' che naq qaxlal chir kchakenta xa' ajqasal q'ij, chir janamta chpa' tyojnem chir qayo'om chiw.
Mpa' ix iwet'am chir kux ub'anik ki'no rechwa' kib'an iwech chir kux qab'an oj, mpa' qe'oj sub'laj xojchaknek re'chir xojkije' chixo'l ix.
Xoq'je' k'ot jnaq xqatij ukixlinwaj xa' che jla', xa'ne' xojchaken chirij jn kowlaj chak xoq'je' kosb'al laj chak; chaq'ab' che paq'ij, rechwa' xqaya't eqa'n chirij jnaqaq chiwe ix.
Jla' xqa'no re'ta chir mat' kumaj chqe rechwa' kjito', pumul xojchaknek rechwa' qaya' jn k'utumb'al chiwach xoq'je' rechwa' kib'an iwech.
Mpa' re'chir xojkije' iwuk', xqaya' jn taqnike' chiw: "Naqpla' chir krajt kchaknek xoq'je' mutij waj."
Mpa' xqata' ruk' qaxikin chir ik'o jujun chixo'l ix chir kichakanta, xa' kiqasaj q'ij, xoq'je' xa' kiminkib' kuk' ni'jchik.
Ire'k'ut ni'je' chir qaya' jn taqnik chke xoq'je' k'e qayaj chirij Qajwal Jesucristo chir kichaknaq pu'tzil, rechwa' kitzuq kib' ruk' kichak.
Ruk'ut ix qaxlal, mixkos chub'anik utzil.
Wa k'o jnaq kunimajta chir kux qab'ij chpam jn wuje', chiya' retal naq, rechwa' kijunujt iwib' ruk' rech kpe uk'ix.
Pumul mikontrij, xa'ne' chiyija' chpa' naq ixlal
Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir rech jn uxunem rech anme' suk' kub'lek kuya' jn uxunem rech anme' chiw che nejel. Re't b'la' Qajwal Dios k'o iwuk' iwenejel.
Jn ritzil iwach chir xintz'ib'ajb'ik, ruk' enq'ab' xintz'ib'aj chiw, re'k'ut ri' retal 'En Pablo', jri'k'ut kintz'ib'aj che nejel wuj.
Kojoqb'la' jn loqlaj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Jesucristo iwuk' B'antajaq b'la'.
En Pablo, Apóstol rech Jesucristo, jla' chpa' utaqnik Qajwal Dios Ajsolel qech, xoq'je' chpa' utaqnik Cristo Jesús chir ukub'ul k'u'x qech oj.

Kintz'ib'aj chaw at Timoteo chir at enk'ijol chirij kojb'al, kwaj en kije' pawanme' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme', jn uk'axk'ab'al k'u'x, tne' kumajt chaw, ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' rech Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
Chpa' toq'ob' xinta' chaw re'chir xtinya' knaq Éfeso re'chir ximb'e Macedonia, rechwa' kaya' taqnik chke jujun qaxlal chir mat' kik'ut jalanlaj tyojnem.

Xoq'je' b'i'j chke ire' chir mat' kiya' kixikin che ni'j nuk'um jo'sb'altaq tzij chir k'ot ra', xoq'je' miya' ixikin chke ni'j yoloj chir kch'a'w chirij qaxe'na'al chir k'ot k'isb'al rech; chir xo'w kik'amlaq k'elaj tzij, re' kich'awaq chirij jn k'iyse'b'al chir kuya' Qajwal Dios chir je petnaq ruk' kojb'al, re' la' kinchilb'ej chaw chinime'.

Mpa' re' uchak jn taqnike' chir qaloq'oj qib' ruk' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'se'naqlaq ruk' jn saqlaj anme', xoq'je' chir k'se'naqlaq ruk' jn utzlaj anme', xoq'je' chir k'se'naqlaq ruk' jn kojb'al chir k'ot jo'sb'al chpam.
Rimal k'ut ni'j ri' chir ik'o jujun xkik'ex kib'ej chub'ixik tzij chir k'ot ub'ej.
Kaj ire' chir kib'an ajtyojnel rech upixab' Qajwal Dios, pumul kich'ob'ta chir kux kib'ij xoq'je' kich'ob'ta chir kux kik'utu'.
Pumul qet'am chir pixab' utz, chir wa utz roksik kb'anek.

Qet'am chir pixab', xya't che naq wnaq chir suk' uk'aslemal, xa'ne' xya' chke wnaq chir kikojenta, xoq'je' chke wnaq chir sub'laj itak, chke ritzlal taq wnaq, chke ajmakib', chke naq chir k'ot ik'owa' chirij kojb'al, chke naq chir kixo'lq'opij pixab', chke naq chir kikamsaj kichuch kiqaw, chke ajkamsenel.

Chke wnaq chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil, naq chir kimaken chirij k'le'b'al, chke chijab' chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil kuk' ni'jchik chijab', chke ixiqib' chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil kuk' ni'jchik ixiqib'; chke aj elq'antaq wnaq, chke jo'slajtaq wnaq, chke ajtz'aqal tzij, che uk'isb'al, pixab' xya' chke kuxpla' chir kb'anek chir k'le'lent ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnem.
Re'k'ut ri' chir ktyojen jn k'ak' yoloj chir nim uq'ij, rech Qajwal Dios, chir xchilb'ex chwe en ub'ixik.
Kintyoxij che Qajwal Jesucristo, Re'k'ut chir xuya' enchoq'ab', rimal ri' chir nim xrilo chir suk' enkojb'al, xnukoj che rajchak rech ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj,

chir nab'e knaq en ximb'i'j wastzij chirij Qajwal Jesús, xoq'je' xiwaqtaj, xoq'je' ximb'an tzij chikij ajkojnel, pumul Re' xuya' uk'axk'ab'al uk'u'x chwe; tne' en kumajt chwe, xuya't prajlal kux ximb'ono mpa' k'ot wet'am xoq'je' enkojenaqta.
Pumul sub'laj xk'iy jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qaqjaw pinwi', xuya'k'ut kojb'al ch'il jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o quk' rimal Cristo Jesús.
Kux kimb'ij chinime' qas qatzij, rajwixik chir kinejel wnaq kikojo chir Cristo Jesús xk'un chwach lew, chkisolik ajmakib', chir en qas en nab'e ajmak chikixo'l ajmakib'.

Pumul tne' sub'laj nim nmak, Jesucristo xnuk'uluj ruk' k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' en kumajt chwe, rechwa' chir Jesucristo nab'e kuk'ut pink'aslemal en jn ritzil uk'u'x, rechwa' chir en kimb'an jn k'utumb'al chikiwach naq chir kokojenna che Cristo kik'am jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik.

Rechi' chir jn nimlaj ajtaqnel rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, Jun chir kamta, Jun chir q'alajta, Jun chir xa' Jun, xoq'je' Jun chir k'o loq'laj etamb'al ruk', che Re' jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' nim yo'oqwa' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
At enk'ijol Timoteo, kinchilb'ej jn taqnike' chaw, rechwa' chir xa' janam chpa' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir q'axam knaq chir xch'a'w chawij at nab'e knaq, kwaj en kab'an achak chpa' rire'.
Taqej b'la' jn kojb'al, rajwixik kana' pawanme' chir k'ot k'ax ab'onom, ik'o k'ut jujun chir kina't pe kanme', re'chi' chir xkisach kikojb'al.
Ire' k'ut jujun chke ire' Himeneo ch'il Alejandro chir xyinjach puq'ab' tzel, rechwa' kit'maj chir utzt kb'ix wastzij chirij Qajwal Dios.

Kinta' jn nimlaj toq'ob' chaw, chir rajwixik b'anaq nab'e chwach nejel, chir kb'an jn ch'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios, kta' toq'ob' che, xoq'je' kb'an tz'onoj che, xoq'je' kb'an nimnek rech tyoxnem che, pikiwi' nejel wnaq.

Xoq'je' pikiwi' nimaqtaq ajtaqnel, xoq'je' pikiwi' kinejel q'atb'altzij chir kitaqen paqawi', rechwa' chir k'ot ch'oj puwi' qatilimit, xoq'je' kije' qak'aslemal chpam jn nimlaj uxunem, rechwa' qak'amb'ik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' ri' utz, xoq'je' k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios chir ajsolel qech.
Re'k'ut kraj Qajwal Dios chir kinejel wnaq kisoltejek xoq'je' kit'maj nejel saqlaj tzij.
Mpa' xa' jun che Dios k'olek, xoq'je' xa' jun che ajch'a'wem chikij ajkojnel chwach Qajwal Dios k'olek, Re' k'ut Cristo Jesús.
Re'k'ut chir utikel xuya' rib' pe kamikal rimal tojb'al qech nimlaj qanejel, qas puq'ijal chir Dios xuya' ub'ixik chqe.

Rimal k'ut ri' chir xno'kes che Apóstol xoq'je' xno'kes che ajb'i'nel uyoloj Qajwal Dios (qatzij kimb'ij, xa't jo'sb'al tzij kimb'ij), xoq'je' ajtyojnel kech wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel chirij kojb'al xoq'je' chirij jn saqlaj tzij.
Re'chi' kwaj en chir nejel chijab' rech nejel tilimit, kib'ana' kich'awem che nejel luwar, kiwa'lsaj tyoxtaq kiq'ab' ruk' jn saqlaj anme', ruk't iywal, xoq'je' ruk't ch'ojb'al.

Jla' xoq'je' kwaj en, chir ixiqib' kikojo' kiq'u' chir qas taqal chke, chir kib'ant nimal ruk', xoq'je' utz uxa'ik kiwi' kib'ana', ruk't qan pwaq, xoq'je' ruk't b'aj chir kipoqnek chir ik'o pe mar, xoq'je' ruk't k'ul chir paqal rijil.
Xa'ne' kiweqa' kib' ruk' jn utzlaj chak, chpa' kumaj chke ixiqib' chir kijochom kib' chunimxik Qajwal Dios.
Ixiqib' xa' chkita' ruk' kixikin, xoq'je' ruk' nejel mejb'al ib'.
Mpa' kumajt chke ixiq'ib' kityojnek xoq'je' kumajt chke ixiqib' chir kitaqen pikiwi' kichijil, xa'ne' xa' kita' ruk' kixikin.
Mpa' re' Adán chir xwnaqerses nab'e, tere' xwnaqerses Eva.
Xoq'je' re't Adán chir sokex rimal tzel, xa'ne' re' Eva chir sokex rimal tzel xqaj chpam mak.
Pumul ixiqib' kisoltajna rimal alnem, chirwa kikije' chpam kojb'al xoq'je' chirwa kikije' chpam loq'b'al ib', xoq'je' chir wa kikije' chpam jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal ruk' mejb'al ib'.
Qatzij kimb'ij, chir naq kraj kok che ajk'amal kib'ej ajyuq' kech ajkojnel, utzlaj chak kurij.

Re'chi' chir sub'laj rajwixik chir jn ajsaqnel kech ajyuq'al ajkojnel k'ot kmolew tzij chirij, xa' jun rixiqil k'olek, ajq'ab'rel wnaqta; suk' uk'aslemal, k'o jek'b'al rib' putike'lam, xoq'je' kuya' kiwarb'al wnaq chir kipe naj luwar, xoq'je' kuraq tyojnem.
Xoq'je' ajq'ab'rel wnaqta, ajch'ojta, xa'ne' ch'u'l ranme' xoq'je' k'o nimlaj utzil pranme', ajriynelt chirij chpa'kux rech uwach lew.
Utz uq'atb'altzij pikiwi' naq chir ik'o prichoj, uyo'om rilk'wa'l pe q'ajb'al ib' ruk' nejel mejb'al ib'.
Pumul wa jnaq k'ot uq'atb'altzij pikiwi' naq ik'o prichoj, ¿kux ub'anik kowan chuchajxik jun ch'ob' che utilimit Qajwal Dios?
Xoq'je' k'ak' ajkojnelta, mpa' wene' kunimersaj rib' qaj jn nimlaj k'ax chirij chpa' jn nimlaj k'ax qaj chirij tzel.
Xoq'je' rajwixik chir utz uyolik uk'aslemal kb'an kimal wnaq chir ikojennaqta. Rechwa' chir qasest uq'ij, xoq'je' qaj tewa' chpam uklob' tzel.
Xoq'je' rajwixik chir Diáconos, k'o mejb'al kib', kyeb't (2) k'owa' kiyoloj, it ajtijel tzam, it aj riynel chirij pwaq chir k'axt kpewa'.
Rajwixik chir kikol jn rajwerem chir owtelek, rech kojb'al ruk' jn saqlaj anme'.
Rajwixik k'ut chir Diáconos kipajna nab'e wa utz kik'aslemal, tere' ke' ok che ajnimnel, chirwa k'ot kraqtaj chikij.
Xoq'je' rajwixik chir kixiqil Diáconos, k'o mejb'al kib', it aj juluw tzij, it ajq'ab'rel wnaq; suk' kikojb'al che nejel.
Xoq'je' Diáconos rajwixik chir xa' jun kixiqil, k'o kiq'atb'altzij pikiwi' kilk'wa'l xoq'je' pikiwi' naq chir ik'o chkichoj.
Mpa' naq chir kib'an jn utzlaj nimnik, sub'laj nim kiya'wa' pkijujnal, xoq'je' k'o jn nimlaj ukub'ul k'u'x kuk' rech kojb'al chirij Cristo Jesús.
Timoteo re' ri' kintz'ib'aj en chaw, tne' re' kwaj en chir kimb'e cha'nim awuk' rechwa' katb'e wula'.
Rechwa' chirwa ximb'oytejek, awet'am kux kab'an chikixo'l jun ch'ob' che utilimit Qajwal Dios, chir re'k'ut utilimit jn k'aslek Dios, ire' k'ut chir kitaqem xoq'je' kito' rij jn saqlaj tzij.

Qatzij chir sub'laj nim ub'anik jn rajwerem chir owtelek rech utzukxik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Dios; "Re'k'ut Dios chir xa'lex chqaxo'l oj wnaq, xb'an suk' che uk'aslemal rimal Loq'laj Usantil Dios, xi'il kimal utaqo'n kaj, xoq'je' xya' ub'ixik ub'i' chikixo'l wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel, xo'kes rech kimal wnaq rech uwach lew, Re'chir xelb'ik chwach lew xk'ulux pkaj."
Loq'laj Santil pasaqil kch'awek kub'ij chir ptaq uk'isb'al q'ij ik'o jujun chir kiya' knaq kikojb'al, re' kita'na kech santil chir kib'ij jo'sb'al tzij, xoq'je' re' kita'na kityojnik tzeltaq santil.
Xoq'je' re' kita'na kityojnik wnaq chir kyeb' (2) kiplaj, xoq'je' xa' sokb'al tzij kib'ij, ni'j wnaqe' b'ajernaq kanme' ire'.
Ni'j wnaqe' kib'ij ire' chir utzt kb'an k'le'b'al, xoq'je' kiq'atuj utijik chir kux ub'onom knaq Qajwal Dios rechwa' ktij ruk' tyoxnem kimal ajkojnel chir ket'am jn saqlaj tzij.
Mpa' nejel chir kux xukaneysaj knaq Qajwal Dios utz, k'ot jnaq chir ktzaq pnaq jla', chirwa kb'an jn tyoxnem che Qajwal Dios re'chir ktijek.
Mpa' rimal uyoloj Qajwal Dios xoq'je' rimal jn ch'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios ktewchi'xek.
Timoteo, wa re' ri' kak'ut chikiwach qaxlal, at utzlaj ajchak rech Jesucristo, xoq'je' anajsam awib' ruk' yoloj rech kojb'al, ch'il ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnik chir at taran chirij.
Xoq'je' mata' kech ni'j cho'lelim wastaq yoloj, kech wnaq chir sachnaq kino'oj, re' kojo' achoq'ab' chuk'amik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.

Xoq'je' jn xik'penem, xoq'je' jn anim ruk' qaqan, xa'qe'n kchakanwa' che qakuerp, pumul uk'amik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Qajwal Dios che nejel kchakanwa', mpa' k'o jn jitenem rech k'aslemal chpam, k'aslemal rech chinime' xoq'je' k'aslemal rech q'ij chir ipetnaq chqawach.
Ni'j yoloje' suk'laj kojb'al re', rajwixik k'ut chir k'am kimal nejel wnaq.
Mpa' rimal ri' chir qoj chaknek xoq'je' qakoj qachoq'ab' mpa' qakub'am qak'u'x chirij jn k'aslek Dios, re'k'ut ajsolel kech nejel wnaq, pumul naq chir kikojnek sub'lajna kiraq solb'al kib'.
Re'k'ut ri' chilb'ej xoq'je' k'utu' chke ajkojnel.

Mat' k'o jnaq kat ritzlaj xa' rimal chir at k'alaj, xa'ne' rajwixik kaya' jn k'utumb'al ruk' ak'aslemal chikiwach ajkojnel, chirij ayoloj chir kab'ij, xoq'je' chirij ano'jb'al pak'aslemal, xoq'je' chirij loq'b'al k'u'x, xoq'je' chirij asantil, xoq'je' chirij akojb'al, xoq'je' chirij jn saqlaj ak'aslemal.
Xetaq kno'pnek, nik'ij pnaq uyoloj Qajwal Dios chke ajkojnel, ya' kichoq'ab', xoq'je' tyojij qaxlal.
Maya' knaq jn nimlaj sip chir k'o awuk', chir xqaxex chaw rimal Loq'laj Santil re'chir xkiya' kiq'ab' ajwab' pawi'.
Rajwixik k'ut chir kajach awib' xoq'je' katkojo'q chpam, rechwa' chir k'uten jn ak'iyse'b'al chirij kojb'al chikiwach kinejel ajkojnel.
Chajij awib' pawechwa', xoq'je' chajij awib' chirij tyojnem chir tijen kayo'o, maya' knaq ub'anik, mpa' wa jla' ka'no, kasol awib' at xoq'je' kisoltaj naq chir kita' atyojnem.
Wa k'o naq tata' chir kmaknek, mayaj ruk' k'anlaj tzij, xa'ne' ya' uchoq'ab', chpa' uya'ik uchoq'ab' aqaw ka'no, ruk'ut chke ni'jchik elb'om ya' kichoq'ab' chpa' uya'ik kichoq'ab' achaq' ka'no.
Xoq'je' ya' kichoq'ab' chuchu'ib', chpa' uya'ik uchoq'ab' achuch ka'no. Xoq'je' chke eltom ya' kichoq'ab', chpa' uya'ik kichoq'ab' awinab' ka'no, ruk' jn saqlaj chomb'al.
Nimb'la' ya'wa' malka'ntaq ixiqib', naq chir qatzij imalka'ntaq ixiqib'.

Pumul malka'ntaq ixiq'ib' chir ik'o k'al, ik'o lewa' kiykimam, kit'maj ni'j k'la'b'e' chir rajwixik nim kiya'wa' kichuch, xoq'je' nim kiya'wa' kiti't, xoq'je' rajwixik kit'maj uya'ik rijil uk'ixel chke kichuch kiqaw jn utzil chir xb'an chke re'chir xik'iysisek, mpa' re' ri' qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
Pumul jnaq chir qatzij malka'n xaq xoq'je' chir xelknaq utikel, ukub'a'm uk'u'x chirij Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' umojom utz'onxik, xoq'je' umojom ub'anik loq'laj uch'awem, chaq'ab' che paq'ij.
Pumul naq malka'n xaq chir ujochom rib' chpam uriyb'al uwach lew, jn xaqe' k'asal ukuerp pumul kamnaq che santil.
Chilb'ej ri' chke ajkojnel rechwa' k'ot kik'amwa' chpam tzij.

Pumul wa k'o jnaq chir kuya't nejel chir kux rajwixik chke rixlal chirij tyo'jil, xoq'je' k'e rilawchijt naq chir ik'o prichoj, june' uxutum knaq kojb'al, xoq'je' nimna umak chwach jnaq chir kojonaqta.
Chiya'b'la' prajlal, xo'w malka'ntaq ixiqib' chir qatanaq chik oxk'al (60) kijanab', ni'j chir xa' jun kichijil kijenaq.

Wa k'utnek chir utzlaj taqchak ub'onom, wa utz uk'iysesik ral ub'onom; wa kuya' kiwarb'al wnaq chir kipe naj, xoq'je' wa uch'ojom kiqan ajkojnel, xoq'je' wa ub'onom toq'ob' chke qaxlal chir k'o rajwixik chke. Xoq'je' wa ub'onom nejel uwach che utzlajtaq chak.
Pumul maya' prajlal malka'ntaq ixiqib' chir ik'ak'alna mpa' wene' xpe kiriyb'al chirij tyo'jil kiya' knaq Cristo, kik'le' jmulchik.
Rimal k'ut ri' kiqaj xe' jn nimlaj k'ax, rimal chir xkixo'lq'apij jn nab'e kikojb'al.
Xoq'je' kit'maj uqasesik q'ij, xa' kib'in chi'taq jaj, pumul xo'wt kiqasaj qij, xa'ne' xoq'je' kib'an ajmolel tzij, xoq'je' xa' nejel kiminwa' kib', kib'ij yoloj chir kumajt kb'i'xek.
Rechi' kwaj en chir malka'n ixiqib' chir ik'ak'alna kik'lo'q jumulchik, kojo'q kal, kib'ana' kiq'atb'altzij pkichoj, mkiya' utem kajch'oj rechwa' kiyoq'ek.
Mpa' ik'o jujun chke malka'ntaq ixiqib' chir ik'ak'alna xkiya' knaq jn utzlaj k'aslemal re' utzna xkil tarjem chirij tzel.

Wa k'o naq chij ajkojnel, naq xaq lewa' chir ik'o rixlal chir imalka'n taq ixiqib' iyutzuqu' muya' eqa'n chikij jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel, rechwa' chir ajkojnel kib'an utzil chke naq chir qatzij imalka'ntaq ixiqib'.
Ajwab' kech ajkojnel chir utz kiq'atb'altzij ki'no, kumaj chke ire' chir nim kiya'wa', pumul sub'lajna nim kiya'wa' ni'j chir kiya' ub'ixik xoq'je' kityojen chirij uyoloj Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' tyox wuj kub'ij: "Makoj chim chichi' jn kyej chir kuyaq' trig," xoq'je', "jn ajchak kumaj che chir ktoj rijil."
Mak'uluj uq'ab'xik tzij chirij naq ajwab', k'uluj uq'ab'xik tzij pumul kuk' ikyeb' (2) ixub' (3) lewa' testig.
Naqpla' chir kiya't knaq ub'anik mak, kow kiyajik b'ana' chikiwach kinejel, rechwa' kina' kib' ni'jchik.

Kinya' jn taqnik chaw chwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' chwach Cristo Jesús, xoq'je' chikiwach utaqo'n kaj chir icha'telek, rechwa' kakol ni'j chpa'kux, xa' janam kilik awixlal b'ana', xoq'je' utzta chir xa' jujun k'e aloq'oj.
Xa' maya' aq'ab' pa'nim puwi' jnaqaq, rechwa' at ta jun ruk' kimak ni'jchik, chajij awib' rech ktz'ilib' tewa' ak'aslemal.
Matij chik ja', tija' qe'naq vino rimal uya'b'il apam, xoq'je' rimal kiy uwach che aya'b'il.
K'o kimak jujun wnaq chir sub'laj q'aljenek xe'taq q'at tzij pikiwi'. Pumul k'o mak kech ni'jchik chir te' q'aljenek re'chir q'ato'omchik tzij pikiwi'.
Xa'k'ut jla', utzlajtaq chak sub'laj iq'alaj, k'o xoq'je' ni'jchik utzlaj taq chak chir iq'alajta, pumul kyelnelaq che saqil.
Kinejel ajkojnel chir ik'o xe' jn yuke rech jaqlel nimnik, nimb'la' kiya'wa' kijaw rechwa' chir k'amb'ext chpam wastzij ub'i' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' utyojnik.

Ruk'ut ajkojnel chir ijaqlel ajnimnel chir ikojennaq kajaw, makib'an ch'iti'n chke, xa' rimal chir ire' i'alxek chirij kojb'al, xa'ne' sub'laj utz kinimxik kib'ana', mpa' naq chir kinimaj ire' ikojennaq xoq'je' iqaxlal chir iloq'; re'k'ut ri' k'utu' xoq'je' chilb'ej.
Wa k'o jnaq kuk'ut jnchik tyojnem, chir janamta chpa' jn ch'ajch'ojlaj utyojnem Qajwal Jesucristo, xoq'je' janamta chpa' jn tyojnem chirij utzukxik chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios,

june' nim kuya'wa' rib', k'ot ret'am, xa'ne' lawach kub'an puwi' k'elaj tzij, puwi' k'ut ri' kpe kontrenik, xoq'je' kpe ch'ojb'al xoq'je' kpe ub'ixik wastzij, xoq'je' kpe ub'anik tzeltaq chomb'al chikij ni'jchik,

xoq'je' kpe ch'ojb'altaq tzij chir k'istechik kech chijab' chir tz'il nejel kichomb'al, xoq'je' ket'amt uwach jn saqlaj tzij, chir kikoj rech Qajwal Dios xa' rech ch'akb'al pwaq; toso' awib' chke ire'.
Pumul re' nimlaj ch'okoj jn utzukxik chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, chir ichb'lam ruk' ki'kte'mal.
Mpa' k'ot qak'omomlaq re'chir xoj k'un chwach lew, xoq'je' qatzij chir k'ot qak'amb'ik re'chir qojkamek.
Xa'k'ut jla', wa k'o qatzuqb'e qib' xoq'je' wa k'o qaq'u', qoj ki'kitaqb'la'.

Pumul nik'ij chir kaj kayen sub'laj kimib'i'l kiqaj putaqchi'b'al tzel xoq'je' kiqaj chpam ukolob' tzel, xoq'je' kiqaj chpam sub'laj che tzeltaq riyb'al chir kub'an sub'laj k'ax che kik'aslemal, xoq'je' kusach kiwach.
Mpa' jn uloq'xik pwaq re' la' ra' nejel uwach che k'ax, ik'ok'ut jujun chir loq' xkil pwaq, xkiya' knaq kojb'al, xoq'je' xkinajsaj kik'aslemal che sub'laj q'oxom.

Pumul at Timoteo, chir at rajchak Qajwal Dios, wanij awib' che nik'ij, re' kojo' achoq'ab' kat tarjaq chirij jn suk'laj k'aslemal, xoq'je' kojo' achoq'ab' chub'anik chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, chirij kojb'al, xoq'je' kat tarjaq chirij jn loq'b'al k'u'x, chirij jn kuyb'ul k'u'x, chirij jn chuch'ujlaj anme'.

Rajwixik kach'ojaj jn utzlaj ch'oj rech kojb'al, chapa' jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, rimal k'ut ri' xatsik'ex rimal Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut jn kojb'al la' chir aq'aljansam chik ruk' ayoloj chikiwach sub'laj che wnaq.
Kinchilb'ej k'ut chaw Timoteo chwach Qajwal Dios, chir nejel uyo'om kik'aslemal, xoq'je' chwach Jesucristo chir xuq'aljansaj jn saqlaj tzij chwach Poncio Pilato,
chir rajwixik kakol jn taqnike' ruk't tz'il xoq'je' ruk't jn k'axlaj yaj, suk'te' k'utenna Qajwal Jesucristo.
Ko'pen k'utna uq'ijal chir q'aljenses rimal Qajwal Dios Jun chir te'wchi'm, xoq'je' Jun chir k'ot jnaq chik k'o puwi', jun Nimlaj Ajtaqnel kech Nimaqtaq Ajtaqnel, xoq'je' Tat kech Tata'ib'.

jun chir xo'w Re' k'ot kamikal chpam uk'aslemal, chir jaqal chpam jn saqil chir k'ot jnaq kowan che okem ruk', Re' k'ut chir k'ot naq wnaq ilew naq rech, xoq'je' k'ot naq wnaq kowan chirilik; che Re' k'ut jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' che Re' jn loq'laj kownem, chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.

Chilb'ej chke naq chir k'o kimib'i'l rech ni'j q'ije' chir mat' kinimersaj kib', xoq'je' mat' kikub'a kik'u'x chirij kimib'i'l, mpa' mib'i'l poq'ij k'olek, ruk'ut chwaq' qet'amta, xa'ne' kikub'a' kik'u'x chirij jn k'aslek Dios, Re' k'ut kuya' nejel chir kux kchakan chqe.
Xoq'je' b'i'j chke chir kib'ana' utzil, xoq'je' kib'ana' sub'laj che mib'i'l chirij utzlaj taq chak, mat' kik'upij chuya'ik xoq'je' mat' kik'upij chujachik.
Wa jla' ki'no, kitijen chumolik jn nimlaj mib'i'l rech ni'j q'ij chir kipe chqawach, xoq'je' kichapa' jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
At Timoteo, kolo' chir kux chilb'em chaw, mab'ij wastaq tzij chirij chpa'kux chir k'ot kichakanwa', xoq'je' mab'an k'elaj tzij chirij jn etamb'al, chir xa' ub'ixik chir etamb'al.
Rimal k'ut ri' chir ik'o jujun xkiya' ub'ixik, rimal ri' chir xkiya' knaq jn b'ej rech kojb'al. Jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kelknaq awuk'. B'antajaq b'la'.
En Pablo, Apóstol rech Cristo Jesús, chir encho'om rimal rajwerem Qajwal Dios chpa' jn jitenem rech k'aslemal chirij Cristo Jesús,

kintz'ib'aj chaw at Timoteo, enk'ijol chir loq' kwilo. Chaw at jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' ch'il jn k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, tne' kumajt chaw at, ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' rech Dios chir Qaqaw, xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
Kintyoxij che Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir kinnimaj chpa' unimxik xkib'an enchuch enqaw ruk' jn saqlaj anme', suk' kub'lek ketenna'taj chpam ench'awem chwach Qajwal Dios chaq'ab' che paq'ij.
Re'chir k'un uwa'l ab'aq'wach pink'u'x kwaj en kwul awach, rechwa' knaj wanme' che sub'laj ki'kte'mal.
Xoq'je' k'un pink'u'x akojb'al chir sub'laj qatzij, chir nab'e xjaqe' jn kojb'al la' ruk' awiti't Loida, xoq'je' ruk' achuch Eunice, sub'laj wet'am en, chir jn kojb'al la' k'o awuk' at xoq'je'.
Re'chi' chir kinchilb'ej chaw chir machupsaj jn urep q'a' rech jn nimlaj sip rech Qajwal Dios chir k'o awuk' chir xak'omo re'chir xinya' enq'ab' pawi'.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios xuya't chqe' oj jn santil rech nab'alib'. Xa'ne' re' xuya' jn santil rech loq'laj kownem chqe, xoq'je' jn usantil loq'b'alib', xoq'je' jn usantil jn jek'b'alib' pqechwa'.

Re'chi', chir mat'k'ix che ch'a'wem chirij Qajwal Jesucristo, xoq'je' mat'k'ix che ch'a'wem chuwij en, chir enk'o pche' rimal Cristo, xa'ne' chpa' jn loq'laj ukownem Qajwal Dios chir kuya' chaw, at jun ruk' jn q'oxom chir kpe rimal ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.

Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios xjusolo xoq'je' xoj usik'ij ruk' jn tyoxlaj sik'nem. Pumul rimalt qachak chir xoj usik'ij, xa'ne' xoj usik'ij rimal rajwerem Re', xoq'je' xoj usik'ij rimal jn loq'laj ritzil anme' chir xya' chqe chirij Cristo Jesús, jertaq tzij xe'taq kmajtajlaq uwach lew,

pumul chinime' xk'utek, rimal chir xk'uten Jesucristo ajsolel qech, Re'k'ut chir xresaj jn nimlaj uchoq'ab' kamikal, xoq'je' xresajlaq che saqil jn k'aslemal, jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik, rimal jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
Rimal k'ut chir xno'kes che ajb'inel jn k'ak' yoloj, xoq'je' xno'kes che Apóstol, xoq'je' xno'kes che ajtyojnel kech wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel.

Rimal k'ut ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloje' chir kintij ni'j q'oxmale', pumul kink'ixta, mpa' wet'am chir naq enkojennaq chirij, xoq'je' sub'laj wet'am chir Qajwal Dios sub'laj ukownem rech uchajxik suk'te' che jn q'ijla', chir kux uyo'om chwe.
At Timoteo, ruk' kojb'al xoq'je' ruk' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chirij Cristo Jesús, b'ana' ni'j utzlajtaq tyojnem chir xawet'maj wuk' en.
Ruk' loq'laj ukownem Loq'laj Santil chir jaqal quk', chajij jn utzlaj tyojnem chir xchilb'ex chaw.
Awet'am chir xinkixutuj knaq kinejel naq chir ik'o Asia. Rek'ut jujun chke ire' Figelo, ch'il Hermógenes.

Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios kuya' jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chke, pikiwi' naq chir ik'o prichoj Onesíforo, mpa' k'iy rajlab'al xuya' enkowil xoq'je' xk'ixt chwilik, chir enximtel che ximb'al ch'ich'.
Xa'ne' re'chir xkije' Roma xel ch'u'j chintzukxik, suk'te' xnuraqna.

Yo'oqb'la' che Onesíforo rimal Qaqjaw chir kuraqna jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, tne' kumajt che, rech kije' chunaqaj Qaqjaw che jn q'ijla'. Timoteo at awet'am chir Onesíforo sub'laj xjuto'o pe tilimit Éfeso.
At enk'ijol Timoteo, kojo' achoq'ab' chpam jn ritzil anme' chir xaraq ruk' Cristo Jesús.
Xoq'je' chir kux ato'om chir emb'i'm chaw chikiwach sub'laj che wnaq, re'k'ut la' chilb'ej chke ajkojnel chir suk' kikojb'al chirij Qajwal Jesucristo, xoq'je' kumaj chke kityojij ni'jchik.
Re'chi' chir at Timoteo, chi'ja'b'la' jn k'ax chpa' jn k'ax chir kinch'ij en, chpa' naq utzlaj ajxolta't rech Jesucristo.
K'ot naq ajxolta't kumin rib' chub'anik chir kux kib'an wnaq chir it ajxolta't, wa qatzij kub'ono chir kux kraj rajwal chir ktaqan puwi'.
Xoq'je' naq ajtzaqal anim, k'ot kuch'oko chirwa kukojt uchoq'ab' ruk' saqlaj tzij.
Xoq'je' jn ajb'anal tiko'n, nab'ena kchaknek, tere' kutij uwach utiko'n.
Katchomnaq chirij chir kux kimb'ij chaw, re'k'ut Qajwal Dios kuya' ano'jb'al che nejel.
Na'tjaq Jesucristo chaw, chir uxe'na'al knaq David, chir xk'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib' jla' chpa' kub'ij jn k'ak' yoloj, chir yo'om chwe.
Rimal k'ut ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj chir kintij q'oxom, xoq'je' enximtel pche' kawulpa' en ajb'anal k'ax, pumul uyoloj Qajwal Dios ximtelt re'.
Rechi' chir kinch'ij nejel q'oxom xa' kimal naqpla' chir icha'tel rimal Qajwal Dios, rechwa' chir ire' xoq'je' kiraq jn solb'alib' chirij Cristo Jesús ruk' jn unimal q'ij chir k'istechik.
Saqlaj tzij kimb'ij chaw: "Mpa' wa qojkam ruk' Cristo, xoq'je' ruk' Re' qaraq k'aslemal.
Wa qatij k'ax, xoq'je' qoj taqenna ruk' Re' chpam jn nimlaj taqnik. Wa qab'ij chir qet'amt uwach, Re' xoq'je' kub'ijna chir Re' ret'amt qawach.
Wa oj suk't qakojb'al, Re' suk' ukojb'al; mpa' Re' kutzilijt uyoloj chirij."

Timoteo, maya' knaq una'texik ri' chke ajkojnel, xoq'je' chilb'ej chke chwach Qajwal Dios, chir mib'e ruk' k'elaj tzij puwi' ni'j tzij chir k'ot kichakanwa'; xa'ne' kuya' chpam jn tzaqel naq chir kitaw rech.
Kojo' achoq'ab' rechwa' kak'ut awib' chwach Qajwal Dios, chpa' naq ajchak chir k'ot kpewa' uk'ix mpa' utz roksik jn yoloj rech saqlaj tzij ku'no.
Pumul q'atuj awib' chub'ixik ni'j wastaq tzij, mpa' ni'j tzijla' xa' qoj kik'amb'ik chub'anik sub'laj mak.
Ni'j kityojnik ire' janam chpa' naq ya'b'il chir kulo'rib'. Ire'k'ut: Himeo ch'il Fileto.
Ire'k'ut chir xkiya' knaq jn saqlaj tzij, kib'ij ire' chir xq'aten k'astajb'al kech kamnaqib', xkiyoj kikojb'al jujun.

Pumul chpa' naq tz'aq' chir utz ukub'ixik b'onom, k'o jn retal chwach chir kub'ij: "Qajwal Dios ret'am kiwach naq irech Re'," xoq'je', "nejel naqpla' chir kuna'taj ub'i' Qajwal Dios utoso' rib' che nejel mak."

Pumul chpam jn nimlaj jaj, xo'wt k'o kolb'al chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq, xoq'je' xo'wt k'olek chir b'onom ruk' saq pwaq, xa'ne' xoq'je' k'o kolb'al chir b'onom ruk' che', xoq'je' b'onom ruk' lew, k'o kolb'al rech kolb'al chpa'kux chir ktijek, xoq'je' k'o kolb'al rech kolb'al tz'il.

Rechi' chir wa naq ajkojnel kuya' knaq ni'j tzeltaq chpa'kuxe', kub'anna chpa' kolb'al rech utzlaj chpa'kux, xoq'je' kub'anna tyox che uk'aslemal chir k'o kchakanwa' che rajaw, xoq'je' ujochom rib' chub'anik nejel utzlaj chak.

Wanij awib' che ni'j riyb'al kech elb'om, xa'ne' taqej jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, xoq'je' taqej jn kojb'al, xoq'je' taqej jn Loq'b'al k'u'x ch'il jn uxunem rech anme', kuk' ni'j chir saq kanme' kina'taj ub'i' Qajwal Dios.
Pumul q'atuj awib' che ni'j taklajtaq tzij xoq'je' ni'j taklajtaq nojb'al, mpa' t'amt'elek chir xa' ch'oj kik'amlaq.
Rajwixik k'ut chir jn jaqlel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, ajch'ojta, xa'ne' ch'uch'uj ranme' kuk' kinejel wnaq; kuraq tyojnem, xoq'je' ajch'ijel k'ax.
Xoq'je' ruk' nimlaj anme' kuya' kino'oj naq chir kik'amt tyojnem, pente'ne' kya' chke rimal Qajwal Dios chir kitzalq'amij kanme' rechwa' kit'maj uwach jn saqlaj tzij.
Xoq'je' rechwa' kik'astejek xoq'je' kitzqaptaj che ukolob' tzel, chir iximtel chub'anik chir kux kraj jn tzel.
Timoteo, xoq'je' rajwixik kawet'maj, chir che uk'isb'altaq q'ij, kipena q'ij chir sub'laj kiraq k'ax wnaq.

Mpa' kikije'na wnaq chir xo'w ire' qus kilkib', sub'laj kiriyij uwach mib'i'l, nim kiya'wa'kib', ajb'inel wastzij, kikojt rech kichuch kiqaw, k'ot utyoxil kichi', xoq'je' kib'anta chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
Kot loq'b'al k'u'x kuk', k'ot kok kuk', i'aj juluw tzij, k'ot jek'b'al ib' kuk', ch'u'j kiwach, kitzlaj uwach utzil.
Kik'ij kich'il puq'ab' rajch'oj, kichomajt nab'e kux kib'ij, re' kinna chir kux kaj ire', re' kiloq'ojna jn uriyb'al uwach lew puk'exwach uriyxik uwach Qajwal Dios.
Ni'j wnaqe', rilik chir re' kib'ono chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, pumul ire' kib'ij chir k'ot kub'iyaj jn utzukxik chir kux rech Qajwal Dios, kuk' ni'j wnaqla' mamin awib'.
Mpa' ire' ni'j wnaqe' chir k'e ok ptaq jaj, kipatz'ij taq ixiq'ib' chir k'axt kipatz'xik, chir keqam sub'laj mak, xoq'je' chir icharem rimal k'iy uwach che tzeltaq riyb'al.
Kib'ij ire' chir suk' kub'lek tijen kit'maj, pumul ikowenaqt ire' che rit'mixik jn saqlaj tzij.
Jla' k'ut ki'no chpa' Janes ch'il Jambres chir xkik'le'laj uwach Moisés, jla' k'ut ni'j chja'b'e' kik'le'laj uwach saqlaj tzij, ichija'b' chir tz'il kichomb'al, xoq'je' k'o jo'sb'al chpam kikojb'al.
Pumul najt kyo'penwa', mpa' q'aljen kitakil chikiwach nejel wnaq, janam chpa' xkik'iwsaj Janes ch'il Jambres.

Pumul at, Timoteo, at re' ataqem jn tyojnik chir xinya' chaw, xoq'je' ataqem ennojb'al, xoq'je' ataqem kux entaqem ub'anik en, xoq'je' ataqem enkojb'al, xoq'je' ataqem jn loq'b'al k'u'x, chpa' loq'b'al k'u'x k'o wuk' en, xoq'je' ataqem jn kuyb'ul enk'u'x.

Xoq'je' ataqem chir kintzukxik rechwa' kya' mak chuwij, xoq'je' ataqem ni'j k'axlajtaq enq'axom, chir janam chpa' xinraq Antioquía, ch'il Iconio, xoq'je' Listra, che nejel entzukxik rechwa' kya' mak chwij, entijom uk'axil che nejel ri' xnutzqapsajt Qajwal Dios.
Qatzij chir kinejel naqpla' kitzukuj jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal chirij Cristo Jesús, kitzukuxna rech kb'an k'ax chke.
Pumul ni'j tzeltaq wnaq, xoq'je' ni'j jo'slajtaq wnaq suk' kub'lek kib'ej prij, kisokaj wnaq xoq'je' ire' kisokex kimal wnaq.
Pumul at, Timoteo, kojo' achoq'ab' xa' jun kat kojoqwa' chpam chir kux awet'mam xoq'je' chir qatzij xa' kub'a' ak'u'x chirij rimal chir awet'am naq ruk' xawet'majwa'.
Mpa' che at ch'iti'n xawet'majlaq tyox wuj, re'k'ut chir xuya' loq'laj ano'jb'al rech solb'alib' rimal akojb'al chirij Cristo Jesús.

Nejel tyox wuj, ruk' Qajwal Dios petnaqwa', xoq'je' sub'laj kchakan che tyojnem, xoq'je' kupaxij qanme', xoq'je' kusukb'a' kik'aslemal ajkojnel, xoq'je' kchakan che tyojnik chirij jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij.
Rechwa' chir nejel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, itz'aq'at che nejel, rech ub'anik nejel utzlaj taq chak.
Timoteo chwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' chwach Qajwal Jesucristo, chir kpena chpam jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij xoq'je' kuq'atna tzij pikiwi' wnaq chir ik'aslek xoq'je' pikiwi' kamnaqib', kinchilb'ej chaw.
Ya'b'la' ub'ixik uyoloj Qajwal Dios, maya' knaq ub'anik, puq'ijal xoq'je' chir puq'ijalta, paxij anme', kow katyajnaq, xoq'je' ya' choq'ab' ruk' nejel kuyb'ul k'u'x, xoq'je' ruk' tyojnem.
Mpa' ko'penna jn q'ij chir wnaq kich'ij te'chik uta'ik jn utzlaj tyojnem. Xa'ne' kik'amb'ik rimal tzeltaq kiriyb'al, kitzukuj ajtyojnel, chir xo'w kik'ut chikiwach chir kux kaj ire' uta'ik.
Kaj te'chik ire' kiya' kixikin chuta'ik jn saqlaj tzij, re' kaj ire' kiya' kixikin chuta'ik tyojnem chir qatzijta.
Pumul at Timoteo, chajij awib' che nejel, chomajna nab'e chir kux ka'no, ch'ija' nejel k'ax, ya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Dios, b'ana' jn chak chir xchilb'ex chaw.
Mpa' en xa' qe'nchik kraj kinkamsesek, jn q'ij rech b'enem wech naqajchik k'owa' chwe.
Xb'antaj jn utzlaj ch'oj wumal, xoq'je' xk'is jn chak chir enmojomlaq, xa' jun k'owa' enkojb'al.

Rechi' chir koltelchik chwe en, jn corona rech jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, re'k'ut chir kuya' Qajwal Dios chwe, chir ajq'atal tzij chir suk' uq'atb'altzij, che jn q'ij, xo'wt chwe en; xa'ne' xoq'je' chke kinejel chir kiloq'oj upetb'al.
Timoteo, katpetaq chwilik cha'nim.
Mpa' Demas xnuxutuj knaq xa' rimal uloq'xik uwach lew, je' xye Tesalónica, Crescente je' xye Galacia, Tito je xye Dalmacia.
Lucas xa' utikel k'o wuk', k'ama'laq Markos awuk' mpa' sub'laj kchakan chwe chpam jn chak chir enk'omom.
Tiquico, je xintaqb'ik pe tilimit Éfeso.
Re'chir katpetek kak'amlaq jn chikete chir xinya' knaq Tróas chirchoj Carpo, xoq'je' kak'amlaq nik'ij wuj, pumul suk' rajwixik kak'amlaq, re' ni'j b'otom wuj.
Alejandro chir ajch'ayel ch'ich' sub'laj k'iy uwach k'ax ub'onom chwe, Re' Qajwal Dios kya'w rijil uk'ixel che rimal nik'ij k'ax chir xub'an chwe.
Chajij awib' at xoq'je' che Alejandro, mpa' sub'laj xuk'le'laj uwach qayoloj.
Re'chir xinsik'ix nab'e rajlab'al paq'atb'altzij rechwa' kinto' wib', k'ot jnaq xje' wuk', xa'ne' kinejel xinkixutuj knaq, kwaj k'ut chir Qajwal Dios mat' kuya' mak chikij.

Pumul Qajwal Dios xikije' wuk', Re' xuya' sub'laj enchoq'ab', chir xinkownek xinya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj, xoq'je' kita'wa' kinejel wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel, xa' k'ut jla' xintz'qaptaj puchi' koj.
Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir knutzqapsaj tena che nejel tzeltaq chak, xoq'je' knukoloj rechwa' knok chpam nimlaj q'atb'altzij rech kaj, rech k'ut Re' jn unimal qij, chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
Ya'pnaq ritzil kiwach Prisca ch'il Aquila, xoq'je' kinejel chir ik'o prichoj Onesíforo.
Erasto je' xelknaq pe tilimit Corinto. Trófimo yab' xinya' knaq Mileto.
Kakuwijlaq Timoteo, xe'taq kmajtaj q'alaj. Kitaqb'ik ritzil awach Eubulo, ch'il Pudente, ch'il Lino, ch'il Claudia, ch'il kinejel qaxlal.
Re' Qajwal Jesucristo kije' ruk' asantil. Jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kije' iwuk'. B'antajaq b'la'.

En Pablo, jaqlel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' en Apóstol rech Jesucristo, en cho'om rimal Re', rechwa' chir naq icha'tel rimal Qajwal Dios kiraq jn kojb'al xoq'je' kit'maj jn saqlaj tzij chir kraqtaj chirij ub'anik nejel chir kux k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.
Chirij jn ukub'ul k'u'x rech jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. Re'k'ut jn k'aslemal la' chir xijit knaq xe'taq ktiktaj uwach lew rimal Qajwal Dios chir kjo'senta.
Pumul chinime' suk' puq'ijal xuk'ut uyoloj chqawach, rimal ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj chir xchilb'ex chwe rimal taqnik rech Qajwal Dios chir ajsolel qech.

Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chaw at Tito, at chir qas at enk'ijol xoq'je' chir qaroqom qib' chpam, loq'laj ritzil anme' ch'il k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, tne' kumajt chaw, ch'il uxunem rech anme', chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' chir uyo'om Qajwal Jesucristo chir ajsolel qech.
Rimal ri' chir xtinya' knaq Creta, rechwa' chir kab'an ukiji'k kuxpla' chir maja' kb'an ub'anik, xoq'je' k'e akub'a' ajwab' chikixo'l ajkojnel ptaq tilimit chpa' taqnik xinya' chaw.
Sub'laj rajwixik chir naq ajwab' k'otnaq tzij kb'ix chirij, xoq'je' xa' jun rixiqil, xoq'je' kinejel rilk'wa'l ikojennaq, chir ik'ot rilk'wa'l chpam takil ch'il chpam jn k'axlaj tzq'aptejem.

Mpa' rajwixik chir jn ajk'amal kib'ej ajyuq' chirij kojnem che Cristo, k'ot q'ab'exwa' tzij chirij, mpa' re' kril uxlaj uchak Qajwal Dios; nimt kuya'wa'rib', xa't ruk' qe'n keywarwe', ajtzamtaj, ajch'ojta, re't kutzukuj pwaq chir petnaq ruk' ub'anik k'ax.
Xa'ne' kuya' kiwarb'al wnaq chir kipe che jnchik tilimit, utz kril utzil, saq uchomb'al, suk' uk'aslemal, tyox uk'aslemal, kujek' rib' putike'lam.
Ajk'olel rech jn suk'laj tyojnem jla' chpa' utyojxik b'onom, rechwa' chir kownek kuya' kichoq'ab' xoq'je' kyuch'ak ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnem naq chir kik'lelnek.
Mpa' ik'iy chir sub'laj itak ruk' kino'jb'al, xa' nejel kib'ij, kib'ij yoloj chir k'ot ub'ej, kisoknek, pumul ni'j chir jri' kib'ij re' ni'j chir kaj ire' kb'an circuncisión.
Rek'ut ni'jla' chir rajwixik ktz'apix kichi', mpa' ire' chir kisach kik'u'x nejel wnaq rech naq jaj, kik'ut k'utumb'al chir uxlajt k'utek, xa' rimal uriyxik pwaq chir petnaq ruk' ub'anik k'ax.
Xub'ij k'ut jn ojq'axel uyoloj Dios kech aj Creta, chir kiwnaqil ire': "Wnaq aj Creta suk' kub'lek ijo's, ijanam chpa' tzeltaq awaj, i'aj wi'il, xoq'je' isaq'or."
Ni'j yoloje' chir kyolek qatzij, rimal k'ut ri' chir kow chayija' rechwa' ku'tzer kikojb'al.
Xoq'je' mat' kikoj rech kayensamtaq yoloj kech wnaq aj Israel, xoq'je' mikikoj rech kitaqnik chijab' chir k'ot saqlaj tzij chpam.
Naq chir saq kichomb'al, saq nejel chikiwach ire', pumul naqpla' chir tz'il kichomb'al xoq'je' naq k'ot kikojb'al, nejel tz'il chikiwach ire'; mpa' tz'ilib'naq kichomb'al ch'il kanme'.
Kib'ij ire' chir ket'am uwach Qajwal Dios, pumul ruk' tzeltaq kichak kik'utu' chir ket'amt uwach Qajwal Dios, itak ruk' kino'jb'al, kikont chub'anik jn utzlaj chak.
Pumul at b'i'j chir kux xa' janam uwach ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnem.

Tyojij ri'jlajtaq tata'ib' chir, saqb'aq kichomb'al, nim iyo'oqwa' kimal ni'jchik, kichomajna nab'e kux kib'ij, itz'aq'at chpam kojb'al, xoq'je' itz'aq'at chpam loq'b'al k'u'x, xoq'je' itz'aq'at chpam kuyb'ul k'u'x.
Xoq'je' k'e atyojij chuchu'ib', kimatz kataq, mkijuluj tzij, mkib'an jaqlel ajnimnel rech utijik tzam, i'ajtyojnel chirij utzil.
Kik'utu' chikiwach k'ak'altaq ixiqib' uloq'xik kichijil, xoq'je' uloq'xik kilk'wa'l.

Xoq'je' kilna nab'e chi' kiya'wa' kiqan chi', saq kanme', kijachom kib' che kitajkil ptaq kichoj, utzlajtaq ixiq'ib', kiya' kib' ptaqik kuk' kichijil, rechwa' chir kb'ixt wastzij chirij uyoloj Qajwal Dios.
Xoq'je' ya' kichoq'ab' elb'om rechwa' chir kichomenna nab'e tere' kich'awek.
Ruk'ut at rajwixik chir che nejel kak'ut ruk' ak'aslemal jn utzlaj chak chikiwach, re'chir kat tyojnik b'ana' ruk' jn saqlaj anme' xoq'je' ruk't jo'sb'al,
xoq'je' b'i'j utzlaj yoloj chir k'ot k'amwa' tzij chawij, rechwa' k'ix naqpla' chir kuk'le'laj awoch, jla' k'otnaq k'axlaj yoloj kib'ij chiwij ix.
Ya' kichoq'ab' jaqlel ajnimnel rechwa' kiya' kib' ptaqik che nejel che kajaw, xoq'je' k'amraq chir kux ki'no, xoq'je' mik'le'lnek.
Mi'elq'enek, xa'ne' rajwixik kik'utu' chir suk' kikojb'al che nejel, rechwa' chir nim kiya'wa' jn utyojnik Dios chir ajsolel qech.
Mpa' xk'uten jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios rechwa' kyusol nejel wnaq chir kikojen chirij Re',

koj utyojij k'ut, rechwa' qaya' knaq nejel kuxpla' chir rext Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' qaya' knaq tzeltaq riyb'al rech uwach lew, qojk'oso'q che ni'j jnab'e', ruk' jn saqlaj chomb'al, xoq'je' ruk' jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, xoq'je' qatzukuj ub'anik nejel chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
Qayi'ej jn uk'ub'ulk'u'x, xoq'je' jn uk'utumb'al ruk' jn unimal q'ij rech Qajwal Dios xoq'je' ajto'l qech Jesucristo.
Re'k'ut Cristo chir xuya' rib' putike'lam pe kamikal xa' qamal oj rechwa' xojresaj che nejel mak, xoq'je' xuch'aj qak'aslemal chir oj utilimit Re', xoq'je' qab'an celosil chirij jn utzlaj chak.
Re' ri' tyojij chke ajkojnel, xoq'je' ya' kichoq'ab', xoq'je' kow katyajnaq ruk' nejel q'atb'altzij. Mat' k'o jnaqaq kuqasaj aq'ij.
Na'taj chke ajkojnel chir rajwixik kiya' kib' ptaqik chke chijab' chir k'o taqnik pe kiq'ab', xoq'je' kiya' kib' ptaqik chke q'atb'altzij, xoq'je' kib'onom chik kikiji'k chub'anik nejel utzlaj chak.
Xoq'je' mat' k'o jnaq kib'an tzij chirij, xoq'je' mich'ojen chikiwach, xa'ne' kik'utu' jn ch'uch'ujlaj anme', kik'utu' nejel uwach che unimal anme' kuk' nejel wnaq.

Mpa' oj jer xoq'je', oj tak ruk' qano'jb'al, qak'le'laj uwach Qajwal Dios, sachnaq qak'aslemal chpam qu'mal, oj jaqlel ajnimnel rech tzeltaq riyb'al, xoq'je' rech k'iy uwach che riyb'al, xoq'je' qab'an tzeltaq chomnik chikij ni'jchik xoq'je' qakontrij qib' chqawach, oj ritzlaltaq wnaq; qitzlaj qib' chqawach.
Pumul re'chir Qajwal Dios chir ajsolel qech, xuk'ut uq'osil ranme', xoq'je' xuk'ut loq'b'al uk'u'x chikiwach wnaq.

Xjusolo, xa't rimal naq utzlaj chak chir qab'onom, xa'ne' rimal uk'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' oj kumajt chqe, xoq'je' rimal chir xuch'aj qak'aslemal, xoq'je' rimal chir xub'an k'ak' che qak'aslemal rimal Loq'laj Usantil,
re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir xuya' nimlaj Loq'laj Santil pqawi' rimal Jesucristo chir ajsolel qech.
Rechwa' chir suk'chik qak'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios rimal jn loq'laj ritzil anme', kojok che rajaw jn echb'al jla' chpa' jn ukub'ul k'u'x rech jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.

Jn yoloje', suk'laj kojb'al re', re'k'ut ni'j taqnike' kwaj en kakamluj ub'ixik, rechwa' chir naq ikojennaq chirij Qajwal Dios kichijij kib' chub'anik jn utzlaj chak; ni'j taqnike' utz, xoq'je' kchakan chqe oj qanejel.

Pumul ya'knaq ni'j k'elaj tzij chir k'ot utantab'al, xoq'je' ni'j k'elaj tzij chirij xe'na'al, xoq'je' ch'oj ch'il jn chapb'alib' chirij pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés, mpa' k'ot saqlaj tzij chpam xoq'je' k'ot kuya' knaq chqe.
Naq wnaq chir kujach kiwach ni'jchik, yaja' jumul che uka'mul wa kuta'ta wesajb'ik.
Q'alaj k'ut chir june', utikel kutzaq rib' chpam k'ax, xoq'je' kamna chpam umak.
Re'chir kintaqb'ik Artemas awuk', re' lewa' Tiquico, kakwijlaq kink'un ak'ulu' ptilimit Nicopolis, mpa' tla' xinchomaj uq'axexik q'alaj.
Zenas chir ajkirel pixab' rech uwach lew, ch'il Apolos ya' chke pa'nim chir kux kchakan chke rech kib'ej rechwa' chir kiq'axajt rajwixik.
Kit'majb'la' qaxlal ub'anik utzlajtaq chak, rechwa' chir pa'nim kito' naq qaxlal chir k'o rajwixik che, kiwachnaq chpa' naq che' chir kwachnek.

Kinejel chir ik'o wuk' wural, kitaqb'ik ritzil awach, xoq'je' ya' ritzil kiwach naq chir loq' qojkil chirij kojb'al. Re'k'ut jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kije' iwuk' iwenejel. B'antajaq b'la'.
En Pablo, chir enk'o pche' rimal ub'ixik ub'i' Cristo Jesús, ch'il qaxlal Timoteo, kintz'i'b'aj jn wuje' chaw at loq'laj qaxlal Filemón, xoq'je' at ajto'l qech,
xoq'je' kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' che loq'laj qaxlal Apia, ch'il Arquipo chir qach'il ajchak, xoq'je' che jun ch'ob' che qaxlal chir kiraq kib' chawuchoj chunimxik Qajwal Dios:
Jn loq'laj ritzil anme' xoq'je' jn loq'laj uxunem rech anme' chiw, chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios ch'il Qajwal Jesucristo.
Suk' kub'lek kintyoxij che Qajwal Dios chawij at, xoq'je' ktinna'taj chpam ench'awem chwach Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' kinta' ub'ixik jn loq'b'al ak'u'x ch'il akojb'al chirij Qajwal Jesús, xoq'je' loq'b'al ak'u'x ch'il akojb'al chke kinejel ajkojnel.
Kinta' k'ut che Qajwal Dios rechwa' chir akojb'al chir ayo'om chke ni'jchik ajkojnel, sub'laj kownel che ritmixik nejel utzil chir k'o iwuk' rimal Cristo Jesús.
Mpa' sub'laj qojki'ktek xoq'je' xjorob' qanme' chirij loq'b'al ak'u'x, mpa' awumal at loq'laj qaxlal chir xkub'e' kanme' ajkojnel.
Rimal ri' tne' k'o uq'atb'altzij Cristo wuk' rechwa' kinya' jn taqnik chaw chir suk' rajwixik kb'anek.
Pumul ruk' loq'b'al k'u'x kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw, en Pablo, en nimaj wnaq chik, xoq'je' chinime' enk'o pche' rimal ub'ixik ub'i' Jesucristo.
Kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw chirij Onésimo chir enk'ijol chirij kojb'al, re'k'ut xkojnek re'chir xinya' utzij Qajwal Dios che chpa' entzab'telwa' wural pche'.
Re'k'ut chir nab'e knaq k'ot xtuto'wa', pumul chinime' kchakan chaw at xoq'je' kchakan chwe en.
Re'k'ut chir kintzilij b'ik awuk', k'uluj kawulpa' janam chpa' en, chir ruk' re' b'enaqwa' wanme'.
Kwaj tne' en chir kije' Onésimo wuk' rechwa' kub'an ak'exwach, knunimaj chpa' entzab'telwa' pche', rimal ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
Pumul k'ot ximb'an en chemat' xawet'maj at, kwajt en ktinch'ik'mij chub'anik toq'ob' chwe, re' kwaj en chir pawanme' kpewa' ub'anik toq'ob' chwe.
Mpa' pente'ne' rimal ri' xutos rib' kyeb'xub' ik' Onesimo chaw, rechwa' chir chinime' kije' awuk' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq,

jla't chik chpa' jn jaqlel ajnimnel, xa'ne' nimchik ub'anik chwach jn jaqlel ajnimnel, mpa' re' loq'laj qaxlal chik, nim ub'antik chwe en; pumul chaw at sub'laj nimna ub'antejik xo'wta chir jaqlel aj nimnel awech, xoq'je' awixlal chik chirij Qajwal Jesucristo.
Wa en, en akojom che awich'il, k'ulujb'la' Onésimo, chpa' enk'ulxik en ka'no.
Wa k'o naq k'ax ub'onom chaw k'o lewa' uk'as awuk' toq'wichij chwe en.
En Pablo, kintz'ib'aj b'ik jn wuje' chaw ruk' enq'ab', chir en kintojow rech; pumul kwajt en kimb'ij chaw chir at, ak'asna ak'aslemal chwe.
Jla'k'ut at wixlal, kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw, wa k'onaq kinch'ak chawij pub'i' Qaqjaw; ya'b'la' uchoq'ab' wanme', pub'i' Cristo.
Kub'e' enk'u'x chawij, mpa' at kaya' awib' ptaqik, re'chi' xintz'ib'ajb'ik jn wuje' chaw, wet'am en chir xo'wt ka'no chir kux xinta' chaw.
Xoq'je' kimb'ij chaw chir b'ana'pnaq ub'anik enwarb'al, mpa' wiyi'em chir rimal ich'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios; re' kuya' chwe chir kimb'e iwuk'.
Kutaqb'ik ritzil awach Epafras, wich'il chir enk'o pche' rimal ub'i' Cristo Jesús.
Xoq'je' kitaqb'ik ritzil awach Markos ch'il Aristarco ch'il Demas ch'il Lucas chir i'ajto'l wech chub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj.
Jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Jesucristo kelknaq ruk' isantil. B'antajaq b'la'.
Qajwal Dios, sub'laj rajlab'al xyuch'ab'ej qachuch qaqaw jertaq tzij xoq'je' k'iy uwach kich'ab'xik xu'no kimal ajq'axal uyoloj,
pumul ruk'ut che ni'j uk'isb'altaq q'ije' Qajwal Dios qoj uch'ab'ej rimal Uk'ijol, re'k'ut xub'an rajaw nejel echb'al Che, xoq'je' rimal Re', Qajwal Dios xub'an nejel uwach kaj lew;

re'k'ut Qajwal Jesucristo, kuk'ut jn unimal uq'ij Qajwal Dios, Re' k'ut kuk'utu chir kux ub'anik Qajwal Dios, Re' k'ut kuya' uk'u'x nejel chir k'olek ruk' uyoloj nimlaj ukownem, xuch'aj qanme' che nejel qamak xa' rimal Re' putike'lam, xoq'je' xkub'e' puse'b'al loq'laj ukub'ulb'al Qajwal Dios pkaj.
Qajwal Jesucristo nimna ub'anik chikiwach taqo'n rech kaj, mpa' Re' xrechb'e jn b'i' chir k'otchik k'owana chikiwach kib'i' utaqo'n kaj.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios ¿mijumul xub'ij chke utaqo'n kaj: At, At Enk'ijol poq'ij xtintiko? ¿Xoq'je' xub'ijt che naq utaqo'n kaj: En, knok che Aqaw, ruk'ut at, ktok che Enk'ijol?
Pumul chpam jnchik chqab' tyox wuj kub'ij, re'chir Qajwal Dios xutaqlaq jun che Uk'ijol kuk' wnaq rech uwach lew xub'ij: Iwenejel utaqo'n kaj chinimersaj uq'ij Enk'ijol.
Qajwal Dios xch'a'w chikij utaqo'n kaj, kub'ij: Chir re' kub'an chpa' kiq'i' chke taqo'n rech kaj, ruk'ut chke ajnimnel rech kub'an chpa' urep q'a' chke.
Pumul chirij Uk'ijol kub'ij: Jn loq'laj akub'ulb'al at nimlaj Dios rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq; cetro rech chir xa' janam ub'anik nejel, jla' ucetro jn nimlaj aq'atb'altzij.
Sub'laj xaloq'oj jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, Re' xawitzlaj uwach tzeltaq mak, rimal ri' Qajwal Dios chir aDios xujam aceite pawi', aceite rech ki'kte'mal chir xtunimersaj chikiwach awich'il.
Xoq'je' Qajwal Dios xub'ij chirij Uk'ijol: At, nimlaj Dios, re'chir xmajtajlaq xajaqb'a' uwach lew, xoq'je' kaj aq'ab' xb'anew rech.
Nejel ire' ksachna kiwach, pumul At, ksacht awoch, nejel ire' kiq'eleb'na chpa' naq t'zaq' q'ub'al,
xoq'je' kab'usu chpa' ub'usik naq t'zaq' k'ul, kajalo chpa' jnaq chir kujal uq'u', pumul At, katk'extajta, k'ist ak'aslemal.
Pumul, ¿Qajwal Dios mijumul xub'ij che jnaqaq chke utaqo'n kaj: Katkub'oq pinse'b'al, suk'te' k'e Enya'na awajch'oj xe' awuqan?
Mpa' ¿kinejel utaqo'n kaj isantil chir i'ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, chir itoqomlaq chikinimxik naq chir kik'am che echb'al jn solb'alib'?
Rechi' chir rajwixik chir ruk' rok'b'alil qojchomen chirij ni'j chpa'k'ux chir qato'om chir kux kub'ij Qajwal Dios, rechwa' qaya't knaq qakojb'al.
Mpa' wa uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xkiya' ub'ixik utaqo'n kaj xel che qatzij, xoq'je' nejel mak ch'il nejel takil chir xb'anek, xya' rijil uk'ixel,

¿kux ub'anik chir qoj tz'aqptaj knaq oj che jn k'ajse'b'al wach, chirwa qalawchijt jn nimlaj solb'alib'? Re'k'ut Qajwal Jesús chir nab'e xuya' ub'ixik jn solb'alib'e', xkub'a'x k'ut ub'ixik kimal naq chir xitaw rech,

xoq'je' Qajwal Dios xuq'aljansaj chir kux kib'ij ire', ruk' nimaqtaq k'utumb'al xoq'je' ruk' mayjab'al xoq'je' ruk' k'iy uwach che uk'utumb'al ukownem Qajwal Dios xoq'je' ruk' Loq'laj Usantil chir uyo'om chqe chpa' rajwerem Re'.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios xuya't chixe' kiq'atb'altzij utaqo'n kaj jn k'ak' uwach lew chir petnaq chqawach chir qoj tijen che yoloj chirij chinime'.
Pumul chpam jnchik praj rech tyox wuj kub'ij: "¿Kux ub'anik jn chij chir kub'lek kna'taj chaw?, xoq'je' ¿kux ub'anik jn rilk'wa'l chij, chir kasaqij?
Xoq'je' chir xab'an qe'n ch'iti'n che, chikiwach utaqo'n kaj, xoq'je' xaya' ucorona rech unimal uq'ij xoq'je' xaya' che chir kmej ib' chwach xoq'je' xaya' puwi' jn chak chir ab'onom ruk' aq'ab',
nejel xaya' xe' raqan." Mpa' re'chir Qajwal Dios xuya' nejel xe' uq'atb'altzij, k'ot naq chpa'kux chemat' k'o chixe' uq'atb'altzij, pumul qe'oj maja'na qilo chir kya' nejel xe' uq'atb'altzij.

Pumul qilk'ut chir Jesús xe'ses qe'n che unimal uq'ij chikiwach utaqo'n kaj, pumul xb'an coronar che unimal q'ij xoq'je' che mejb'al ib', rimal jn uq'oxmal kamikal, rech chir xa' rimal ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios, Jesús xuk'am kamikal rimal qanejel oj.

Mpa' kumaj che jun chir rech re' nejel chpa'kux, xoq'je' xa' rimal re' ik'o' nejel chpa'kux, chir re' kyuk'amb'ik sub'laj ilk'wa'lxel chpam jn unimal q'ij, kb'an suk' che kik'aslemal rimal uq'oxom jn rajaw jn solb'alib' kech ire'.
Mpa' Re' Jesús kyutos kik'aslemal ajkojnel, xoq'je' naq chir ktos kik'aslemal, kinejel ire' xa' jun kiqaw Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios, rimal k'ut ri' chir Jesús k'ixt re' chub'ixik rixlal chke,
xub'ij Jesús che Qajwal Dios: Kinya' ub'ixik Ab'i' chikixo'l wixlal, chikixo'l ajkojnel chuwij En, kimb'ixaj b'ixnik chaw At.
Xub'ij k'ut jumulchik: En, kinkub'a'na Enk'u'x chirij. Xub'ij xoq'je': Wral Enk'owa', En ch'il alk'wa'lxel chir xuya' Qajwal Dios chwe.

Rimal k'ut ri', chir chpa' alk'wa'lxel chir ityo'jil xoq'je' ikik', Re' xoq'je' xa' janam chpa' oj, rechwa' kusach uwach rimal ukamikal jun chir k'o nimlaj choq'ab' rech kamikal ruk', june', re' jn tzel.
Xoq'je' xyutzqapsaj kinejel naq chir xa' rimal uxib'alkib' che kamikal, nejel kik'aslemal k'o chpam jn jaqlel nimnek.
Mpa' qatzij chir Cristo re't xyusol utaqo'n kaj, xa'ne' xyusol uxe'na'al knaq Abraham.

Rimal k'ut ri' rajwixik chir Cristo xa' janam ub'anik che nejel chpa' rixlal, rech kub'an Re' jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, chir xa' jun k'owa' ukojb'al xoq'je' chir k'axk'ab' uk'u'x chpa' kraj Qajwal Dios rechwa' kub'an jn tz'aqatlaj tojnem rech kimak kinejel wnaq rech uwach lew.
Mpa' xoq'je' Re' xutij k'ax, xoq'je' xtaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel, rechi' Re' kowan chkito'ik naq chir kitaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel.
Rechi', ix wixlal chir tostal ik'aslemal rimal Qajwal Dios, chir ix jun che jn sik'nem rech kaj, kixchomnaq chirij jn Apóstol xoq'je' ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, re'k'ut Cristo Jesús.
Mpa' Jesús Re' ukolom ranme' che jun chir xkub'an rech, jla' xoq'je' Moisés Re' xukol ranme' che nejel richoj Qajwal Dios.
Qatzij k'ut chir Jesús kumajna che Re' jn nimlaj mejb'al ib' chwach Moisés, chpa' jnaq chir kub'an naq jaj, june' nimna mejb'al ib' che re' chwach jn jaj chir xu'no.
Mpa' jn jaj k'o jn ajb'anal rech, pumul Re' Qajwal Dios xub'an nejel chpa'kux.
Qatzij k'ut chir Moisés chpa' naq ajnimnel xukol ranme' che nejel rilk'wa'l Qajwal Dios, rech uq'aljensesik chir kux kub'ijna Qajwal Dios,
pumul Cristo chir alk'wa'lxel Re' xukol ranme' puwi' richoj Qajwal Dios, ojk'ut jn richoj Qajwal Dios, chirwa qaya't knaq jn ki'kte'mal chirij jn ukub'ulk'u'x chir k'o quk' suk'te' che uk'isb'al.
Rimal k'ut ri', chpa' kub'ij Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios chir tz'ib'tal chpam tyox wuj: Wa kita' uch'ab'al poq'ij,
mikowersaj iwanme' chpa' xkib'an jertaq qachuch qaqaw re'chir xkik'le'laj utaqnik Qajwal Dios che jn q'ij rech pajb'al pe chiqi'j jib'.
Tla'k'ut xinkipajwa' ichuch iqaw, xoq'je' tla' xkilwa' Enchak che ka'wnaq (40) janab'.
Rimal k'ut ri' xub'an kyeb' (2) Enk'u'x chirij jn xe'na'al la' ximb'i'j k'ut: 'Ni'j wnaqe' sachnaq kanme', xoq'je' ket'mamt Emb'ej.'
Ximb'ank'ut jun juramento ximb'i'j: 'Ni'j wnaqe' kyok'tena chpam jn uxunem wech.'
Chiwula' k'ut wixlal mat' k'o jnaq chixo'l ix chir k'o mak pranme' xoq'je' k'ot ukojb'al chir kutos rib' che jn k'aslek Dios.
Xa'ne' chiyija' iwib' chiwach che nejeltaq q'ij, chpa' kb'ixek "poq'ij," rechwa' k'ot jnaq kowar ranme' rimal jn jo'sb'al rech mak.
Mpa' oj, k'o qech ruk' Cristo rechwa' chir suk'te' che uk'isb'al xa' jun qaya'wa' jn ukub'ul qak'u'x jla' chpa' xqamajlaq.
Rechi' chir kb'ixek: "Wa xita' uch'ab'al Qajwal Dios poq'ij mikowersaj iwanme', chpa' xkib'an qachuch qaqaw re'chir xkik'le'laj uwach Qajwal Dios."
¿Naqk'ut ni'j chir xkita' uch'ab'al Qajwal Dios xoq'je' xkik'le'laj uwach Qajwal Dios? ¿Ire't k'ut kinejel jnik'pla' chir xyel laq Egipto rimal Moisés?
Xoq'je' ¿naq chikij xpe uk'anal Qajwal Dios, che ka'wnaq (40) janab'? ¿Kuk' tuk'ut nik'ij chir ximaknek xoq'je' xikamek, ruk'ut kityo'jil xelknaq pch'qij jib'?
Xoq'je' ¿naq chke ni'j xub'ij saqlaj tzij chir kyo'kt chpam jn uxumb'al rech Qajwal Dios, xa'ne' chke ni'j chir xkiya't kib' ptaqek che Qajwal Dios?
Qilk'ut chir ire' xikowent che okem chpam jn uxumb'al rech Qajwal Dios rimal chir xikojent che Re'.
Rechi' tne' k'ona jn jitenem rech jn okem chpam jn uxumb'al rech Qajwal Dios, qachijij qib' mpa' wene' k'o jnaq chiw ix chir kowent churaqik.

Mpa' xoq'je' chqe oj xya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj janam chpa' xya' ub'ixik chke ire', pumul uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xkito'o k'ot xchakanwa' chke ire', mpa' naq chir xkito'o k'ot kikojb'al chirij uyoloj Re'.

Pumul naq chir xojkojnek xojok chpam jn uxumb'ale'. Xa' k'ut jla' xub'ij: Rechi' chir ximb'an jurar chpam Enk'anal chir kyo'ktena chpam jn uxumb'al wech, tne' Qajwal Dios xuk'is knaq uchak re', re'chir xtiktajlaq uwach lew.
Mpa' tz'ib'tal knaq chpam jn chqab' rech tyox wuj chirij jn uwuq (7) q'ij: Xu'xun Qajwal Dios che nejel uchak che uwuq (7) q'ij.
Jmulchik kub'ij tyox wuj: Kyo'kt chpam jn uxumb'al wech.
Rechi', mpa' ik'ona jujun chir i'oknaqt chpam jn uxumb'al la' ruk'ut chke ni'j chir nab'e xya' ub'ixik chke xyokt chpam jn uxumb'al rimal chir ire' xkiya't kib' ptaqek.
Jumulchik Qajwal Dios xucha' jn q'ij, re'k'ut "poq'ij," kub'ij: Xq'aten k'ut sub'laj q'ij, xub'ij k'ut che uchi' David, chpa' b'im: "Wa xita' uch'ab'al poq'ij mib'an kow che iwanme'."
Mpa' wa Josué ch'at xuya' ki uxunem Rilk'wa'l Israel, kch'a'wtre' Qajwal Dios chirij jnchik q'ij rech uxumb'al.
Rechi' chir k'ona jn loq'laj uxumb'al kech utilimit Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' naq xok chpam jn uxumb'al rech Re' xoq'je' ku'xen che uchak, jla' chpa' Qajwal Dios xu'xnek re'chir xk'is uchak.
Rimal k'ut ri' qakojo'b'la' qachoq'ab' rech kojok chpam jn uxnemla', rechwa' chir k'ot jnaq qaj chpam jn k'axlaj k'amb'al nojb'al rech takil.

Mpa' uyoloj Qajwal Dios k'aslek xoq'je' sub'laj ukownem, sub'laj k'urenna chwach jn michit chir ka' praj rey, k'urnek xoq'je' kokek kub'an kyeb' (2) che qanme' ch'il qasantil, xoq'je' chpa' iweqtelwa' qab'aqil xoq'je' kowan chuq'atik tzij chirij qachomb'al xoq'je' chir kux k'o chpam qanme'.
K'otnaq chpa'kux chir kaneysam chemat' k'uten chwach Qajwal Dios, xa'ne' nejel ich'anlek xoq'je' iteb'el chwach b'aq'wach jun chir chwach Re' qajachna chir kux qab'onom.

Rechi', k'o k'ut jn nimlaj ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj qech oj chir xo'pen chwach Qajwal Dios suk'te' pkaj, Re'k'ut Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, rechi' rajwixik xa' jun qoj wab'aqwa' chpam jn kojb'al chir k'o quk'.

Mpa' jn Ajwab' kech Ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir qech oj, Re' k'axk'ab' uk'u'x che qatuqa'ril mpa' xoq'je' Re' xtaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel, jla' chpa' oj chir qoj taqchi'x chub'anik mak, xo'w mpa' Re' xmakenta.

Rechi' chir qojqetaq b'la' ruk' jn loq'laj kub'ulb'al rech jn ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios, ruk' jn ukub'ul k'u'x, rech qak'amwa' jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chqe, xoq'je' qak'amwa' jn ritzil anme' rech kojuto'wa' re'chir k'o rajwixik chqe.

Mpa' kinejel ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj xa' cho'om chikixo'l chijab', xjaqb'a'xek rech kib'anwa' kik'exwach wnaq chwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' rechwa' kijach kisip xoq'je' rech kiparij taq awaj chwach Qajwal Dios rimal mak,
rechwa' chir re' k'o kuyb'ul uk'u'x kuk' ni'j chir k'ot ket'am xoq'je' kuk' ni'j chir kisochom kib'ej mpa' re' xoq'je' sutennaq rij che tuqa'ril,
rimal k'ut utuqa'ril re' mpa' xa' wnaq nab'e kujit chwach Qajwal Dios rech sachb'al umak re' xoq'je' rech sachb'al kimak wnaq.
K'ot k'ut jnaq xa' che jla' kuk'am jn chak rech mejb'al ib', xa'ne' jnaq chir sik'im rimal Qajwal Dios chpa' Aarón.
Jla' xoq'je' Cristo, Re' xuya't unimal uq'ij putike'lam chir kukoj rib' che ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, xa'ne' Re' Qajwal Dios xub'ij che: At, At Nk'ijol, En xtintik poq'ij.
Jla' xoq'je' kub'ij chpam jnchik praj rech tyox wuj: At, At ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq jla' chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.

Ruk'ut Cristo re'chir k'olaq putyo'jil xuta' toq'ob' ruk' ka'melal, ruk' sik'nem ch'il q'ej che Qajwal Dios, chir xo'w Re' kowan chusolik che jn kamikal, xta'taj uyoloj rimal Qajwal Dios rimal chir Re' uyo'om rib' ptaqek.
Cristo tne' Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios, rimal jn k'axk'olil xrit'maj uya'ik rib' ptaqek;
re'chir xtzaq'at puk'aslemal nejel chir kux kraj Qajwal Dios, xub'an jn solnem che kamikal chir k'istechik kech nejel naq chir kikojnek;
xjaqb'a'x k'ut rimal Qajwal Dios chpa' jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj jla' chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.
Chirij ri' k'ona sub'laj yoloj, chir k'ax ukirik uwach, xa' rimal chir ix kib'anta chir kux kito'o.

Mpa' qatzij chir sub'laj janab'chik q'atannaq, kumojo cha't ix chik ajtyojnel pumul k'ona rajwixik chiw chir jnaqaq kuk'utna chiwach nab'etaq saqlaj tzij rech uyoloj Qajwal Dios, ix k'ona rajwixik chiw utijik tu' chwach utijik kowlaj tib'lil.
Mpa' nejel wnaq chir kutijna tu' maja' ret'am uch'ob'ik jn yoloj rech jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij rech Qajwal Dios, mpa' june' janam chpa' naq k'al,
pumul jn kowlaj tib'lil kech naq chir irijab' chik, kech ni'j chir ket'amchik uq'atik tzij, mpa' ket'am chik ucha'ik uwach naq che utz, naq che utzta.

Xa' k'ut jla', qaya' knaq ni'j nab'etaq tyojnem chirij uyoloj Cristo, rech qataqej jn k'iyse'b'al rech ktz'aq'at qachomb'al. Mix tyojen jumulchik chirij ni'j rajwixiktaq tyojnem chpa', jn utzalq'amixik anme' chirij uya'ik knaq ni'j chak chir k'oj uk'amb'ik pe kamikal, xoq'je' chirij jn kojb'al che Qajwal Dios,
ch'il tyojnik puwi' qasnik ja', ch'il jn uya'ik qaq'ab' pikiwi' ajkojnel ch'il puwi' jn k'astajb'al kech kamnaqib' ch'il puwi' jn q'ataj tzij rech uk'isb'al q'ij.
Rek'ut ri' qa'no wa jla' k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' kumajt chke naq chir xa' jumul xkik'am jn saqil, xoq'je' utz xkina' jn loq'laj sip rech Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' ijun xkichb'ej Loqlaj Usantil Qajwal Dios,
xoq'je' utz xkina' jn utzlaj uyoloj Qajwal Dios xoq'je' utz xkina' jn nimlaj ukownem jn k'aslemal chir petnaq chqawach,
wa xitzaq jumulchik che kikojb'al, kb'an k'ak' chke jumulchik rech kitzalq'amij kanme', kirip k'ut jumulchik chwach cruz Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' kiya' payoq'b'al tzij.
Mpa' naq jib' chir kub'eq' ja' rech jab' chir k'iy rajlab'al qaj puwi', kuya' k'ut utzlajtaq chaj chke naq chir kichakij uwach, jn jib'e' Qajwal Dios kuya' uq'ab' puwi',
pumul naq jib' chir k'ix uwach xoq'je' k'o tzel chaj chwach, xa' qe'nchik kraj kya' mixq'ab' puwi', k'isb'enik kparex paq'a'.
Ix loq'laj taq qaxlal, tne' jri' qoj ch'awek, qe'oj sub'laj qet'am chir ix, iwiyi'em kux qas uq'osil rech jn solb'alib'.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios suk' uq'atb'altzij, ksacht che Re' jn ichak chir ib'onom xoq'je' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir ik'utum che ub'i' Re', xinimaj k'ut tyox ajkojnel, xoq'je' tijenna kinimaj chinime'.
Pumul uriyb'al qanme' oj chir ix ptaq ijujnal kitaqej ub'anik jn nimnek ruk' nejel iwanme' suk'te' ktz'aqatna jn qatzijlaj ukub'ul ik'u'x,
rech kib'antewa' saq'or xa'ne' chib'ana' chpa' kib'an ni'j chir rimal kikojb'al xoq'je' rimal jn kuyb'ul kik'u'x kecheb'ej jn jitenem rech Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' re'chir Qajwal Dios xub'an jn jitenem che Abraham, mpa' kumaj tuk'ut kub'an juramento chirij jnaq chik chir nimna chwach Re', Qajwal Dios chirij Re' putike'lam xub'anwa' jurar,
xub'ij Qajwal Dios che Abraham: Qatzij chir sub'laj kinya'na Enq'ab' pawi' xoq'je' sub'laj kimpoq'sajna uwach axe'na'al.
Ruk'ut Abraham xriyi'ej ruk' kuyb'ul k'u'x, xuk'am k'ut jn jitenem.
Mpa' qatzij chir wnaq re'chir kib'an jurar kik'am pnaq ub'i' jnaq chir nimna ub'anik chikiwach ire', re'k'ut jn juramento chir kukub'a' ub'ixik chir kux b'im, chri' k'ut k'iswa' nejel k'elaj tzij.
Rechi' chir Qajwal Dios xoq'je' xub'an jn juramento rechwa' kuk'ut chikiwach naqpla' chir kechb'ejna jn jitenem, chir Re' kuk'ext jn jitenem chir xub'an che Abraham.

Rechi' k'o quk' oj, jn jitenem ch'il jn juramento rech Qajwal Dios, ni'j kyeb' (2) kik'extajtaj, chirij k'ut ri' Qajwal Dios loq't ksoknek, xoq'je' kuya' qachoq'ab', re'chir qaya' knaq nejel, rechwa' qachap qib' che jn ukub'ul k'u'x chir Qajwal Dios xuya' chqawach.

Jn ukub'ul k'uxe' xa' janam chpa' jn ch'ich' chir sub'laj al chir kb'ix ancla che' chir kchike' chpam mar chir kow kuyuqej ch'ich' chir kib'in puwi' ja', jn ukub'ul k'uxla' re'k'ut qa ancla oj chir uyuqem qanme' xoq'je' oknaq suk'te' chirij jn nimlaj k'ul chpam loq'laj jaj chir k'o pkaj,
chpa' xokwa' Jesús xa' qamal oj, chir xna'b'aj chqawach chub'anik ukiji'k qab'ej, xb'an jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj che, rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.

Melquisedec re' nimlaj ajtaqnel rech Salem, xoq'je' ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, rech nimlaj Dios, chir xelb'ik chuk'ulik Abraham re'chir xtzalajlaq pe ch'oj che kich'akik nimaqtaq ajtaqnel, ruk'ut Melquisedec xuya' uq'ab' puwi' Abraham.

Ruk'ut Abraham xujach ulajujil (10) puq'ab' Melquisedec rech nejel chpa'kux chir xuch'aklaq pe ch'oj. Jn b'i' Melquisedec nab'e kukiro "nimlaj ajtaqnel rech suk'laj q'atb'altzij," xoq'je' "nimlaj ajtaqnel rech tilimit Salem," re'k'ut ri' "nimlaj ajtaqnel rech jn uxunem rech anme'."

Melquisedec k'ot uqaw xoq'je' k'ot uchuch xoq'je' k'ot uxe'na'al, k'ot majb'al rech uq'ijal xoq'je' k'ot k'isb'al uk'aslemal, xa'ne' janam xb'an che chpa' Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios, re' ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Kixchomnaq chirij june' chir sub'laj nim uq'ij, chir re' jun Abraham chir qaqaw jertaq tzij, xuya' ulajujil (10) re' chirij nejel chpa'kux chir xuraqlaq pe ch'oj.

Utaqnik Qajwal Dios kub'ij chir ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj uxe'na'al knaq Leví, yo'om chke ire' chir kik'am lajujil (10) puwi' tilimit che nejel, tne' nik'ije' ire' ikixlal xoq'je' i'uxe'na'al knaq Abraham.
Pumul Melquisedec, chir uxe'na'alt Leví, xuk'am ulajujil (10) Abraham xoq'je' xuya' uq'ab' puwi' Abraham chir b'onom knaq jitenem che rimal Qajwal Dios.
K'ot k'ut k'elaj tzij chirij, jun chir nim ub'anik xutewchi'j jun chir ch'iti'n ub'anik.
Qatzij chir chinime' naq chir kik'am lajujil (10) xa' ichijab' chir xa' irech kamikal, pumul tyox wuj kch'a'w chirij chir Abraham chir xuya' ulajujil (10) che Melquisedec, jun chir k'asalna.
Kumojo qab'ij chir, Leví jun chir kuk'am ulajujil (10) chinime' pikiwi' tilimit, re' xtoj knaq ulajujil (10) rimal Abraham.
Mpa' Leví k'onelaq putyo'jil Abraham chir uqaw jertaq tzij re'chir Melquisedec xuk'ul Abraham.

Jn nimnek chpam loq'laj jaj aj levítico cha't kraqtaj jn suk'laj k'aslemal chirij, mpa' xe' re' xya'wa' pixab' rech Qajwal Dios chke Rilk'wa'l Israel, ¿rajwixiktre' kaneyses junchik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chpa' ub'antejik Melquisedec chir jla't ub'anik chpa' Aarón?
Mpa' wa k'exta ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rajwixik k'exta pixab' xoq'je'.
Mpa' chirij Jesús jri' kb'ixek, Re' che junchik ch'ob' ktanwa', jn ch'ob' la' k'ot jnaq chke ire' xnimen chu' altar rech loqlaj jaj jertaq tzij.
Mpa' sub'laj q'alaj chir Qajwal Jesús je' xpe ruk' jn ch'ob' rech Judá, k'ot k'ut xub'ij knaq Moisés chirij jn nimnik rech loq'laj jaj.
Xoq'je' sub'laj q'aljenna chirwa kwa'laj naq ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir janam chpa' Melquisedec,
chir xjaqb'a'xta chpa' kub'ij pixab' chirij xe'na'al xa'ne' rimal jn loq'laj ukownem jn k'aslemal chir rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios xch'a'w chirij Jesús chpam tyox wuj, xub'ij: At, At, ajnimnel pwichoj rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.
Mpa ksach k'ut uwach jn nab'e taqnik rimal utuqa'ril xoq'je' rimal chir k'otchik kb'antaj rimal.
Mpa' jn pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés nab'e k'ot xkowan chusuk'b'axik, pumul puk'exwach re' xoklaq jn utzlaj ukub'ul k'u'x, rimal k'ut Re' qojqet ruk' Qajwal Dios.
Qajwal Dios xujaqb'a' ub'ixik ruk' juramento, mpa' ni'jchik ploq'laj jaj xkik'am jn uk'amik b'ej ruk't juramento,

pumul chirij Qajwal Jesús, Qajwal Dios xub'an jurar, mpa' tyox wuj kub'ij: Qajwal Dios xub'an jurar, Re' kutzalq'amijt ranme' chirij chir kux xub'ij: "At, At ajnimnel pwichoj rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq."
Rimal jn juramento, Jesús xuya' jn chapb'al q'ab' rech jn pacto, chir utzna chwach jun nab'e.
Ruk'ut ni'jchik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj ire' sub'laj ik'iy, mpa' rimal kamikal chir kresaj kik'aslemal kikon techik kib'an ajk'amal b'ej rech unimxik Qajwal Dios,
pumul mpa' Jesús uk'aslemal Re' rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, rechi' jn nimnik chpam loq'laj jaj chir xya' che rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Rechi' chir Re' k'asal chb'e q'ij chb'e saq rechwa' kch'a'w pikiwi' ire' xoq'je' kowan chkisolik chb'e q'ij chb'e saq naq chir rimal Re' kiqet ruk' Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' jla' kumaj chqe oj jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj: Tyox, k'ot umak, k'ot tz'il chirij, utosom rib' chke ajmakib', chir nimna b'onom che chwach kaj,

Jesús k'ot rajwixik che Re' nejeltaq q'ij chpa' ni'jchik ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, chir nab'e kiparij awaj chwach Qajwal Dios rimal kimak ire', tere' kiparij awaj rimal kimak wnaq, mpa' Jesús xa' jumul ub'anik xu'no rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, mpa' Re' xujit uk'aslemal putike'lam rech tojb'al qamak.

Mpa' pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés xyukoj che ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chijab' chir tuqa'r kanme'. Pumul rimal jn juramento rech Qajwal Dios chir xtarajlaq chirij pixab', Jesús chir Uk'ijol xb'an tzaq'at che uk'aslemal chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.

Xa' k'ut jla', re'k'ut ri' qas rajwixik chir qoj tijen chub'ixik chinime', chir k'o jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, qech oj, re'k'ut chir xkub'e' puse'b'al loq'laj kub'ulb'al rech unimal uq'ij Qajwal Dios pkaj,
Re'k'ut june' chir knimen chpam jn loq'laj luwar rech jn loq'laj wokom jaj, xoq'je' knimen chpam qas richoj Qajwal Dios, chir Re' Dios b'anawnaq rech, naq chijt b'anawnaq rech.

Mpa' nejel ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj xjaqb'a'xek rech kujach che Qajwal Dios sipnek xoq'je' kuparij awaj chwach Qajwal Dios, rechi' rajwixik jn k'ak' ajk'amal b'ej chir Jesucristo, k'o, k'o ruk' rech kujitwa' che Qajwal Dios.
Rechi' cha't Cristo k'o wural chwach lew kuk'amb'alo Re' jn eqle'n che ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, mpa' wural ik'ochik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir kijit sip che Qajwal Dios chpa' kub'ij pixab'.

Ire' k'ut ni'je' kinimen chpam jn loq'laj luwar chir xa' esb'al uwach xoq'je' xa' umuj chir kux k'o pkaj, jla' chpa' xb'i'x che Moisés rimal Qajwal Dios, re'chir xa' qe'nchik kraj kub'an jn wokom jaj rech Qajwal Dios. Wla' chi'ntere chir jla' kab'an che chpa' jn uwachb'al chir xk'ut chawach chu' jib'.
Pumul chinime' Jesús xuk'am jn chak chir sub'laj utzna chikiwach ni'jchik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, mpa' Re' aj ok'sel tzij rech jn k'ak' pacto chir tiktel puwi' utzlajtaq jitenem.
Mpa' mat' k'ona jech' chpam jn nab'e pacto chir xb'anek, rajwixiktre' kb'an jn ukab' (2) pacto.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios kow xyuyaj Rilk'wa'l Israel, xub'ij: chiwula'much chir petnaq jn q'ij chir kinjaqb'a'na jn k'ak' pacto ruk' richoj Israel xoq'je' ruk' richoj Judá.

Mpa' janamta chpa' jn pacto chir ximb'an kuk' ichuch iqaw, chpam jn q'ij re'chir xinchap chkiq'ab' xiwesajlaq pujuyb'al Egipto, mpa' ire' xijeqe't chpam jn pacto wech En, ruk'ut En, xe' enya' knaq, xcha' Qajwal Dios.

Rechi' chir re' ri' jn pacto chir kimb'anna ruk' Israel xo'w q'atan ni'j q'ijla', xcha' Qajwal Dios, kinya'na Enpixab' pikiwi' ire' xoq'je' kintz'ib'ajna pe kanme', En, knokna che kiDios, ruk'ut ire' kyok'na che Entilimit.

Xoq'je' k'ot jnaq kuk'ut chwach rijil utzaq'at, k'ot jnaq kuk'ut chwach rixlal, kub'ij k'ut che: "Wit'maj uwach Qajwal Dios," mpa' kinejel ket'majna Enwach, kmajtaj b'ik ruk' naq ch'iti'n k'al suk'te' ruk' naq nimaj wnaq.
Mpa' En kinsach tzeltaq kimak xoq'je' k'un te'chik kimak pink'u'x.
Rechi', re'chir Qajwal Dios kch'a'w chirij jn "k'ak' pacto," Re' xresaj uchoq'ab' jn jer pacto, kuxpla' chir kokes che q'el kchakan te'chik xa' qe'nchik kraj ksach uwach.
Rechi' chir chpam jn nab'e pacto k'o taqnik rech unimersesik uq'ij Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' k'o jn wokom loq'laj jaj rech Qajwal Dios chir xa' rech uwach lew.
Mpa' jn wokom jaj rech Dios chir xb'an nab'e chpam jn nab'e tanaj chir kb'ix loq'laj luwar che, k'o k'ut tla' jn candelero, jn mexe ruk' kixlinwaj chir cho'om rimal Qajwal Dios.
Chirij k'ut jn uk'ab' (2) jn nimlaj k'ul k'owa' jn praj rech Loq'laj wokom jaj chir kb'ix qas loq'laj luwar che.

K'o tla' xoq'je' jn altar chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq rech kparexwa' pom, xoq'je' k'o tla' jn kaxe rech pacto chir nejel rij kojom q'an pwaq che, chpam k'ut re' k'o jn kolb'al chir b'onom ruk' qan pwaq chir k'o maná chpam, xoq'je' k'o uvara Aarón chir xtuxnek xoq'je' ik'o tla' tz'alam b'aj rech pacto.

Puwi' jn kaxe' ik'o uwachb'al kyeb' (2) utaqo'n kaj rech unimal q'ij chir querubines kib'i' chir kitz'apij ruk' umujal kixik' jn luwar chpa' kitzkixwa' kik' rech sachb'al kimak wnaq rimal Qajwal Dios. Pumul chirij ri' kumajt chinime' sub'laj qojyolwek.
Jri' k'ut ub'anik ukiji'k ri' xb'an knaq, k'e ok k'ut ajnimnel chpam wokom jaj rech Dios tla' che nab'e tanaj rech richoj Qajwal Dios rech kib'an tla' jn nimnik che Qajwal Dios.

Pumul che jnchik ukab' (2) tanaj xo'w jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj kok tla', xa' jumul che jun janab', re'chir kokek rajwixik kuk'amb'ik kikik'el awaj rech kujit chwach Qajwal Dios, nab'e chirij re' putike'lam rimal umak, xoq'je' chikij wnaq chir kimaknek rimal chir k'ot ket'am.
Ruk' ri' jn Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios xuk'ut chqawach chirwa jn nab'e wokom richoj Dios tijenna kchaknek, maja'na b'are' kuk'ut jn b'ej chir koj uk'amnab'ik chpam jn loq'laj luwar.
Nejel ri' kawulpa' jn k'amb'al nojb'al che ni'j q'ije', mpa' nejel sip ch'il taq awaj kijit chwach Qajwal Dios, kikowenta kisuk'b'a' kanme' naq chir jri' unimxik Qajwal Dios ki'no.
Mpa' xa' waj xoq'je' xa' ja' ch'il k'iy uwach che noq'b'al rech ch'ajb'al, taqnik nuk'ut pumul xa' rech chajb'al qatyo'jil, xchaknek suk'te' re'chir Qajwal Dios kuk'ex ri'.

Pumul chinime' chir k'ochik Cristo chir ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rech utzil chir kipena chqawach. Re'k'ut chir knimen chpam jn wokom loq'laj jaj chir sub'laj nim xoq'je' k'ot jech' che, chir ruk't kiq'ab' chijab' b'onomwa', qab'ij chir rext uwach lew.

Xa' jumul k'ut xok Cristo pe jn loq'laj luwar rech richoj Qajwal Dios rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, ruk' te'chik kikik'el mamtaq k'isik' ch'il mamtaq wakix xa'ne' ruk' ukik'el Re', rechwa' xuch'ak jn tzqab'tejem che mak rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Mpa' wa kikik'el mamtaq k'isik' xoq'je' kikik'el mamtaq wakix xoq'je' uchajil taq ti't wakix kju'b'ex chikij naq chir sub'laj tz'il kij, kikownek kib'an tyox chke chir ksaqab' knaq kij.

¡Pa'tlo jn ukownem ukik'el Cristo, chir rimal jn Loq'laj Santil rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq xujit rib' putike'lam che Qajwal Dios chir k'ot tz'il che rechwa' kuch'ajna iwanme' che kamnaq lajtaq chak rechwa' kinimaj jn k'aslek Dios!
Rechi' chir Cristo Re' aj ok'sel ch'a'wem rech jn k'ak' pacto mpa' ruk' ukamikal kusach kimak wnaq chir ximaken knaq chixe' nab'e pacto, rech naq chir isik'im kik'am jn jitenem chir k'ixtechik.
Mpa' jn wuj chir tz'ib'tal echb'al chpam, te' kchaknek, chirwa ki'ilna nab'e wa xkam jn wnaq chir xb'anew rech.
Mpa' jn wuj chir tz'ib'tal echb'al chpam k'ot ub'anik chirwa k'asalna ajya'l echb'al, te' k'o ub'anik pumul wa xkom ajya'l echb'al.
Rechi' jn nab'e pacto chir xuya' Qajwal Dios xjaqb'a'x knaq ruk' kik'.

Mpa' Moisés xuya' ub'ixik nejel taqnik rech upixab' Qajwal Dios chke nejel wnaq, xuk'am kyaq lana ch'il jn uq'ab' jn che' chir hisopo ub'i' xuchq'alsaj chpam kikik'el raltaq wakix ch'il kirnere ch'il ja' tere' xukitzkij chirij jn b'otom wuj rech pixab' xoq'je' xukitzkij chikij wnaq.
Ruk'ut Moisés xub'ij chke wnaq: "Re'ri' jn kik' rech jn pacto chir xub'an Qajwal Dios iwuk'."
Xoq'je' xukitzkij kik' chirij jn wokom loq'laj jaj xoq'je' xukitzkij chikij kolb'al chir ko'ksek re'chir knimex Qajwal Dios.
Chpa' kub'ij pixab', xa' qe'nchik kraj mat' nejel xb'an ch'aj che ruk' kik', loq' tuk'ut kchup naq mak chemat' ktix kik'.

Rechi' rajwixik kiparex awaj rechwa' kb'an ch'aj chke ni'j chpa'kux chir xa' wochb'al kech chpa'kux chir ik'o pkaj, pumul chpa'kux chir qas ik'o pkaj rajwixik chke ire' jn sip chir k'otchik k'owa' chwach ni'j la'.

Mpa' Cristo je't xok chpam jn loq'laj luwar chir k'o chpam loq'laj jaj chir b'onom kimal chijab' chir xa' uwachb'al jn qatzijlaj tyox luwar, xa'ne' Cristo je' xok suk'te' pkaj rechwa' kuk'ut rib' chwach Qajwal Dios xa' qamal oj.

Mpa' xokt Cristo pkaj rech kujit rib' k'iy rajlab'al, chpa' kub'an jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir kok chpam jn loq'laj luwar chir k'o chpam loq'laj jaj chetaq janab' ruk' kik' chir rext re'.

Mpa' wa cha't jla', sub'laj b'are' k'iy rajlab'al kam Jesucristo suk'te' che xmajtajlaq uwach lew. Pumul chinime' jla'ta, Qajwal Jesucristo xk'uten che uk'isb'al taq q'ij, xa' jumul xk'utnek rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq rechwa' kresaj chikixo'l wnaq jn mak rimal ukamikal.
Xa' k'ut jla' xjaqb'a'x knaq, chir wnaq xa' jumul kikamek, xo'w q'atan ri' kpe jn q'atajtzij,

xoq'je' Cristo xa' jumul xjitek (chpa' awaj chir kiparxik), rechwa' kuchup kimak sub'laj che wnaq, k'utenna che uka'mul (2) rajlab'al pumul k'otchik rech che mak, xa'ne' kpetek rechwa' kyusolwa' naq chir kiyi'em upetb'al.

Mpa' pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj knaq Moisés, re' xa' janam chpa' muj rech utzil chir kipena chqawach, qatzij k'ut chir re't qas ukayb'al, rechi' loq't ksuk'e' kik'aslemal naq chir kiqet ruk' Qajwal Dios rimal ujitik awaj nejel taq janab'.
Mpa' cha't awaj chir kik'amlaq wnaq rech kiparxik kikowan chub'anik suk' che kik'aslemal ire', k'ot nuk'ut chike' kimak xoq'je' rajwixik te'chik kiparex awaj chwach Qajwal Dios nejel taq janab'.
Pumul re'chir kiparex awaj chwach Qajwal Dios nejeltaq janab' kna'tex mak chir b'onom che jn janab',
mpa' kikik'el k'ijoltaq wakix xoq'je' kikik'el mamtaq k'isik' loq't kikowan chusachik mak.
Rechi' re'chir Cristo xk'un chwach lew xub'ij che Qajwal Dios: At Kawajta chir kiparex awaj chawach xoq'je' kawajt At sip chir kijit chaw, pumul xa'b'an ukiji'k Entyo'jil rech krip chawach cruz.
Xiqajt chawach At chir xiparex awaj chawach xoq'je' xiqajt chawach sip chir xijit chaw rech chupseb'al mak.
Tere' ximb'i'j chaw, "Wula'much At Dios wech chir kimpetek chub'anik ajwerem awech jla' chpa' tz'ib'tal knaq chuwij En chpam loq'laj b'otom wuj."

Nab'e xub'ij Cristo: Qajt chawach At awaj ch'il sip chir kijit chawach, xoq'je' qajt chawach awaj chir kiparxik xoq'je' sip rech kuyb'ul mak chir kijit chawach. Rek'ut la' kijitek jla' chpa' kub'ij pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés.
Xoq'je' ub'im: Wla' much, En, En petnaq chub'anik ajwerem awech. Wesaj k'ut chir k'o nab'e re'k'ut jn kiparxik awaj rechwa' kajaqb'a' jn ukab' (2), re'k'ut ukamikal Cristo.
Rimal k'ut rajwerem Qajwal Dios chir xtos qak'aslemal rimal jn sip chir re'k'ut utyo'jil Cristo chir xa' jumul xijitek rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Qatzij k'ut chir nejel ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj nejeltaq q'ij knimen chpam loq'laj jaj chir k'iy rajlab'al xa' jun uwach che parim awaj kujito chir mijunuj kikowent chusachik mak.
Pumul jn ajk'amal b'ej rech unimxik Qajwal Dios re'k'ut Jesucristo chir xa' jumul xujach utyo'jil rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq rimal qamak, tere' xkub'e' puse'b'al Qajwal Dios.
Jri' k'ut k'e chqawach Re' riyi'em suk'te' re'chir Qajwal Dios kuya'na rajch'oj xe' raqan.
Mpa' xa' ruk' jun che sip xub'an suk' che kik'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq naq chir tostal kik'aslemal.
Xa' janam k'ut kub'ij Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios chqe, nab'e kub'ij:
Rek'ut ri' jn pacto chir kimb'anna kuk' ire' xo'w q'aten ni'j q'ije' xcha' Qaqjaw, kinya' Enpixab' ptaq kanme' xoq'je' kintz'ib'ajna ptaq kiwi'.
Xoq'je' xub'ij: "Mijumul k'unchik kimak pink'u'x xoq'je' k'un te'chik pink'u'x tzeltaq kichak chir kib'onom."
Rechi' chir chpa' k'owa' sachb'al mak rajwixik te'chik kb'an sip chirij mak.
Rechi' ix qaxlal xa' rimal ukik'el Jesús k'o jn ukub'ul k'u'x quk' rechwa' kojo'pen chpam jn loq'laj luwar rech loq'laj jaj,
rimal jn k'ak' xoq'je' jn k'aslek b'ej chir xute'b'a' Cristo chqawach rimal jn nimlaj k'ul, qojcho'q chir Re' utyo'jil Re'.
Re'k'ut Jesús jn Ajwab' Kech Ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, chir qech oj, chir k'o pikiwi' rilk'wa'l Qajwal Dios.

Qoqetaq b'la' ruk' Qajwal Dios ruk' jn anme' chir k'o saqlaj tzij ruk', xoq'je' pe jn ukub'ul k'u'x chir kuya' kojb'al, chisaqab'saj iwanme' chir k'o tzeltaq chomb'al chpam, ruk' kik' chir xtix piwanme' xoq'je' chich'ija' ityo'jil ruk' saqlaj ja'.
Xa' jun qaya'wa' qakojb'al chirij jn ukub'ul k'u'x mpa' suk' ranme' jun chir xujit knaq chqe.
Xoq'je' nimb'la' qaya'wa' qib' chqawach rechwa' nim qaya'wa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x xoq'je' nim qaya'wa' ni'j utzlajtaq chak.

Mqaya' knaq umulxik qib' rech unimersesik ub'i' Qajwal Dios chpa' kib'an jujun chir k'amannaq chke, xa'ne' qaya' anme' chqawach, pa'tlo chinime' chir tijen qetlaq jn q'ij rech upetb'al Qajwal Jesucristo.
Mpa' wa nab'e qak'omom chik jn etamb'al rech jn saqlaj tzij tere' qoj makan ruk' nejel uk'uxlal, k'otchik naq sip kumojo chir qaya' chwach Qajwal Dios rimal qamak.
Xa'ne' xo'w chik kelknaq reyb'exik jn xub'ilib' laj q'ataj tzij rech Qajwal Dios xoq'je' reyb'exik jn nimlaj q'a' chir kusachna kiwach rajch'oj Qajwal Dios.
Naq chir kuq'ab' pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés, wa ik'o kyeb' (2) xub' (3) lewa' chir kiq'aljansaj umak, k'otchik k'axk'ab'al k'u'x ktaq ukamsesik.

¿Chichomaj k'ut chir sub'lajna nimna k'ajse'b'al wach kya' che jnaq chir kuyaq' cha'qan Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kukoj che tz'il ukik'el jn pacto, chir re' jn kik'la' xub'an tyox che uk'aslemal, xoq'je' kuyoq' jn Loq'laj Santil rech jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios?
Pumul qet'am uwach jun chir xub'ij: Wech En uya'ik rijil uk'ixel, En kinya'na tojb'al xcha' Qaqjaw, xub'ij jumulchik: Re' Qaqjaw kuq'at tzij pikiwi' utilimit.
Nimlaj k'axlaj b'onoj qajem puq'ab' jn k'aslek Dios.
Pumul k'unaq pik'u'x ni'j q'ij chir xq'atenek re'chir te' qas xik'am ix jn saqil rech utzij Qajwal Dios, ix xich'ij ruk' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x ni'j k'axk'olil chir xpe chiwij.
K'o jumul chir qatzij, ix ruk' yoq'nem xoq'je' ruk' nimaqtaq q'oxom xya' ik'ix chikiwach wnaq, jumulchik xijunuj iwib' kuk' naq chir jla' tijen kb'an chke.

Xoq'je' ix xk'axk'ab' ik'u'x chke naq ik'o pche', xoq'je' re'chir xmaj chpa'kux iwech ruk' ki'kte'mal xiya' knaq, mpa' ix iwet'am chir ix, k'o jn imib'i'l pkaj chir sub'laj k'otchik k'owa' xoq'je' rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Mitzaq pnaq jla' jn ukub'ul ik'u'x mpa' nimna tojb'al rech re' kya' chiw.
Mpa' rajwixik jn kuyb'ul k'u'x rech chirwa xb'an rajwerem Qajwal Dios, ix kik'omo chir kux jitom chiw.
Qajwal Dios kub'ij: Mpa' xa' qe'nchik kraj, jun chir kpetek, kpena, kb'oytajtena.
Pumul jun chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios k'ise'na xa' rimal kojb'al, pumul wa ktzalaj chirij k'amart uk'aslemal chwach Dios.
Pumul qe'oj ojt ni'j chir kitzalaj chikij rech kib'e chpam jn tzaqel xa'ne' oj, oj ni'j chir k'o qakojb'al rechwa' qakol qanme'.
Rek'ut kojb'al jn ujaqb'axik chpam qanme', chir qatzij kya'na chqe chir kux qayi'em, tne' qilt uwach chir kux qayi'em, qakoj ruk' qanme' chir qatzij k'olek.
Rimal kojb'al jertaq wnaq xk'amer kik'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios.
Rimal kojb'al qach'ob'o chir kux ub'anik xwnaqerses uwach kaj lew, chir xa' rimal uyoloj Qajwal Dios xb'antajwa', rechi' chir kux qil chinime' je' xb'an ruk' chir kux iq'alajta.
Rimal kojb'al Abel xujit jn k'otchik k'owelaj sip che Qajwal Dios chwach usip Caín, rimal k'ut ukojb'al Abel xb'an suk' che uk'aslemal, Abel tne' kamnaqchik pumul kch'awna chir kux xu'no.

Rimal kojb'al Enoc chirij Qajwal Dios chir k'aslek xk'amb'ik rechwa' krilt kamikal, xraqta te'chik re' mpa' Qajwal Dios xk'amawb'ik rech, kub'ij k'ut tyox wuj Dios chir Enoc xe'taq k'amb'ik xk'amer uk'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios.
Pumul wa k'ot kojb'al loq't qoj k'amer chwach Qajwal Dios, mpa' rajwixik naq chir qet ruk' Re', ukojo' chir k'olek, ruk'ut Qajwal Dios kuya' nimaqtaq sip che naq chir ktzuken rech.
