Rimal kojb'al Noé, re'chir Qajwal Dios xuna'b'ajsaj ub'ixik chpa'kux che chir iq'alajtena, ruk' mejb'el ib' xub'an jn arca, rech kisoltajwa' uk'ijol, ch'il kixiqil uk'ijol ch'il rixiqil re' rimal k'ut jn kojb'ale' Noé xye uya' xe' mak wnaq rech uwach lew, xoq'je' xb'an aj echb'al rech kaj che rimal chir suk' xukojo chir kux xb'i'x che rimal Dios.

Abraham rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios, re'chir sik'ex rimal Qajwal Dios xuya' rib' ptaqek, xelb'ik che jn luwar chpa' k'owa', je xye che jn chqab' jib' chir xya' che, che echb'al, xel k'utb'ik ret'amta jalchi' k'owa' jn chqab' jib'la' chi'.

Abraham rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios xjaqe' chpam jn luwarla' chir xijit che rimal Qajwal Dios, chpa' naq wnaq chir kpe che jn najlaj tilimit, xkije' k'ut chpam wokom jaj ch'il Isaac, ch'il Jacob chir ijun che jn echb'al la'.
Mpa' Abraham xriyi'ejna re' jn nimlaj tilimit chir kub'ul puwi' jn kowlaj tz'aq', chir re' Qajwal Dios xtzaqaw rech xoq'je' re' xwa'lsen rech.

Xoq'je' Sara rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios chir tne' suk' uk'omom laq chir ka'lanta, xya' uchoq'ab' rech alnem, xuya' k'ut chwach q'ij saq jn ral chir rimal ujanab' rech te'chik re' alnem, mpa' xukojo chir suk' ranme' jun chir xjitew rech.
Rechi' Abraham chir xa' jun che chij, tne' xa' xe'taq ukamikal chik xkije'na sub'laj uxe'na'al chpa' ch'imil chir ik'o pkaj xoq'je' chpa' seneb' chir k'o chichi' ja' rech mar chir k'ot ka'jlan rech.

Kinejel ire' xijaqe' xa' rimal kojb'al xoq'je' xikamek, xkiraq tuk'ut chir kux xijit chke, che naj k'ut xkilwa' pnaq xoq'je' xkit'maj uwach xoq'je' xkiya' ritzil uwach, xoq'je' xkiq'aljansaj ub'ixik chir ire' iwnaq chir je' kipe che naj tilimit xoq'je' chir xa' i'aj q'axeltaq wnaq chwach lew.
Mpa' naq chir jri' kib'ij, sub'laj q'alaj chir tijenna kitzukuj qas kitilimit.
Cha't kichomajna chirij jn jib' chpa' xyelwa'laq qatzij chir k'onare' luwar chke kitzalaj b'ik jumulchik tla'.
Pumul ire' sub'laj xkiriyijna jn k'otchik k'owelaj tilimit, re'k'ut jn tilimit rech kaj, rechi' Qajwal Dios k'ixt re' chir kb'ix Dios che kimal ire', mpa' ub'onom jn nimlaj tilimit chke ire' pkaj.

Abraham rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios, re'chir Qajwal Dios xupaj ukojb'al, xujit k'ut uparxik Isaac chu' altar chwach Qajwal Dios, tne' Abraham uk'omom chik jn jitenem, xujit k'ut Isaac chir xa' jun che uk'ijol rech kuparij chwach Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios ub'im chik che Abraham chir rimal Isaac kikije'na uxe'na'al.

Xuchomaj k'ut Abraham: Wa re' ku'no chpa' utaqnik Qajwal Dios ret'am chir Qajwal Dios k'o loq'laj ukownem chir kowan chuya'ik uk'aslemal naq kamnaq, chwach re' kawulpa' xkomna uk'ijol, tere' xk'astaj jumulchik chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
Isaac rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios xuya' uq'ab' pikiwi' Jacob ch'il Esaú chirij chir kux petnaq chqawach.
Jacob rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios xe'taq ukamikal xuya' knaq uq'ab' pikiwi' rilk'wa'l José ptaq kijujnal, xunimersaj k'ut uq'ij Qajwal Dios xa' utaxim chik rib' tza'm uch'imi'y.
José rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios re'chir xkamek xch'a'w knaq chirij kelb'al Rilk'wa'l Israel pe tilimit Egipto xoq'je' xuya' knaq taqnik chirij chir kux kb'an che ub'aqil re'.

Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios re'chir xa'lex Moisés xo'wax kimal uchuch uqaw xub' (3) ik', mpa' xkilo chir sub'laj qus ka'yek, xoq'je' xkixijt kib' che taqnik chir xutz'ib'aj nimlaj ajtaqnel rech Egipto chir kikamses taq ne' laj riyumam Israel.
Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Moisés re'chir xub'an chij xuk'am te'chik chir kb'ix ral umya'l Faraón che.
Moisés re' xucha' utijik k'axk'olil kuk' utilimit Qajwal Dios chwach jn ki'kte'mal rech ub'anik mak chir xa' rech kyeb'xub' q'ij.
Mpa' sub'laj utzna xril re' jn k'ixb'al rech Cristo chwach jn mib'i'l rech Egipto, mpa' re' je' xuya' uwach chirij jn nimlaj sip chir jitom che rimal Qajwal Dios.

Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Moisés xelb'ik xuya' knaq Egipto, xuxijt rib' che uk'anal nimlaj ajtaqnel rech Egipto, xa' jun xuya'wa' uchomb'al kawulpa' chir tijen kril uwach Qajwal Dios chir q'alajta.

Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Moisés xuk'ul nimq'ij rech Pasc xoq'je' xutaq roksik kik' che uchi'taq jaj rechwa' chir taqo'n ajkamsel kech nab'etaq kilk'wa'l wnaq aj Egipto, kub'ant k'ax chke ire'.

Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Rilk'wa'l Israel xkiram kyaq mar chpa' q'atnem pe chq'ij lew, ruk'ut ajxolta't rech Egipto kaj ire' jla' ki'no kiq'axek chpa' xkib'an aj israelita, pumul ire' xijeq' knaq paja'.
Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Rilk'wa'l Israel xisuten wuqub' (7) q'ij chirij tz'aq' rech tilimit Jericó, ruk'ut ni'j tz'aqe' xitzaqek.

Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Rahab jn xaq chir kwar kuk' nejel chijab', xkamt re' kuk' nejel wnaq chir kiya't kib' ptaqek che Qajwal Dios, mpa' re' ruk' jn uxunem rech anme' xyuk'uluj chirchoj ajya'l wach kech Rilk'wa'l Israel.

¿Kux chik kimb'ij chiw? Sub'laj q'ij kraj chir kimb'ij chiw chir kux xub'an Gedeón ch'il kux xub'an Barac xoq'je' kux xub'an Sansón ch'il kux xub'an Jefté xoq'je' kux xub'an David ch'il kux xub'an Samuel ch'il ub'ixik chir kux xkib'an ajq'axal uyoloj Qajwal Dios,
chir xa' rimal kojb'al xikon chkich'akik nimaqtaq taqnik, xkib'an jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, xikon churaqik jn ujitnem Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' xkitz'apij kichi' koj,
xkichupsaj uchoq'ab' nimaqtaq q'a', xikon xkesaj kib' puchi' michit, xkesajlaq sub'laj choq'ab' che kituqa'ril, xkixijt kib' che ch'oj, xkaqtaj ajxolta't chir kipe che naj tilimit.

Ik'o ixiqib' chir xkilna uwach kikamnaq rimal chir xik'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib'. Pumul ni'jchik chir xiya' pe q'oxom xkaj tuk'ut chir kitzqapses rechwa' kiraq jn utzlaj k'astajb'al chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
Ik'o ni'jchik chir xya' kik'ix xoq'je' xkitij ch'ay xoq'je' xixim che ximb'al ch'ich', xyo'kses pche'.

Xib'an cha'b'aj xoq'je' xik'ur che cierre xb'an pnik'aj chke, xoq'je' xpaj kikojb'al, xikamses che michit, xipeqe'k xixule'k kikojom utz'umil kirnere ch'il kapri't chikij, imub'a', xya' q'oxmal ruk' kanme', sub'laj xb'an k'ax chke.
Kumaj tuk'ut chke wnaq rech uwach lew chir ni'je' kikije' chikixo'l, mpa' xipeqe'k xixule'k ptaq chiqi'j jib' xoq'je' chu'taq jib' xoq'je' ptaq pak ch'il ptaq jul xe'taq lew.
Ni'j wnaqe' xk'amer kik'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios rimal kikojb'al, pumul k'ot jnaq chke ire' xuk'omo chir kux ujitom Qajwal Dios,
jri' xraqtejek rechwa' kyo'penta chirwa oj k'ot kuk', mpa' Qajwal Dios xub'an jn chomnik pqawi' oj chir sub'laj utzn a.

Rechi', oj chir isutennaq chiqi'j sub'laj che testig kawulpa' rilik sutz' chir kiq'aljamsam kikojb'al, qesajb'la' pnaq jla' nejel eqa'n xoq'je' nejel mak chir kuq'atuj qab'ej, tere' qatzaqa' qanim ruk' kuyb'ul k'u'x chpam jn b'ej rech qak'aslemal chir k'o chqawach,

qatuyuj xo'w Qajwal Jesús mpa' Re' ajmajb'al rech xoq'je' ajsuk'b'al rech qakojb'al, re'k'ut chir rimal jn ki'kte'mal chir kya'na che Re', xutij k'ax ruk' ukamikal xoq'je' xk'ixta xrip chwach cruz, pumul chinime' kub'ul puse'b'al loq'laj kub'ulb'al rech Qajwal Dios.
Rechi' chir kixchomnaq chirij Jesús, re'k'ut chir xutij sub'laj k'ax pkiq'ab' ajmakib', rechwa' chir mkosek xoq'je' mub'an kyeb' (2) iwanme',
mpa' ix, tixnaqta ikik'el rimal uk'le'lxik uwach mak.
Cha'nim sach chiw jn utzlaj yaj rech Qajwal Dios chir chpa' elk'wa'lxel kub'ij chiw: "Wilk'wa'l mawitzlaj uwach jn suk'b'enik rech Qaqjaw. Xoq'je' mub'an tuqa'r awanme' re'chir kow ktujek'o.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios kusuk'b'a' naq chir loq' krilo, xoq'je' kuya' uxk'ayil nejel naqpla' chir kuk'am che rilk'wa'l."
Wa jn suk'b'enik rech Qajwal Dios, re' kub'an chiw chpa' alk'wa'lxel, mpa' ¿naq, naq alk'wa'lxel chemat' ksuk'b'a'x rimal uqaw?
Pumul wa kixsuk'b'axta, chir kinejel k'ut xiq'atan chpam, ixb'are' mub'a' k'elaq, ixt qas elk'wa'lxel.
Xoq'je' oj xikije' qachuch qaqaw rech uwach lew, chir xoj kisuk'b'a', ruk'ut oj xqamej qib' chikiwach. Rajwixik k'ut chir qanimaj Qajwal Dios chir kiqaw qasantil rech qoj k'se'wa'.
Mpa' qachuch qaqaw xa' rech kyeb'xub' q'ij xoj kisuk'b'a' jla' chpa' xqaj chikiwach ire', pumul Qajwal Dios koj usuk'b'a' rech utzil chqe oj, rechwa' chir oj, oj jun ruk' jn tyoxlaj uk'aslemal.

Qatzij k'ut chir nejel suk'b'enik re'chir tijen k'amek kuya't ki'kte'mal xa'ne' kuya' q'oxmal anme', pumul re'chir q'atnek, kuya' jn loq'laj uxumb'al rechwa' kijaqe' chpam jn suk'laj k'aslemal naq chir xisuk'b'a'xek.
Rechi' chir, chiwa'lsaj iq'ab' chir ituqa'r xoq'je' chiwa'lsaj uwi'taq ich'ek chir ituyub'naq.
Xoq'je' chib'ana' suk' che ib'ej rechwa' chir naq ko'x raqan kelteb'ik che b'ej xa'ne' ku'tzer knaq.
Kixtarjaq chirij jn uxunem rech anme' kuk' kinejel xoq'je' kixtarjaq chirij jn k'aslemal chir tastel che mak, mpa' wa k'ot ri' iwuk', k'ot jnaq kril uwach Qaqjaw.

Utz rilik chib'ana', rechwa' chir mat' k'o jnaq kuya' knaq jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' rech chir keltewelaq naq k'ayil pranme' chir kutzukuj ch'ojb'al, rimal k'ut jn k'ayil la' sub'laj ik'iy kitzij knaq kib'.

Wne' k'o jnaq chiw ix kmaken ruk' utyo'jil xe'taq k'le'b'al xoq'je' kub'an wastaq chak chpa' Esaú chir xa' rimal jn laq che tib'lil chir xa' rech jumul wi'im, xuk'ij jn tewchi'nik chir kya' chke nab'etaq laj, mpa' re' nab'e laj k'se'naq.

Iwet'am k'ut ix, re'chir q'atannaq chik ri' Esaú xraj re' krechb'ejna jn tewchi'nik chir kya' chke nab'e taq k'la'b' chir kik'ise'k, pumul xtzaq pnaq jla' rimal uqaw, xya'tchik luwar che chir kutzalq'amij ranme', tne' xutzukuj ruk' q'ej.
Mpa' ix je't xixqeb' chu' jn jib' chir kumojo kteqe'xek chir kujuluw paq'a', xoq'je' pe qu'mal, pe rchaq qu'm, xoq'je' pkyaqlajaw, chpa' xkib'an Rilk'wa'l Israel,
xoq'je' xita't uch'ab'al su' xoq'je' xita't uch'ab'al Qajwal Dios, naq chir xkita' jn ch'ab'ale' xkita' toq'ob' rech chir mat' kyuch'ab'ej chik.
Mpa' kich'ijt taqnik chir kub'ij: Wa k'o naq wnaq, naq awaj lewa' chir kuteqe'j uwi' jib' kamsesaq cha'b'aj ruk' lewa' naq ch'ich' jutz'utz' uwi'.
Sub'laj k'ut xib'ilib' chir kux tijen ki'ilek chir Moisés xub'ij: "Tijin kimb'irb'i'ten rimal uxib'il wib'."
Xa'ne' ix je' xixqet chu' jib' rech Sión, xixqet ruk' Jerusalén rech kaj, tilimit rech jn k'aslek Dios, chpa' ik'owa' sub'laj che mil utaqo'n kaj,

xoq'je' xixqet chpa' kimulumwa' kib' nab'etaq al chir tz'ib'tal kib'i' pkaj, xixqet ruk' Qajwal Dios chir ajq'atal tzij pikiwi' kinejel, xoq'je' xixqet ruk' kisantil utzlajtaq wnaq chir saqapsam chik kanme' rimal Qajwal Dios,
xixqet ruk' Jesús, chir aj ok'sel yoloj rech jn k'ak' pacto, xoq'je' xixqet ruk' kik' chir tixom rech Cristo chir sub'lajna kch'awna chwach ukik'el Abel.

Chiwula' chir miwitzlaj uwach Qajwal Dios chir kxuch'ab'ej, mpa' wa xikonta xkanij kib' ni'j chir xkixutuj uwach jun chir xe' uyaj chwach lew, pa'tlo qe'oj qojkomb'a'lo qanij qib' chirwa qitzlaj uwach jun chir kyajenlaq suk'te' pkaj.
Uch'ab'al k'ut Re' chir nab'e xuyikij uwach lew, pumul chinime' xujito, kub'ij: Kinyikijna jumulchik xo'wt uwach lew xa'ne' xoq'je' kaj.
Ni'j yoloje' "jumulchik" kch'a'w chirij chir ke'sna ni'j chir kux b'onom, chir kumojo ksilb'exik rech kijaqe' knaq ni'j chir kisilib'taj.
Rechi' jn nimlaj q'atb'altzij chir kuya' Qajwal Dios chqe, ksilib't re'. Rimal k'ut ri' qatyoxij xoq'je' qanimersaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios ruk' mejb'al ib' ch'il nimseb'al q'ij.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios jla' chpa' q'a' chir nejel kusach uwach.
Ix wixlal joqo'qb'la' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chixo'l.
Msach chiw uya'ik kiwarb'al iwijil itz'aq'at, mpa' jujun chir ket'amta xkiya' kiwarb'al utaqo'n kaj.
Natjaq chiw naq itzab'tel pche' kawulpa' chir ix jun kuk', ix tz'ab'tel pche', xoq'je' na'tjaq chiw naq chir kiroqom q'oxmal kawulpa' chir ix jun kuk' ire'.

Nim chiya'wa' iwenejel jn k'le'b'al xoq'je' nim chiya'wa jn mejb'al ib' chikixo'l k'le'naqtaq wnaq, mpa' Qajwal Dios kuq'at tzij pikiwi' naq chir kib'an mak rech tyo'jil, xoq'je' nik'ij chir kimaken chirij k'le'b'al.
Miloq'oj pwaq, kixki'ktaq ruk' chir kux k'o iwuk' chinime', mpa' Qajwal Dios xub'ij: Ktinya't knaq xoq'je' ktinxutujt knaq.
Xa'k'ut jla' chir qojkon chub'ixik ruk' ukub'ul k'u'x: "Re' Qajwal Dios ajto'l wech, kinxijtena wib'. ¿Kux kut kowan chub'anik naq wnaq chir xa' rech kamik?"
Natajaq chiw ajyuq'al iwech chirij kojb'al chir ik'o chixo'l, ire' k'ut chir xkiya' ub'ixik uyoloj Qajwal Dios chiw, kixchomnaq chirij chir kux kino'jb'al ire' xoq'je' chiwesaj uwach kikojb'al ire'.
Qajwal Jesucristo Re' misme rech wir xoq'je' Re' misme rech poq'ij xoq'je' Re' misme rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.

Miya' iwib' chir kixk'amb'ik kimal k'iy uwach xoq'je' t'amt'elta kiwach che tyojnik mpa' rajwixik qakub'a' qanme' chirij jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios ruk't ni'j tib'lil chir k'ot xuya' chke naq chir xkitijo.
Oj k'o jn qa altar chpam loq'laj wokom jaj rech Qajwal Dios, chir ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj k'ot kech che utijik chir kux k'o puwi'.

Mpa' jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rech jn jer pacto, kukoj b'ik kiki'k'el awaj chpam tyox luwar rech wokom richoj Qajwal Dios rech tojb'al mak, pumul kityo'jil ni'j awaje' je kiparex chirij wokom taq kichoj Rilk'wa'l Israel.
Jla' xoq'je' Jesús rechwa' kub'an tyox che kik'aslemal tilimit rimal ukik'el, re' je xkam chirij tilimit Jerusalén.
Rechi' jelaq b'ik oj chuk'ulik Qajwal Jesucristo chirij tilimit rechwa' qak'am b'ik uk'ix.
Mpa' wural chwach lew, oj k'ot qatilimit chir jaqlel tilimit, xa'ne' re' qatzukuj jun tilimit chir kpena chqawach.
Rechi' chir suk' kub'lek qajita' che Qajwal Dios rimal Jesucristo jn sipnek rech b'ixnik chir janam chpa' jn wachnem rech qachi' chir kiq'aljansaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios,
xoq'je' msach chiw ub'anik utzil xoq'je' chikib'ej kuk' ni'jchik kux k'o iwuk', re'k'ut la' jn sipnek chir k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.

Chiya' iwib' ptaqek chke iwajyuq' chirij kojb'al xoq'je' xokaq xe' kitaqnik mpa' ire' kichijij iwanme' chpa' ni'j chir kijachna rixmal che Qajwal Dios, rechwa' kib'an kichak ruk' ki'kte'mal ruk'ta chir k'ax kina' pe kanme', mpa' ri' k'ot kch'ak chirij.
Kixch'awaq ruk' Qajwal Dios pqawi' oj, mpa' kub'ul chik qak'u'x oj chir k'ochik jn ch'ajlaj anme' quk', qarij k'ut oj utz' qojb'in che nejel.
Kinta' k'ut sub'laj toq'ob' chiw chir kixch'awaq ruk' Qajwal Dios rechwa' kintzalaj iwuk' jumulchik cha'nim.
Ruk'ut jn Dios rech jn uxunem rech anme' chir xuk'asb'a' Qajwal Jesucristo chikixo'l kamnaqib' chir Re'k'ut jn nimlaj ajyuq' kech taq kirnere rimal kik' rech jn pacto chir kistechik,

re'k'ut Qajwal Dios kub'an chiw chir kixkon chub'anik utzlajtaq chak rechwa' kib'an rajwerem Re', xoq'je' kub'an chiw ix chir kib'ono chir kux k'amar chwach Re' rimal Jesucristo, che Re' k'ut jn unimal q'ij rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
Kinta' jn toq'ob' chiw qaxlal chir chich'ija' jn yoloj rech jn utzlaj yaj chir xintz'ib'aj chiw.
Kwaj en kiwet'maj chir qaxlal Timoteo re' xel laq pche', wa kpe cha'nim, ruk' re' kimb'e chiwilik.
Chiya' ritzil kiwach kinejel iwajyuq', naq chir ik'o chixo'l xoq'je' chiya' ritzil kiwach kinejel ajkojnel. Qaxlal chir ik'o Italia kitaqb'ik ritzil iwach.
Re'tb'la' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kije' iwuk' iwenejel. B'antajaq b'la'.
En Santiago, jaqlel ajnimnel rech Dios xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo. Kinya' ritzil kiwach kab'lajuj (12) puq che wnaq rech Rilk'wa'l Israel, chir kijub'um kib' chwach lew.
Ix wixlal, sub'laj kixki'ktaq re'chir kpe k'iy uwach che pajb'al chiwij.
Ix iwet'am chir jn pajb'al rech ikojb'al, re' kuya' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x pik'aslemal.
Ruk'ut jn kuyb'ul k'u'x wa ktz'aq'at uchak pik'aslemal, rech chir kub'anwa' suk' ik'aslemal xoq'je' ix tzaq'at chir k'ot kraj chiw.
Wa k'o jnaq chiw krajna jn nimlaj nojb'al che, chuta' che Qajwal Dios, Re' kuya' chke kinejel sub'laj nim, Re' kujub'ujt pikiwi' kuya' k'utna chke.

Pumul chita' ruk' kojb'al, mib'an kyeb' (2) che ikojb'al, mpa' naqpla' chir kub'an kyeb' (2) che ukojb'al, june' xa' janam ub'anik chpa' urep ja' rech mar chir kcharxek k'amb'ik che jnchik praj mar, kt'oq che jnchik praj.
Naqpla' jri' ku'no muchomaj chir k'o kya' che rimal Qaqjaw.
Mpa' naq wnaq chir kyeb' (2) ub'onom che ranme', jalan kub'ij poq'ij, jalan kub'ij chuwaq, xa't jun wa'lwa' uyoloj.
Pumul jn qaxlal chir nimt kuya'wa' rib', ki'ktaqb'la' mpa' nim ub'anik chwach Qajwal Dios.
Ruk'ut naq k'o umib'i'l, pumul nimt kuya'wa' rib', ki'ktaq mpa' nim kya'wa' rimal Qajwal Dios. Mpa' naq wnaq k'o umib'i'l janam chpa' ukotz'e'jal chaj chir kpuqlaq.
Ruk'ut kel laq q'ij, rimal umaq'nal kuchiqersaj jun chaj, ruk'ut usi'j kpuqlaq, sach uwach uq'osil, jla'k'ut ub'anik jun chir k'o umib'i'l, kelknaq umib'i'l re'chir kamek.

Sub'laj utz rech naq wnaq chir kuch'ijo re'chir ktaqchi'x rimal tzel chub'anik mak, mpa' wa xuch'ij jn pajb'al kuk'amna jun ucorona rech k'aslemal, chir ujitom knaq Qajwal Dios chke naqpla' chir kiloq'oj Re'.
Naqpla' chir ktaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel, mub'ij chir Re' Dios ktaqchi'n rech, mpa' Dios k'ot jnaq kutaqchi'j chub'anik mak, xoq'je' Re' ktaqchi'xt chub'anik mak.
Xa'ne' putike'lam naq wnaq ktaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzeltaq uriyb'al chir kucharej xoq'je' kumin chub'anik mak.
Ruk'ut chirwa xa'lex jn tzel riyb'ale', kresajlaq che saq jn mak, ruk'ut jn mak chirwa xb'anek kresajlaq che saq kamikal.
Wixlal chir loq' kixwilo, ¡mix sub'tejek!
Nejel utzlaj sip xoq'je' nejel loq'laj sip je qajlaq ruk' Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut chir xub'an saqil xoq'je' Re' kuk'ext uno'jb'al.
Mpa' jla' rajwerem Qajwal Dios, xuya' qak'aslemal chirij uyoloj chir saqlaj tzij, xub'an chqe chir oj nab'etaq rilk'wa'l rech jnik'pla' utiko'n.
Loq'laj taq wixlal, chiwet'maj, chir nejel wnaq kita' b'la' ruk' kixikin pa'nim, mrajb'la' kich'awaq, xoq'je' mrajb'la' petaq kiywal.
Mpa' wa xpe uk'anal naq chij kub'an te'chik chir kux suk'laj q'atb'eltzij chwach Dios.

Rechi' chiya' knaq nejel tz'il lajtaq mak, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ni'j kax lajtaq chomnik chirij jnchik alxik, chik'ama' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir jaqb'a'm chixo'l ruk' jn nimlaj anme' re'k'ut chir kowan chusolik ik'aslemal che mak.
Chib'ana' chir kux kub'ij uyoloj Qajwal Dios chiw, xa't kita' che jla', mpa' wa kinta chpa' kub'ij re', xa' kisokaj iwib'.
Mpa' naqpla' chir xa' kuta' che jla' uyoloj Qajwal Dios, pumul kub'anta chir kux kub'ij jn yoloje', june' xa' janam ub'anik chpa' naq wnaq chir kutuyuj uplaj pe jn espejo.
Mpa' xa' utikel kutuyuj rib', tere' k'ek, pa'nimk'ut ksach che kux ka'yek.
Pumul naq chir kuya' uxikin chuta'ik jn saqlaj pixab', chir k'o tzqaptejem chpam, xoq'je' kajaqe' chpam, xa't che jla' kuto'o, june' sub'laj k'otchik kowe' rech chirij chir kux ku'no.
Wa k'o jnaq kuchomaj chir utzlaj ajkojnel, pumul wa kujek't raq, xa'ne' xa' utikel kusokaj rib'. Ukojb'al june' k'ot kchakanwa'.
Jn kojb'al chir ch'ajch'oj chir k'ot tz'il chpam chwach Dios Qajawxel: Re' kisaqxik mub'a' ch'il kito'ik malka'n taq ixiqib' che kirajwixik xoq'je' mkisoq' kib' che mak rech uwach lew.
Ix wixlal, chir k'o ikojb'al chirij Jesucristo chir nim uq'ij. Rajwixik chir xa jnam rilik nejel wnaq chib'ana.

Mpa' wa kokb'ik tla' chpa' kiraqwa' iwib' chunimersik uq'ij Qajwal Dios naq chij chir ukojom umat'q'ab' chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq, xoq'je' utzlajtaq k'ul uk'ojom, xoq'je' kokb'ik tla' naq mub'a', chir k'ojb'al uq'u'.
Ruk'ut ix re' k'e iwach chirij jun chir utz lajtaq k'ul uk'ojom, kib'ij k'ut che: "At utz katkub'e' wural," ruk'ut che jn mub'a' kib'ij: "At katwab'aq tla', katkub'e' lewa' pu'lew."
¿Tijen tuk'ut kiwichij uq'ij jun, ruk'ut jnchik kiqasaj uq'ij, xoq'je', tijen kiq'at tzij ruk' tzeltaq chomb'al?

Ix wixlal chir sub'laj ix loq' kixwilo, chita'much. ¿Re' tuk'ut Qajwal Dios cha'wnaq kech mub'a' rech jn uwach lewa', rechwa' kuya' jn mib'i'l rech kojb'al chke, xoq'je' kub'an chke chir kechb'ej jn echb'al rech jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij chir ujitom chke naq chir kiloq'oj Dios?
Pumul ix xiya' pe k'ixb'al jn mub'a'. Mpa', ¿ire't k'ut wnaq chir k'o kimib'i'l kitij ikik'el xoq'je' ire't k'ut chir kix kik'amb'ik ptaq q'atb'altzij chirwa kitojt ik'as?
Xoq'je' ire' kib'ij wastzij chirij jn utzlaj ub'i' Cristo, chir iwajaw ix chinime'.
Wa qatzij ki'no chpa' kub'ij pixab' chir tz'ib'tal chpam tyox wuj: Loq'oj awijil atz'aq'at chpa' uloq'xik awib' at ka'no, utz jla' ki'no.
Pumul wa jnamt kilik iwixlal ki'no, kixmaknek xoq'je' pixab' kub'ij chiw chir ix qatzij, ix xixolq'apij pixab'.
Mpa' naqpla' chir kub'ono chir kux kub'ij nejel pixab' rech Qajwal Dios, pumul wa k'onaq praj chir kub'anta, june' kmaken chirij nejel pixab'.
Mpa' Re' misme Qajwal Dios xub'ij: Mat makan chirij k'le'b'al, xoq'je' xub'ij: Mab'an kamek. Xa' k'ut jla', kat makent chirij k'le'b'al, pumul wa kakamsaj naq wnaq, xaxo'lq'opij pixab'.
Jla' chib'ij xoq'je' jla' chib'ana', chpa' ni'j chir q'at tzij pikiwi' rimal jn pixab' chir kuya' jn tzq'aptejem chke.
Mpa' ruk't k'axk'ab'al k'u'x q'at tzij puwi' jun chir k'ot k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, pumul jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, tne' kumajt chqe, kch'akanna puwi' jn q'ataj tzij.
Ix wixlal, ¿kux kchakanwa' che naq wnaq kub'ij chir k'o ukojb'al, pumul k'otnaq uchak ub'onom chpa' k'utenwa' ukojb'al? ¿June' ksoltajta xo'w ruk' ukojb'al?
Wa k'o naq qaxlal chij, naq xaq lewa' chir sub'laj q'el kiq'u' xoq'je' k'ot kiwaj.
Wa k'o jnaq chiw kub'ij chke: "Jix pe jn uxunem rech anme', chikojo' iq'u xoq'je' kixwo'oq," pumul k'ot xuya' chke chir kux kchakan chke, june' k'ot kchakanwa' ukojb'al.
Jla'k'ut kojb'al, wa k'otnaq chak chpa' k'utenwa', jn kojb'ale' kamnaq prechwa'.
Pumul wa jnaq kub'ijna: "At' k'o akojb'al, en k'o enchak," k'utu' b'alaq akojb'al chinwach chir k'ot achak chpam. Ruk'ut en kink'ut enkojb'al chawach chir k'uten rimal enchak.
At kakojo chir Qajwal Dios xa' jun, utz ka'no, xoq'je' tzeltaq santil kikojo chir Qajwal Dios xa' jun, xoq'je' kib'irb'i'ten chwach.
¿Pumul kawaj kawet'maj at wnaq chir k'ot ano'oj, chir jn kojb'al chir k'ot chak chpam, jun kojb'ale' kamnaq?
¿Wa suk'b'a'x tuk'ut rimal Qajwal Dios uk'aslemal Abraham chir qaqaw jertaq tzij, rimal uchak, re'chir xujit uparxik uk'ijol Isaac chu' altar chwach Qajwal Dios?
Wla' k'ut chir ukojb'al Abraham xa' janam xkik'lajij kib' ruk' uchak, xoq'je' ukojb'al xtz'aqat ruk' uchak.
Xb'antaj k'ut chpa' kub'ij tyox wuj: "Xkojen Abraham che Qaqjaw, rimal ukojb'al xb'an suk' che uk'aslemal," xoq'je' xok che jn k'isik' rech Dios.
Chiwula' k'ut naq wnaq xoq'je' rimal uchak ksuk'b'a'x uk'aslemal rimal Dios, xo'wt rimal ukojb'al.

Jla' xoq'je' Rahab jn xaq chir kmaken chirij tyo'jil kuk' sub'laj chijab', ¿wa suk'b'a'x tuk'ut uk'aslemal rimal Qajwal Dios rimal uchak re'chir xyuk'uluj ajya'l wach, xoq'je' xyutaqb'ik che jnchik b'ej?
Mpa' jla' chpa' tyo'jil chirwa k'ot santil ruk', jun tyo'jil la' kamnaq, jla' xoq'je' kojb'al wa k'ot chak chpam, jn kojb'al la' kamnaq.
Ix wixlal, mikije' sub'laj ajtyojnel chixo'l, mpa' qet'am chir naq kityojnek nimna q'atajtzij kb'an pikiwi' ire'.
Mpa' qanejel che k'iy qojmakenwa', wa k'o jnaq chir kmakent chirij uyoloj jn wnaqe' suk' uk'aslemal xoq'je' kownel chuje'k'ik nejel utyo'jil.
Chiwlamuch oj qakoj jek'b'al ch'ich' pkichi' kyej rech qoj kinimajwa' rech qajek' nejel kikuerp.
Xoq'je' chiwula' ch'ich' chir kib'in puwi' mar, tne' sub'laj inimaq, xoq'je' kich'ikmix rimal nimaqtaq kiq'i', pumul kijek' rimal jn ch'iti'n tumun, kib'ek'ut tla' chpa' krajwa' ajsutel rech.
Jla' xoq'je' qaq', k'al ch'iti'n uk'laj qakuerp pumul kuq'aq'b'ej rib' ruk' nimaqtaq chpa'kux, xoq'je' chiwula' jn k'al uxu'm q'a' chir kowan chuparxik jn nimlaj k'eche'laj.

Xoq'je' qaq' janam chpa' q'a sub'laj mak k'o chpam. Re'k'ut chir k'o chikixo'l nejel chaqap rech qakuerp. Re'k'ut chir kub'an k'ax che nejel qakuerp. Xoq'je' kuk'at nejel chpa'kux rech uwach lew xoq'je' re' kparex rimal uq'a' k'ixk'ol.
Mpa' nejel kiwach che tzeltaq awaj, xoq'je' chokop chir k'o kixik' xoq'je' tzeltaq kmatz xoq'je' awaj chir ik'o pe mar, kinejel ire' ik'o xe' kiq'atb'altzij chijab', ire' kijekew kech.
Pumul k'otnaq wnaq kowen chuje'k'ik raq', jn k'axla' kot jnaq kejek'ew rech, chir najnaq che tzel kumb'al chir kamsenek.
Ruk qaq' qanimersajwa' ub'i' Qajwal Dios chir Qajawxel, xoq'je' ruk' qaq' qaya' mixq'ab' pikiwi' wnaq chir ib'onom chpa' uk'ayb'al Qajwal Dios.
Ruk' xa' jun che qachi' qoj tewchi'nek xoq'je' ruk' qachi' prechwa' qaya' mixq'ab'. Ix wixlal, kumajta chir jla' qa'no.
¿Wa k'ok'ut naq alxel ja' kuya' ki'laj ja' xoq'je' kuya' k'aylaj ja'?
Ix wixlal, ¿wa kowen k'ut jn uche'al wikix kuya' q'anum, re' lewa' jn uche'al uva kuya' wikix? Xoq'je' k'otnaq ajxel ja' kuya' tzaylaj ja' xoq'je' kuya' ki'laj ja'.
¿Naq k'o chixo'l chir k'o nimaqtaq nojb'al ruk' xoq'je' sak'al uwi'? Chuk'utu'b'la' uchak ruk' jn utzlaj k'aslemal pe jn nimlaj nojb'al rech jn nimlaj anme'.
Pumul wa k'o k'aylaj celosil xoq'je' k'o ch'ojb'al piwanme', minimersaj iwib' xoq'je' mixjo'sen chirij jn saqlaj tzij.
Mpa' jn nimlaj no'jb'ale' je't penaq ruk' Dios pkaj, xa'ne' xa' rech uwach lew, xa'ne' je petnaq pkichomb'al wnaq xoq'je' rech tzel.
Mpa' chpa' k'owa' celosil ch'il ch'ojb'al, tla' k'o sachb'al k'u'x, xoq'je' tla' k'o tzeltaq chak.

Pumul naq chir k'o jn nimlaj chomb'al kuk' chir kpe pkaj, nab'e ch'ajch'oj, ajtzukel rech jn loq'laj uxumb'al, ch'uch'uj, ch'ul ranme', najnaq che k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, jla' chpa' naq che' chir kwachnek xoq'je' re' najnaq che utzlajtaq uwach, k'o saqlaj tzij ruk' kyeb't (2) uplaj.
Ruk'ut uwach jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij je ktik pe jn uxunem rech anme' chke ni'j chir kib'an jn uxunem rech anme'.
¿Jalchi' kipewa' ni'j nimaqtaq ch'oj ch'il ni'j ch'ojb'al chir k'o chixo'l ix? ¿Je't k'ut kipe ruk' tzeltaq iriyb'al chir kich'ojen pityo'jil?

Sub'laj kirij chpa'kux pumul kixkont churaqik, kib'an kamek xoq'je' kixjuluw rimal kontrenik pumul kixkont churaqik chir kux kiwaj, kixch'ojnek xoq'je' kikoj ichoq'ab', pumul k'ot iwuk' chir kux kiwaj, mpa' kita't che Qajwal Dios.
Kito'o pumul ko'pent iwuk' mpa' utzt uta'ik ki'no, mpa' kito'o xa' rech kisech che iriyb'al.

Ix wnaq chir ix makennaq chirij k'le'b'al. ¿Iwet'am tuk'ut ix chir jn k'isik' ruk' uwach lew qab'an ajch'oj ruk' Dios? Rechi' naqpla' kub'an jn k'isik' ruk' uwach lew kukoj rib' che ajch'oj rech Qajwal Dios.
¿Kichomaj lewa' ix chir tyox wuj xa' jo'sb'al kub'ij: "Jn Loq'laj Santil chir xuya' Qajwal Dios chpam qak'aslemal sub'laj qojraj ruk' celosil?"
Pumul Qajwal Dios kuya' sub'laj ritzil ranme', rechi' kub'ij chpam tyox wuj: "Dios kuk'le'laj kiwach naq chir itak ruk' kino'jb'al, pumul kuya' ritzil ranme' chke naq chir kib'an ch'iti'n che kib'."
Chijacha' iwib' puq'ab' Qajwal Dios, chikojo' ichoq'ab'. Chiq'atuj uwach jn tzel, ruk'ut jn tzel kranij rib' chiwach.

Kix qetaq ruk' Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' Qajwal Dios qetna iwuk', ajmakib' chiya' knaq ub'anik jn tzel ichak chpa' jnaq chir kuch'aj uq'ab' xoq'je' ix chir kyeb' (2) ub'onom iwanme', chib'ana' ch'ajch'oj che iwanme'.
Kix oq'aq xoq'je' q'axwaq iwanme' xoq'je' chik'ama' uq'ab'il ipowril, xoq'je' itze'j uk'exa' rib' che q'ej, xoq'je' iki'ktemal uk'exa' rib' che b'is.
Chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib' chwach Qajwal Dios, ruk'ut re' nim kxuya'wana.

Ix wixlal, xa' mixjek'chi'n chiwach. Naqpla' chir kjek'chi'n chirij rixlal xoq'je' kuq'at tzij puwi' rixlal, chirij pixab' kjekchi'nwa', xoq'je' chirij pixab' kuq'atwa' tzij, pumul wa at kaq'at tzij chirij pixab', at te'chik ajb'anal rech chir kux kub'ij pixab' xa'ne' atchik ajq'atal tzij chirij pixab'.
Xa' Jun xyaw pixab', Re'k'ut xoq'je' ajq'atal tzij chir kuya' soltejem xoq'je' Re' kresaj k'aslemal, pumul at, ¿naq at rechwa' kaq'at tzij puwi' jnchik unaq?
Jo' b'la' chinime', ix, chir kib'ij: "Poq'ij, ch'il chwaq' qojb'e che jn tilimit, jn janab' k'ut qoj kije' tla', qoj k'ayen tla' rechwa' qach'ak qapwaq."
Chir iwet'amta kux ub'onom ik'aslemal chwaq', mpa' qatzij chir ik'aslemal xa' janam chpa' jn sutz' chir xa'qe'n k'utnek, pa'nimk'ut ksachek.
Puk'exwach ri', jri' chib'ij: "Wa Qajwal Dios, kraj kuya' qak'aslemal, qab'anna june' re' lewa' qab'an jnchik la'."
Pumul ix chinime' nim kiya'wa' iwib' rimal jn nimal, nejel nimal mak re'.
Naq chir ret'am ub'anik utzil pumul kub'anta, kmak nek.
Chinime' chita' ix naq chir k'o imib'i'l, kixoq'aq, kix sik'naq chirij ni'j chq'ij mlaya chir petnaq piwi'.
Xq'ay imib'i'l, xoq'je' iq'u' k'uxumchik rimal yo'x.
Xixaqeb' iq'an pwaq ch'il isaq pwaq, ruk'ut jn uxaqil la' kch'anna chiwij xoq'je' re' kutijna iti'jal chpa' kub'an q'a'. Chir ximuluj mib'i'l che ni'j uk'isb'al taq qije'.
Chita'much sub'laj ksik'en rijil kiq'ij mokom chir kichakim itikomb'al chir ix xa' ruk' sokb'al itojomta, ruk'ut kisik' naq chir kimolom uwach itiko'n xo'pen puxikin Qajwal Dios chir k'o pkaj.
Wral chwach lew ix xiya' che ityo'jil kuxpla' xraj xoq'je' xitzqapsaj iwib' chub'anik kuxpla' xiwaj. Xoq'je' xichomersaj iwanme' chpa' naq wakix chir ko'pen uq'ijal ukamsesik.
Xitzaq xe' mak, xoq'je' xikamsaj jun chir suk' uk'aslemal. Ruk'ut Re' xukojt uch'oq'ab'.

Rechi' chir, ix wixlal, k'olaq kuyb'ul ik'u'x suk'te' che upetb'al Qajwal Jesús. Chiwula' jn ajb'anal tiko'n chir kriyi'ej uwach utiko'n rech uwach lew chir k'otchik k'owa', ruk' kuyb'ul k'u'x kriyi'ej jan ko'pen q'alaj.
Jla' xoq'je' ix k'olaqb'la' kuyb'ul ik'u'x, xoq'je' chikub'a' iwanme', mpa' upetb'al Qajwal Jesús tijen qetlaq.
Ix wixlal, xa' miq'aq'b'e tzij chiwij rechwa' kixya't xe' mak chiwula' ajq'atal tzij k'ochik chwach uchi' ja'.
Ix wixlal, chiwesaj ino'jb'al chirij jn q'oxmal anme' xoq'je' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x kech ajq'axal uyoloj Dios chir xich'a'w pub'i' Qajwal Dios.

Qatzij qab'ij oj, chir sub'laj utz kech naqpla' chir kitij k'ax. Ito'om uyolik ix jn kuyb'ul uk'u'x Job, xoq'je' xiwil ix re'chir xk'isb'enek kux xya' che rimal Qaqjaw. Mpa' Qaqjaw nim k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x xoq'je' kowt ranme'.
Pumul chita'much ix wixlal mik'am pnaq kaj xoq'je' mik'am pnaq uwach lew xoq'je' mik'am pnaq jnaq chik. Xa'ne' chirwa jla', jla', wa jla'ta, jla'ta, rechwa' kixqajt xe' mak.
¿Wa k'o jnaq chixo'l ix chir q'axaw ranme'? Ub'ana' uch'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios. ¿Wa k'o jnaq ki'ktem uk'u'x? Chub'ixaj ub'i' Qaqjaw.
¿Wa k'o jnaq yab' chixo'l? Chusik'ij ajwab' kech jun puq che ajkojnel, rechwa' kich'a'w ruk' Qajwal Dios puwi', xoq'je' kimaj knaq ruk' aceite pub'i' Qajwal Jesús.
Ruk'ut jn ch'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios chir kb'ix ruk' kojb'al kusol jn yab', kwa'lses k'ut rimal Qajwal Dios, wa k'o mak ub'onom kuytaj knaq rimal Qaqjaw.
Chikira' imak chiwach, xoq'je' kixch'awaq ruk' Qajwal Dios piwi' ix rechwa' kixkuntajwa'. Jn uch'awem ruk' Dios jun chir suk' uk'aslemal sub'laj k'o ukownem.
Elías, re' xa' wnaq janam ub'anik chpa' oj, ruk'ut chir xch'a'w ruk' Qajwal Dios ruk' nejel ranme' rech kpetwa' jab', xqaj te'chik jab' che xub' (3) janab' ruk' waqib' (6) ik'.
Xch'a'w k'ut jumulchik Elías ruk' Qajwal Dios, ruk'ut kaj xutaqlaq jab', ruk'ut uwach lew xuya' uwach.
Ix wixlal wa k'o jnaq chixo'l chir xuya' knaq jn saqlaj tzij, pumul k'o jnaq chir kub'an che ktzalajlaq.
Chiwet'maj ix, jnaq chir kub'an che naq ajmak uya'ik knaq jn k'axlaj b'ej, kusol ranme' naq wnaq che kamikal, xoq'je' kub'ono chir sub'laj che umak kuytaj knaq.

En Pedro, Apóstol rech Jesucristo, kintz'ib'aj b'ik jn wuje' chiw, ix chir xixe'sb'i'k ptaq ijuyb'al, chir ix jub'urnaq pujuyb'al Ponto, pujuyb'al Galacia, pujuyb'al Capadocia, pujuyb'al Asia, pujuyb'al Bitinia.

Ix, chir ix cho'om knaq rimal Dios Qajawxel, xraj Re' xub'an utzil chiw rimal Loq'laj Usantil, rechwa' kiya' iwib' ptaqik xoq'je' kch'aj iwanme' ruk' ukik'el Jesucristo. Kiyaqb'la' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' pik'aslemal.

Qanimersaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios chir Uqaw Qajwal Jesucristo, mpa' rimal k'axb'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chqe oj, xub'an chqe chir xojk'ise' jumulchik rimal uk'astajb'al Jesucristo chikixo'l kamnaqib', re' ri' chir kuya' jn k'aslek ukub'ul k'u'x chqe.
Rech jn echb'al chir ksacht uwach, xoq'je' ktz'ilib'ta, xoq'je' kmayerta uwach chir Qajwal Dios ukolom chiw pkaj.
Chir ix kolom rimal nimlaj ukownem Qajwal Dios rimal ikojb'al, rechwa' kiraq jn solb'alib', chir b'onomchik ukiji'k rechwa' k'uten ptaq janab' chqawach.
Rmalk'ut ri', sub'laj kixki'ket ix chinime', tne' xa' rech kyeb'xub' q'ij, wa rajwixik kiq'axajna sub'laj che pajb'al.

Rech chirwa xok ikojb'al chpam pajb'al sub'laj utzna rilik chwach q'an pwaq, re'k'ut chir xa' q'axel, pumul ruk' q'a' kpajwa'. Jla'k'ut k'utenwa' ik'ojb'al, kraqtaj chpam b'ixnik, xoq'je' chpam jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' chpam jn mejb'elib' re'chir k'uten Jesucristo.
Re'k'ut Jesucristo, chir loq' kiwulo tne' iwulomt uwach, xoq'je' chirij Re' ixkojennaq, tne' kiwilt uwach chinime', kixki'ket ruk' jn nimlaj ki'kte'mal rech jn unimal q'ij, chir kraqtajt ub'ixik.
Chik'ama' chir kux kutaqej ikojb'al, re'k'ut jn solb'alib' rech iwanme'. Mpa' ix tijen kik'omo chir kux utaqem ikojb'al, re'k'ut solb'alib' iwib'.
Ajq'axal uyoloj Qajwal Dios, chir xkiq'axaj jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' chir toqomlaq ub'ixik chiw, xkib'ank'ut jn utzlaj utzukxik, xoq'je' jn utzlaj uta'tb'exik chirij jn solb'alib'la'.

Xkib'an k'ut jn utzlaj rilik, chirij naq che wnaq, xoq'je' naq che q'ij, xoq'je' naq che janab', chir kub'ij usantil Cristo chir k'o kuk' ire', re'k'ut jn santil la' chir k'o kuk', xunab'ajsaj ub'ixik chke chir kux che q'oxmal kuq'axajna Cristo, xoq'je' xuna'b'ajsaj ub'ixik chke, chirij ni'j unimal q'ij chir kipena chirij ni'j q'oxomla'.

Xq'aljenses k'ut chikiwach ire', chir kext ire', xa'ne' qech oj, chir kux xichakan ire' chirij, re'k'ut chir kiq'aljansaj naq chir tijen kiya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo chiw ix, rimal Loq'laj Santil chir toqomlaq pkaj. Re'k'ut ri' chir utaqo'n kaj sub'laj kaj rilik.
Rechi' chir, chikojo' jn utzlaj nojb'al, chijek'a' iwib' piwechwa', chiya' nejel ukub'ul ik'u'x chirij jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios chir k'amlaq chiw, re'chir Jesucristo k'uten jumulchik.
Chpa' alk'wa'lxel chir kiya' kib' ptaq'ek, mib'an chik ni'j mak chir xib'an jer, re'chir maja' kich'ob' uwach Qajwal Dios.
Xa'ne' jun chir xix'usik'ij, Re' tyox uk'aslemal, ix xoq'je' chib'ana' tyox che nejel kux kib'an pik'aslemal xoq'je' kixkojo'q chpam jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal.
Mpa tyox wuj kub'ij: Chib'ana' tyox che ik'aslemal mpa' En tyox Enk'aslemal.
Wa ix kib'ij, At Qaqaw, kixcha' che jun chir xa' janam kuq'at tzij pikiwi' wnaq ptaq kijujnal, chpa' kichak kib'onom, kixb'inaqb'la' ruk' nab'alib' chwach Qajwal Dios nejeltaq q'ij rech ik'aslemal.
Iwet'am ix, re'chir xixtortaj che jn k'axlaj k'aslemal, chir ik'omomlaq kuk' ichuch iqaw, xixtorek, ruk't chpa'kux chir xa' iq'axel chpa' saq pwaq ch'il q'an pwaq.
Xa'ne' xixtor ruk' loq'laj ukik'el Cristo chpa' naq k'ijol kirnere chir k'ot tz'il chirij, xoq'je' k'ot mak ub'onom.
Cristo Re'k'ut chir xcha'laq xe'taq ktiktaj uwach lew, pumul xoq'je' xq'aljenses che uk'isb'altaq q'ij xa' rimal iloq'xik.

Rimal k'ut Cristo chir ix kikoj rech Dios, Re'k'ut Dios chir xuwa'lsaj Cristo chikixo'l kamnaq'ib', xoq'je' xuya' unimal uq'ij, xoq'je' rechwa' chir ikojb'al, ch'il ukub'ul ik'u'x kiya' chirij Qajwal Dios.

Isaqapsam chik iwanme' ix chinime', rimal chir xiya' iwib' ptaqik che jn saqlaj tzij, rimal Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios, rech jn loq'b'al k'u'x kech alxik, chir k'ot jo'sb'al chpam, chiloq'oj b'la' iwib' chiwach ruk' jn ch'ajlaj anme'.
Mpa' ix xixk'ise' jumulchik, pumul re't jn k'ise'b'al chir petnaq kuk' ichuch iqaw chir k'o kamikal chpam, xa'ne' xixk'ise' chirij utzij Qajwal Dios chir k'aslek mijumul ksach uwach.
Mpa, "Nejel wnaq xa' janam kib'anik chpa' chaj, xoq'je' nejel unimal uq'ij naq chij xa' janam chpa' ukotz'e'jal chaj. Kcheqej jn chaj, xoq'je' kpuqlaq ukotz'e'jal.
Pumul uyoloj Qajwal Dios, re' xa' jun k'owa' mijumul ksach uwach." Re'k'ut ri' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xya' ub'ixik chiw jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.

Rechi', chiya' knaq ub'anik nejel tzeltaq chomnik, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ub'ixik nejel jo'sb'al tzij, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ub'anik kyeb' (2) che iplaj, xoq'je' chiya' knaq nejel kontrenik, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ub'anik tzij chikij iwijil itz'aq'at.
Chpa' kib'an taq ne' chir te' kik'ise'k, re' kitzukuj kitu', jla' xoq'je' chib'ana' ix, re' chiriyij jn tu' chir yujtelt uwach, re'k'ut uyoloj Qajwal Dios, rimalk'ut re' kixk'iyek rech jn soltejem,
chirwa' utz xina' jn nimlaj oq'osil ranme' Qajwal Jesús.
Kixqetaq ruk' Qajwal Jesucristo, jn k'aslek b'aj chir xtoq' pnaq jla' kimal chijab', pumul chwach Qajwal Dios, Re' cho'omlaj b'aj, xoq'je' k'otchik k'owalaj b'aj chir paqal rijil.
Xoq'je' ix, ix chpa' k'aslek b'aj, jn loq'laj richoj Santil, rech jn tyoxlaj nimnek rech loq'laj jaj, rechwa' kijit nimnek chwach Qajwal Dios rimal Jesucristo.
Mpa' kub'ij tyox wuj: "¡Chiwula'much! Kinya' pe tilimit Sión, jn b'aj chir nim ub'anik rech utz'u'k tz'aq', chir cha'telek xoq'je' k'otchik k'owa'. Naq kukoj rech, mijumul kya'na chpam k'ixb'al."

Rechi' chiw ix chir kikojo, jn b'ajla' k'otchik k'owa'. Pumul naq chir kikojenta, kb'antejek chpa' kub'ij tyox wuj: "Jn b'aj chir xtzaq pnaq jla' kimal ajb'anal tz'aq', Re'k'ut Jesucristo, Re'k'ut chir nim ub'anik, rech jn utz'u'k tz'aq'."
Xoq'je', "B'aj chir kb'an tzaqem chirij, xoq'je' nimlaj b'aj chir ktzaqnek," mpa' kitzaq chirij uyoloj Qajwal Dios, mpa' kiya't kib' ptaqik, mpa' re' kichak ipetnaq.

Pumul ix, ix wnaq chir ix cha'telek, xoq'je' ix ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir kinimaj nimlaj ajtaqnel, xoq'je' ix jn tyoxlaj tilimit amaq', tilimit chir loq'om rimal Qajwal Dios, rechwa' kiya' ub'ixik ritzil uk'u'x ranme' jun, chir xixresajlaq chpam qu'mal, xixk'un uya' chpa' k'owa' usaqil chir mayjab'al.
Ix chir jer, ixt utilimit Dios, pumul chinime' ixchik utilimit Qajwal Dios. Xoq'je' ix nab'e knaq iroqomt jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chiw. Pumul chinime' k'ochik iwuk'.

Ix wixlal, chir loq' kixwilo, kinta' jn toq'ob' chiw, chpa' wnaq chir kipe che naj tilimit, xoq'je' chpa' wnaq chir i'aj q'atnel, chiq'atuj ni'j uriyb'al ityo'jil, re'k'ut ni'j riyb'al la' chir kich'ojon ruk' isantil.

Chib'ana' utzil chikixo'l wnaq chir it ajtilimit Israel. Rechwa' chir nij wnaq chir kib'ij chir ix, ix ritzlal taq wnaq, kilk'ut ichak chir sub'laj utz, kinimersaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios re'chir Re' kpe chuq'atik tzij.
Xa' rimal Qajwal Dios, Chiya' iwib' ptaqik chke q'atb'altzij rech uwach lew, che nimlaj ajtaqnel, mpa' re' nim reqle'n.
Xoq'je' chiya' iwib' ptaqik chke ukab'taq q'atb'altzij chir itoqomlaq rimal nimlaj ajtaqnel rechwa' kib'an kiq'atb'altzij pikiwi' ajb'analtaq k'ax, xoq'je' kinimersaj kiq'ij naq chir kib'an utzil.
Mpa' re' ri' kraj Qajwal Dios chir kb'anek, chir kb'an utzil rechwa' kitz'apij kichi' wnaq chir itak ruk' kichomb'al, chir k'ot ket'am.
Chik'utu' chir ix, ix tzqaptelchik, pumul rexta chir ixtzqaptelchik kib'an mak, xa'ne' chpa' kumaj che naq jaqlel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios.
Nimb'la' chiya'wa kinejel, xoq'je' chiloq'oj iwib' iwenejel chiwach china'nb'e iwib' chwach Qajwal Dios. Nim chiya'wa jn nimlaj ajtaqnel.
Ix jaqlel ajnimnel, chiya' iwib' ptaqik kuk' iwajaw, ruk' nejel mejb'alib' xo'wt kuk' ni'j chir utz kino'oj xoq'je' ch'uch'uj kanme', xoq'je' kuk' ni'j chir sub'laj ik'a'n.
Mpa' re' ri' qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, chir qach'ij naq k'ax chir ojt qatzukum.
¿Mpa' kux che unimal q'ij kik'omo chirwa ix, kixch'ayek xa' rimal chir ix ajb'anal k'ax? Xoq'je' kich'ijo. Pumul wa rimal ub'anik utzil kitij k'ax, xoq'je' kich'ijo, re' ri', chir k'amer chwach Dios.
Mpa' rimal ri' chir xixsik'ix rimal Dios mpa' xoq'je' Qajwal Jesucristo xutij k'ax qamal oj, xuya' knaq jn k'amb'al no'oj chqe rechwa' qataqej retal raqan.
Cristo k'ot naq mak xu'no, xoq'je' k'otnaq sokb'al tzij xel laq chuchi'.

Cristo xya' mixq'ab' puwi', pumul Re' ruk't mixq'ab' xuk'ulb'a' kiwach, re'chir tijen kuq'axaj q'oxom, k'ot Re' xuyaj wnaq ruk' xib'nek, xa'ne' kujach kimak puq'ab' Jun chir kuq'at tzij ruk' suk'laj q'atb'altzij.

Re'k'ut Cristo chir xreqaj qamak ruk' utyo'jil, chwach cruz, rechwa' chir oj, oj kamnaqchik chwach mak, pumul ojk'asel chub'anik chir kux suk' chwach Dios. Rimalk'ut usoktajnaq Cristo chir xixkunexwa' ix.
Mpa' ix nab'e knaq, kixb'inek chpa' kirnere chir k'ot ajyuq'el kech, isachnaq. Pumul chinime' xixtzalajlaq ruk' Cristo Re'k'ut ajyuq' xoq'je' ajsaqel iwanme'.
Jla' xoq'je' ix k'le'naq taq ixiqib', chiya' iwib' ptaqik che iwichijil. Rechwa' chir naq kikojomt uyoloj Qajwal Dios, rajwixikta k'o kb'ix chke, kich'ak k'ut xa' rimal jn utzlaj kino'jb'al kixiqil.
Kilk'ut ire' ino'jb'al chir saqlo'loj, xoq'je' k'o mejb'elib' chpam.
Jn uweqik iwib' ix, re't jn weqb'al chir q'aljenek, chpa' jn pich'nik wi' chir xujalchik kb'anche, xoq'je' jn weqb'al ruk' q'an pwaq, ruk' lewa' k'ul chir paqal rijil.

Xa'ne' qas weqb'al iwib' ix, je' k'o piwanme', jn weqb'al la' kub'ant k'ax. Rech jn santil chir chu'lek xoq'je' k'o loq'laj uxumb'al chpam. Re' jn weqb'al la' chir sub'laj nim ub'anik chwach Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' xoq'je' jla' kiweqik kib' xkib'an tyoxtaq ixiqib' jertaq tzij, ire' xkikub'a' kik'u'x chirij Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' xkiya' kib' ptaqik chke kichijil.
Chpa' Sara chir xuya' rib' ptaqik che Abraham, re'chir kuch'ab'ej, tat cha'che, ruk'ut ix, ix ral knaq Sara chirwa kib'an utzil, xoq'je' k'ot nab'alib' kije' pik'aslemal.

Ix k'le'naq taq chijab', chib'ana' utzil kuk' iwixiqil, nim chiya'wa iwixiqil, mpa' ire' janam kib'anik chpa' naq k'olb'al chir kowta, nimb'la' chiya'wa', mpa' xoq'je' ire' ijun chrechb'exik jn loq'laj ritzil anme' rech jn k'aslemal, rechwa' k'ot q'aten ich'awem chwach Qajwal Dios.
Uk'isb'al tzij, xa' jun chib'ana' che uriyb'al iwanme' iwenejel, chiloq'oj iwib' chiwach ruk' jn loq'b'al k'u'x kech alxik, k'axk'ab'aq ik'u'x chiwach, xoq'je' chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib'.
Mitzilij uwach naq k'ax chir kb'an chiw, xoq'je' mitzaq mixq'ab' puwi' jnaq chir kutzaq mixq'ab' piwi'. Xa'ne' kixtewchi'naq, mpa' iwet'am chir Qajwal Dios xixusik'ij rechwa' kiwechb'ej tewchi'nik.
Mpa', "naq kraj kuloq'oj uk'aslemal xoq'je' kraj kuq'axaj utzlaj taq q'ij, ujek'a' raq', mub'ij, k'axlajtaq yoloj, xoq'je' ujek'a' uchi' chub'ixik, jo'sb'al tzij.
Chutoso' rib' che k'ax, re' chub'ana' utzil. Chutzukuj jn uxunem rech anme', xoq'je' tarjaq chirij.
Mpa' Qajwal Dios, re' k'utuyuj naq suk' kik'aslemal, xoq'je', kuta' kich'awem, pumul k'o uk'anal, pikiwi' ni'j chir kib'an k'ax."
¿Naq kowan chub'anik k'ax chiw ix, chirwa ix re' kitzukuj ub'anik utzil?
Pumul wa rimal ub'anik jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij kitij k'ax, k'otchik k'owa' iwech. Mub'an k'ax iwanme', xoq'je' mixij iwib' chikiwach ire'.

Xa'ne' chinimersaj ub'i' Jesucristo chir Qaqjaw ptaq iwanme', xoq'je' kub'lek chib'ana' ikiji'k rechwa' k'o iyoloj re'chir kib'ij to'b'al iwib', ruk' nimlaj anme', xoq'je' mejb'alib' che naq chir kuta' chiw chirij jn ukub'ul k'u'x chir k'o iwuk'.
Xoq'je' ruk' jn ch'ajlaj anme' rechwa' chir naq kijuluj tzij chiwij, kpe kik'ix rimal kiyoloj, naq chir kiyoq' jn utzlaj ino'jb'al chpa' ajkojnel chirij Cristo.
Mpa' utzna chir kitij k'ax rimal ub'anik utzil, chirwa jla' kraj rajwerem Qajwal Dios, chwach chir qatij k'ax rimal ub'anik k'ax.

Mpa' Cristo, xa' jumul xkam rimal qamak, jun chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios xkam pe kik'exwach naq chir suk't kik'aslemal, rechwa' qoj uk'amb'ik ruk' Qajwal Dios, qatzijk'ut chir xkam che utyo'jil, pumul k'asal pe santil.
Re'k'ut chir xye chub'ixik upixab' chke santil chir itz'aptel pche'.

Ire'k'ut ni'j chir xkiya't kib' ptaqik jertaq tzij ptaq uq'ij Noé, re'chir Qajwal Dios xye riyi'ej ruk' nejel kuyb'ul uk'u'x, re'chir Noé tijen kuweq jn arca, tla'k'ut chir xito'tajwa' waxqib' (8) che wnaq chu' ja' rimal Qajwal Dios.

Jn ja'la' xub'an ukexwach jn qasnik ja' chir rimal re' chinime' oj soltelchik rimal Qajwal Dios. Jn qasnik ja'la' rext jn ch'ajb'al ij, xa'ne' rech chir qojqeb' ruk' Qajwal Dios, ruk' jn saqlaj anme' rimal uk'astajb'al Qajwal Jesús chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
Re'k'ut chir xpeqe' pkaj, je k'ochik puse'b'al Qajwal Dios, xe' uq'atb'altzij Re', ik'owa' nejel utaqo'n Qajwal Dios chir ik'o pkaj, ch'il ni'jchik santil chir k'o q'atb'altzij ch'il choq'ab' kuk'.
Jla' chpa' Cristo chir xutij k'ax ruk' utyo'jil, ix xoq'je' chib'ana' jun che ichomb'al ruk' Re', chib'ana' ikiji'k rechwa' kich'ij k'ax, mpa' jun chir xutij k'ax ruk' utyo'jil, xusach uwach mak.
Rechwa' chir che nejel ik'aslemal kib'an te'chik chpa' kraj ityo'jil, re' ki'no chir kux k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.

Chiya' knaq ni'j makla' tla', sub'laj jerchik chir jri' kib'an ix, chub'anik chir kux qaj chikiwach wnaq chir it ajtilimit Israel, jn b'inem chpam tzeltaq mak rech tyo'jil, xoq'je' chpam tzeltaq riyb'al, xoq'je' chpam q'ab'rek, xoq'je' chpam nimaqtaq wi'im, nejel chir kux kik'is iwib' chpam, xoq'je' chpam tzeltaq kinimxik wochb'al.
Ktzaq kik'u'x ire' chinime' chir kixb'in te'chik ix kuk' ire' chub'anik k'axlajtaq b'onoj, xoq'je' sub'laj k'ax kina' chiw.
Pumul ire' kijachna rixmal kichak chwach jun chir ub'onom ukiji'k rech kuq'at tzij pikiwi' wnaq chir ik'aslek xoq'je' kuq'at tzij pikiwi' wnaq chir ikamnaqchik.

Mpa' rimal ri' chir xoq'je' chke kamnaqib' xya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo rechwa' q'atna tzij chikij chpam tyo'jil chpa' kichomb'al chijab', pumul kik'ise' chpam santil chpa' uno'jb'al Qajwal Dios.
Pumul tijen qetlaq k'isb'al rech nejel, rechi' chikojo' jn saqlaj chomb'al, xoq'je' kixchajnaq chpam jn ich'awem chwach Dios.
Suk' re' nab'e chiloq'oj iwib' chiwach, mpa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x kukuy sub'laj mak.
Chiya' iwarb'al chiwach, ruk't jikchi'nem.
Ptaq ijujnal chib'ana' ichak chikixo'l ni'jchik, chpa' jn tyoxlaj sip chir xya' chiw rimal Qajwal Dios, kixchaknaq chirij chpa' utzlajtaq ajchakib' rech jn nimlaj loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios.

Wa k'o jnaq kuya' ub'ixik uyoloj Qajwal Dios, chuk'utu' chpa' uyoloj Qajwal Dios, wa k'o jnaq kchakan chirij kinimxik ni'jchik nimnaqb'la chpa' loq'laj kownem chir yo'om che rimal Qajwal Dios, rechwa' chir che nejel knimerses ub'i' Qajwal Dios pub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo, re'k'ut Re' rajaw jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' rech Re' jn loq'laj taqnik chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
Ix wixlal chir loq' kixwilo, mat' ktzaq ik'u'x chirij jn q'a' rech pajb'al iwech chir tijen ko'pen iwuk', kawulpa' naq mayjab'al.
Xa'ne' kixki'ktaq mpa' ix, ixchik jun, ruk' uq'oxmal Cristo, rechwa' chir xoq'je' kixnaj che ki'kte'mal re'chir k'utun unimal uq'ij.

K'otchik k'owa' iwech chirwa xa' rimal ub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo kixyoq' kimal wnaq, mpa' jn santil rech unimal q'ij rech Qajwal Dios k'o piwi' ix, qatzijk'ut chir ire' kib'ij wastaq tzij che Jesús, pumul ix kiya' unimal uq'ij Jesús.
Xa'k'ut jla' chir mat' k'o jnaq chiw ix kutij k'ax xa' rimal chir aj kamsenel, elq'om lewa', aj b'anal k'ax lewa', rimal lewa' chir nejel kuminwa' rib' kuk' ni'jchik wnaq.
Pumul wa k'o jnaq kutij k'ax xa' rimal chir kojennaq chirij Cristo mik'ixek, xa'ne' chunimirsaj uq'ij Qajwal Dios, pub'i' Cristo.

Mpa' xo'pen uq'ijal chir jn q'atajtzij rech Qajwal Dios je' kmajtaj kuk' naq chir ik'o prichoj Dios. Wa jn q'ataj tzij je' kmajtaj quk' oj, ¿jalchilo kib'e kisaqwa' ni'j chir kiya't kib' ptaqik che jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Dios?
"Wa jun chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios kutij k'ax churaqik jn solb'alib', ¿ruk'ut jun chir ritzlal wnaq, jalchi'lo k'utenwa' chi', xoq'je' jun chir ajmak jalchilo k'e wab'aqwa' chi'?"
Xa'k'ut jla' naq kitij k'ax chpa' rajwerem Qajwal Dios, kib'ana' utzil, xoq'je' kiya' kanme' puq'ab' Qajwal Dios, chir tikiwnaq qech, mpa' Re' suk' ranme'.

Kinta' jn toq'ob' chke tata'ib' chir ik'o chixo'l. Xoq'je' en, enchik tata' chpa' ire' xoq'je' k'o chinwach kux che k'ax xuq'axaj Cristo, xoq'je' en, en jun kuk' ire' che jn unimal q'ij chir k'utenna.

Chiyuq'uj utilimit Qajwal Dios chir k'o chixo'l, chichijij, xata' chir xa' ix ch'ikmim chub'anik, xa'ne' chib'ana' ruk' nejel uk'uxlal, xoq'je' chib'ana' xa'ta chir kirij uch'akik pwaq chikij, xa'ne' chib'ana' ruk' nejel iwanme', pa'nim.
Xata' chir kib'anwa' iq'atb'altzij pikiwi' naq chir tijen kiyuq'uj, xa'ne' chiya' utzlajtaq k'utumb'al chikiwach.
Re'chir k'uten kajwal ajyuq', ix kik'amna jn corona chir ksaxt uwach rech jn unimal q'ij.

Xoq'je' ix elb'om, ix eltom, chiya' iwib' ptaqik chke tata'ib', xoq'je' chinimaj iwib' chiwach iwenejel, xoq'je' chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib', Mpa' "Qajwal Dios kuk'le'laj kiwach naq chir nim kiya'wa' kib', pumul kuya' loq'laj ritzil ranme' chke naq chir kib'an ch'iti'n che kib'."
Chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib' chixe' uq'ab' Qajwal Dios chir k'o nimlaj ukownem, rechwa' chir Re' nim kxuya'wa re'chir ko'pen uq'ijal.
Chiya' chirij Qajwal Dios nejel uq'oxmal iwanme', mpa' re' kok il iwuk'.
Saqb'aq ichomb'al, xoq'je' kixchajnaq, mpa' iwajch'oj ix, jn tzel, jla' ku'no chpa' jn koj chir koq'ek, kb'inek kusutuj iwij tijen kutzukuj naq kutijo.
¡Re'k'ut jn tzel la' chik'lelaj uwach! Xa' jun kixwab'wa' ruk' ikojb'al t'amt'el k'ut chir nejel iwixlal chir ik'o chwach lew, kiq'axaj ni'j nimaqtaq q'oxome'.

Pumul Qajwal Dios chir rajaw nejel loq'laj ritzil anme', xoj usik'ij chpam jn unimal q'ij chir k'istechik pub'i' Jesucristo, kitijna k'ax kyeb'xub' q'ij, pumul xo'w q'atan ri', re'k'ut Re' kub'an tzaq'at che ik'aslemal, xoq'je' kukub'a' ik'aslemal, xoq'je' kuya' ichoq'ab', xoq'je' kxujaqb'a' ruk' Jesucristo.
Rechk'ut Re' jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' jn nimlaj taqnem chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.

Re'k'ut Silvano chir k'o chqaxo'l kuk'amb'ik jn wuje' iwuk', jn qaxlale' chinwach en, suk' ukojb'al, xintz'ib'ajb'ik chiw kyeb'xub' yoloj, rechwa' kxinyajb'ik, xoq'je' kinq'aljansaj chiwach chir Re' ri' qasqatzij jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios chir ixk'o chpam.
Xoq'je' jn ch'ob' che qaxlal chir ik'o pe tilimit Babilonia, chir icho'om rimal Qajwal Dios, janam chpa' ix, ch'il enk'ijol Markos, kitaqb'ik ritzil iwach.
Chiya' ritzil iwach chiwach ruk' jn tz'ub'nik plaj rech loq'b'al k'u'x. Jn uxunem rech anme' iwuk' iwenejel naq chir ixk'o ruk' Jesucristo. B'antajaq b'la'.

En Simón Pedro, jaqlel ajnimnel xoq'je' Apóstol rech Jesucristo, kintz'i'b'aj jn wuje' chke naq chir xixkon churaqik rimal jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij rech Dios ch'il Qajwal Jesucristo, jn kojb'al chir k'otchik k'owa' chpa' qe'oj.
Nimraq chixo'l ix jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Dios ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' chirij kux iwet'am chirij Qajwal Dios xoq'je' chirij Qajwal Jesús.
Rimal loq'laj uchoq'ab' Qajwal Dios, uyo'om nejel chqe chir kchakan chqe chpam qak'aslemal, xa' rimal rit'maxik uwach jun chir xoj usik'ij rimal loq'laj unimal uq'ij ch'il nimaqtaq uchak.

Rmalk'ut ri' xuya' ni'j k'otchik k'owa' xoq'je' nimaqtaq jitenem chqe, rimal k'ut ri' chir ix jun che jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal, xoq'je' chir xiwanijlaq iwib' chikixo'l wnaq, chir ik'o chpam tzeltaq riyb'al.
Ix xoq'je' chikojo' nejel ichoq'ab', chiya'b'la' puwi' ikojb'al, jn loq'laj chak rech anme', puwi' jn loq'laj chak rech anme' chiya' jn etamb'al.
Puwi' jn etamb'al chiya' jn jek'b'al ib', puwi' jn jek'b'al ib' chiya' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x, puwi' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x chiya' jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal.
Puwi' jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal, chiya' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o chikixo'l alxik, puwi' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o chikixo'l alxik, chiya' jn loq'b'al k'u'x.
Mpa' wa ni'j ri' k'o iwuk' xoq'je' nimernaq chpam ik'aslemal, kuya't luwar chiw chir xa' kiqasaj q'ij, xoq'je' mat' kixwachnek chirij jn etamb'al chirij Qajwal Jesucristo.
Pumul naq chir k'ot ni'j ri' ruk', june' xa' naqaj ka'ywa', xoq'je' moy. Ksach che chir xch'aj uk'aslemal che jertaq umak.
Rimalk'ut ri' ix wixlal, Re' Qajwal Dios xuxusik'ij xoq'je' Re' xixucho'o, chijaqb'a' chpam ik'aslemal jn sik'nem ch'il jn cha'nek, mpa' wa jri' ki'no mijumul kixtzaqek.
Mpa wa jla' ki'no, sub'laj jamal ib'ej rech kxokwa' chpam jn nimlaj q'atb'altzij chir kistechik rech Qaqjaw, xoq'je' Ajsolel qech Jesucristo.
Rimal k'ut ri' kub'lek kinya't knaq una'texik chiw ni'j tyojnike', tne' ix iwet'amchik, xoq'je' chikub'a' iwib' chirij jn saqlaj tzij chir k'ut'um chiwach.
Mpa' qas suk' chinwach en, chir kxink'usuj ruk' yaj rimal chir enk'ona chpam enkuerp.
Mpa' wet'am chir xa' qe'nchik kraj kinya' knaq enkuerp, chpa' xuk'ut Qajwal Jesucristo chinwach.
Xoq'je' knok knaq il rech tne' enk'ot chik iwuk', kna'tajna chiw, nejel chir kux xink'ut chiwach.
Mpa' ruk't jo'sb'altaq tzij xqaya'wa' ub'ixik chiw jn nimlaj choq'ab' ch'il upetb'al Qajwal Jesucristo, xa'ne' mpa' oj xqil ruk' qab'aq'wach chir Re' nim ub'anik.

Re'chir Jesucristo xuk'am che Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' jn mejb'al ib', xtaqlaq che suk'te' pkaj chpa' k'owa' jn k'otchik k'owa'laj unimal q'ij, jn ch'a'wem chir kub'ij: Re' June' Enk'ijol chir kinloq'oj, sub'laj kinki'ket ruk' Re'.
Ruk'ut oj xqata' jn ch'a'wem la' chir petnaq pkaj re'chir ojk'o ruk' puwi' jn tyox jib'.

K'o quk' oj xoq'je' uyoloj Dios chir q'axam knaq, re'k'ut chir saqlaj tzij, rimalk'ut chir utz ki'no kiya' ixikin che, chpa' jn q'a' chir kusaqab'saj qu'mal suk'te' ksaqerna, xoq'je' kwa'lajna jn nimlaj ch'imil rech usaqarb'al rechwa' kusaqab'saj iwanme'.
Rajwixik kich'ob' ri' nab'e, chir k'otnaq uyoloj Dios chir tz'ib'tal knaq chpam tyox wuj chir kir uwach xa' ruk' kino'jb'al wnaq.
Mpa' jn na'tb'al xpeta xa' rimal uriyb'al naq wnaq, xa'ne' nejel chijab' rech Qajwal Dios xich'a'wek, Re' Loq'laj Santil xyaw rech chke chir kux kib'ij.

Pumul xikije' xoq'je' jo'slajtaq ajq'axal uyoloj Dios chikixo'l tilimit jertaq tzij, xoq'je' chixo'l ix kikije'na jo'slajtaq ajtyojnel chir kikojna po'wle'kil tzeltaq tyojnik chir k'o k'ax chpam, xoq'je' kixutuj knaq kikojb'al chirij Qaqjaw chir Re' solow kech che kimak. Tijenk'ut kitzukuj k'ax chikij chir kinab'ej te'chik kpe nimlaj k'ax pikiwi'.
Sub'laj ik'iy kitarajna chikij chub'anik tzeltaq mak, kimak ire' chir jn b'ej rech saqlaj tzij kya' chpam yoq'b'al tzij.
Rimal uriyxik sub'laj pwaq, xoq'je' ruk' jo'slajtaq yoloj kib'an k'ax chiw, ire'k'ut qajna nimlaj k'ax pikiwi', jerchik chir itzoqom xe' mak, ruk'ut jn tzaqel kech kpe cha'nim.
Mpa' wa Qajwal Dios xukuyt kimak utaqo'n kaj chir ximaknek, xa'ne' xyutzaq pk'ixk'ol, xyujach pche' rech qu'mal, ikolom tla' rech nimlaj q'ataj tzij chir kpena.

Xoq'je' jertaq wnaq xusacht kimak, xo'w Noé chir ajb'i'nel yoloj rech jn suk'laj k'aslemal rech Dios xukol knaq ch'il wuqub' (7) rich'il, xutzaq k'utlaq jn nimlaj jab' pikiwi' rislaltaq wnaq rech nejel uwach lew.
Xoq'je' xyuqasaj xe' mak tilimit Sodoma ch'il tilimit Gomorra. Xyunajsaj knaq che chaj, re'k'ut la' k'utumb'al xuya' chke naqpla' chir kimakenna.
Pumul xusol knaq Lot, chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios chir kuch'ij te'chik k'o chikixo'l ajmakib'.
Mpa' Lot chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios, chir jaqal chikixo'l ni'j ajmaktaq wnaqe', sub'laj q'axew ranme' nejeltaq q'ij rimal rilik xoq'je' rimal uta'ik k'axlajtaq b'onoj chir kib'an ire'.
Ret'am Qajwal Dios k'e usol wnaq chir ch'aj kanme', rechwa' kiqajt putaqchib'al tzel. Xoq'je' k'yukol wnaq chir suk't kik'aslemal rechwa' kyutzaq chpam k'ax che jn q'ij rech q'ataj tzij.

Xoq'je' nimna tojb'al kya' chke ni'j chir ki'no chpa' kraj uriyb'al kityo'jil, chir ik'o chpam k'axlajtaq riynik, xoq'je' ik'o chpam tz'iltaq mak, xoq'je' kitzlaj uqatb'altzij Dios. Itak ruk' ki'no'oj, kik'amta chir kisukb'axek, kixijt kib' chuyoq'ik uq'atb'altzij Qajwal Dios.
Ruk'ut taqo'n rech kaj chir nimna kichoq'ab', xoq'je' nimna kiq'atb'altzij, k'ot tzij k'e kib'ana' chwach Qajwal Dios pikiwi' wnaq chir i'ajmak.
Pumul nik'ije' chir kiyoq' tyojnik chir kich'ob'ta, chpa' awaj chir k'ot kino'jb'al, xik'se'k xa' rech kichapek xoq'je' xa' irech tzaqel, ksach k'utna kiwach chpam jn tzaqel kech ire'.

Kik'amna ire' jn tojb'al rech jn kotkeklaj kik'aslemal, mpa' sub'laj qus kina' ire' chir ik'o chpam mak nejeltaq q'ij, re'k'ut la' chuwlajtaq mak, ire'k'ut chir kiwa' iwuk', xoq'je' kiki'ket chpam kimak.
Najnaq kib'aq'wach che mak chirij k'le'b'al, k'istajt kik'u'x che mak kich'ik'mij ajkojnel chpam mak chir tuqa'r kikojb'al, k'amannaq che kanme' uriyxik sub'laj mib'i'l, xoq'je' irilk'wa'l tzaqel.
Xkiya' knaq jn suk'laj b'ej, xkisach kib'ej, re' xkik'am ub'ej Balaam uk'ijol Beor chir xraj re' ucha'kik pwaq, rimal ub'anik mak.
Sub'laj k'ow xyaj rimal umak, mpa' jn kyej rech eqa'n chir kch'awtaj, re'k'ut xch'a'w ruk' Balaam chpa' uch'ab'al naq chij, xuya't luwar che jn ajq'axal na'tb'ale' chir kub'an umoxil.
Jla' kib'anik chpa' chq'ij k'wa', xoq'je' jla' kib'anik chpa' sutz' chir xa' ich'ik'mim rimal kiq'i', kechk'ut ire' jn nimlaj qu'mal chir kolom knaq chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Kib'ijk'ut yoloj chir k'o nimal chpam, xoq'je' k'ot nojb'al chpam, ruk tzeltaq kichomnik kik'amb'ik nij wnaq chir te'ne' xyel laq chpam qu'mal chub'annik mak rech tyo'jil.
Kijit jn tzqaptejem chke wnaq, pumul ire' iximtelna chpam mak, mpa' naq chir xch'ak'enta kxim knaq che jaqlel ajnimnel rimal jn ajch'aknel.

Qatzijk'ut chir xikon che elemlaq chpam k'axlajtaq b'onoj rech uwach lew rimal uch'ob'ik uwach, Qajwal Jesucristo chir Ajsolel qech, pumul xkixim kib' jumulchik chpam ni'j b'onoj rech nab'e knaq, xich'ak k'ut, ruk'ut kik'aslemal sub'laj k'axnechik chwach kik'aslemal nab'e knaq.
Mpa' utzna mat' xkit'majna uwach jn b'ej rech jn suk'laj k'aslemal, chwach chir nab'e xkit'maj uwach tere' xitzalaj chikij, xkiya' knaq ub'anik jn tyoxlaj taqnik chir xya' chke.
Pumul xb'antaj kuk' ire' chpa' kub'ij jn qatzijlaj k'amb'al nojb'al: "Jn tz'e' kuk'amuluj utijik uxa'aw," xoq'je', "jn aq chir te' xch'ajtaj rij ktzalaj chub'alq'atxik rib' chpam xoq'o'l jumulchik."
Ix wixlal, chir loq' kix wilo, re' ri' jn ukab' wuj chir kintz'ib'aj b'ik chiw, che kyeb' (2) wuj kink'usuj ruk' jn utzlaj yaj jn saqlaj ichomnik.
Rechwa' kna'taj chiw yoloj chir xkib'ij knaq nab'e tyoxtaq ajq'axal uyoloj Dios, xoq'je' utaqnik Qajwal Jesucristo chir Ajsolel qech, chir xya' ub'ixik kimal kab'lajuj Apóstoles.
Nab'e qit'maj chir kipena ptaq q'ij chqawach aj esaltaq wach, chir kib'inek chpa' tzeltaq kiriyb'al.

Kib'ijna: "¿Jalchi' k'ut k'owa' upetb'al chi' chir xujit knaq? Mpa' suk' jn q'ijla' chir xikam qachuch qaqaw, uwachna kib'onom nejel chpa'kux, k'ot k'extajnaq che, jla' kib'onom chpa' xmajtajlaq re'chir Qajwal Dios xukaneysaj nejel chpa'kux."
Nik'ije' ket'amta mpa' xkajt xkit'maj, chir jertaqtzij ruk' uyoloj Qajwal Dios xub'an kaj xoq'je' xub'an uwach lew, chir je' ipetnaq ruk' ja', xoq'je' xa' rimal ja' ik'aslek.
Rmalk'ut ri' chir nejel uwach kajlew xijeq' paja'.
Pumul kaj ch'il uwach lew chir ik'o chinime', ikoltel rimal upixab' Qajwal Dios, ikoltel rech q'a' re'chir kpe jn q'ij rech q'ataj tzij, xoq'je' rech sachb'al kiwach ajmakib'.
Pumul chiwla'much loq'lajtaq wixlal chiwet'maj, ruk' Qaqjaw, jn q'ij janam chpa' jun mil (1,000) janab', xoq'je' jun mil (1,000) janab' xa' janam chpa' jn q'ij.
Qaqjaw kb'oytajt ruk' kux ujitom knaq, chpa' kyeb'xub' kib'ij chir kb'oytajna, xa'ne' Re' k'o kuyb'ul uk'u'x chqe, krajt re' chir k'e jnaq chpam k'ax xa'ne' kraj re' chir qanejel qatzalq'amij qanme'.

Pumul uq'ijal Qaqjaw kpena chpa' jun elq'om chaq'ab', che jn q'ijla' nejel kaj sub'laj kitinenek, ksachna kiwach, xoq'je' nejel chir kux ik'o pkaj kijuluwna paq'a', ksachna kiwach, xoq'je' uwach lew ch'il nejel chak chir k'o chwach kiparexna.
Mpa' nejel ksachna uwach rimal k'ax chir petnaq, ¿kuxt rech mat' kixb'in chpam jn tyoxlaj xoq'je' suk'laj k'aslemal?
Qayi'em, xoq'je' qakuwim rech reyb'exik uq'ijal Qajwal Dios, tla'k'ut chir nejel kaj kumajna q'a' ksachna uwach, xoq'je' chir kux k'o pkaj kiparxik, xoq'je' kija'lajna.
Pumul oj qayi'ej jla' chpa' ujitom knaq, jn k'ak' kaj, xoq'je' jn k'ak' uwach lew, tla'k'ut jaqalwa' jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij rech Qajwal Dios.
Rechi' ix wixlal chir loq' kix wilo re'chir kiwiyej ri', chikojo' ichoq'ab' rechwa' kxuraq Dios chir k'ot tz'il chiwij xoq'je' k'ot mak kraqtaj chiwij, xoq'je' ixk'o chpam jn uxunem rech anme'.
Chich'ob'o', chir jn kuyub'ul uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, rech solb'alib', jla' chpa' xutz'ib'aj loq'laj qaxlal Pablo chiw, chpa' jn nimlaj nojb'al chir xya' che.

Che nejel wuj chir xutz'ib'aj, xch'a'w chirij ni'j tyojneme', k'o k'ut ni'j chir k'ax uch'ob'ik, ruk'ut ni'j chir tuqa'r kikojb'al kikotb'a' uxlaj chpa' kib'an che ni'jchik praj rech tyox wuj, rechwa' kitzaq kib' chpam k'ax.
Rechi' ix loq'lajtaq wixlal, mpa' ix iwet'amchik, chichijij iwib' rechwa' chir kixcharex tewa' rimal kisokb'al ni'j wnaqe', xoq'je' mixtzaq che ikojb'al.

Xa'ne' kixk'iyaq chpam jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' che rit'mixik chirij Qajwal Jesucristo chir ajsolel qech. Rechk'ut Re' jn unimal q'ij chinime', suk'te' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.

Qatz'ib'aj b'ik chiw, chirij jun chir k'o chik re'chir xmajtajlaq, chir qato'om, xoq'je' qilom ruk' qab'aq'wach. Mpa' qilom uwach xoq'je' qachopom ruk' qaq'ab'. Rek'ut Re' jn yoloj chir k'o k'aslemal chpam.
Jn k'aslemal la' chir xk'utun chqawach, qe'oj xqilo, xoq'je' qaya' ub'ixik chiw ix jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik. Re'k'ut chir k'o ruk' Qajwal Dios chir xuq'aljansaj chqawach.
Qaya' k'ut ub'ixik chiw chir kux qilom, xoq'je' kux qato'om, rechwa' chir ix xa' ix junchik quk', chpa' oj, xa' oj junchik ruk' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' ruk' Uk'ijol Jesucristo.
Qatz'ib'aj b'ik ri' chiw rechwa' ktz'aq'at iki'kte'mal.
Re'k'ut ri' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir qato'om che Re', xoq'je' oj qaya' ub'ixik chir Qajwal Dios, Re', saqil, xoq'je' k'ot qe'naq qu'mal ruk' Re'.
Wa qab'ij chir qaroqom qib' ruk' Qajwal Dios, pumul qojb'inna chpam qu'mal, jo'sb'al tzij qab'ij, xoq'je' saqlaj tzijt qojtijin chub'anik.
Pumul wa chpam saqil qojb'inwa' chpa' Qajwal Dios chir k'o chpam saqil, qaroqom qib' chqawach, ruk'ut ukik'el Uk'ijol Dios kjuch'aj che nejel mak.
Wa qab'ij chir k'ot qamak, qatikel qasokaj qib', ruk'ut saqlaj tzij k'ot quk'.
Wa qajach qamak chwach Qajwal Dios, Re' xa' jun k'owa' ranme' xoq'je' suk' uk'aslemal rech kusach qamak, xoq'je' kusaqab'saj qak'aslemal che nejel tzeltaq mak.
Wa qab'ij chir k'ot mak qab'onom, qakoj Qajwal Dios che ajsoknel, ruk'ut utzij k'ot quk'.
Taq wilk'wa'l, kintz'ib'aj b'ik ri' chiw rechwa' kixmakenta, pumul wa k'o jnaq xmaknek, k'o jun kch'a'w pqawi', chwach Qajwal Dios Re'k'ut Jesucristo, chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios.
Mpa' Jesucristo xuya' rib' pe kamikal xa' rimal qamak, pumul xo'wt qamak oj xoq'je' kimak kinejel wnaq rech uwach lew.
Chri'k'ut qilwa' chir qatzij qet'am uwach, chir wa qanimaj utaqnik.
Pumul wa k'o jnaq kub'ij: "En wet'am uwach Dios," pumul kub'anta chpa' kub'ij utaqnik, june', xa' ksoknek, xoq'je' k'ot saqlaj tzij ruk'.
Pumul jun ku'no chpa' kub'ij uyoloj Dios, qatzij chir june' tz'aqatnaq loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios ruk'. Rimalk'ut ri' qet'am chir ojk'o ruk'.
Naq kub'ij chir jaqal chirij Jesús, b'inaq jla' chpa' xb'in Re'.
Ix wixlal, k'ak' taqnikt kintz'ib'aj chiw, xa'ne' jn taqnike' jerchik, re'k'ut chir xya' chiw re'chir xtiktajlaq, jn jer taqnike' re' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xito'o re'chir xtiktajlaq.
Pumul chinime' kintz'ib'aj b'ik chiw jn k'ak' taqnik, chir saqlaj tzij, chirij uk'aslemal Cristo, xoq'je' pik'aslemal ix. Mpa' qu'mal tijen q'atnek, ruk'ut jn qatzijlaj saqil kpoqpetchik.
Naqpla' kub'ij chir k'o chpam saqil, pumul kritzlaj uwach rixlal, june' k'ona chpam qu'mal.
Naq kuloq'oj rixlal, june' k'o chpam saqil, k'otnaq chpa'kux ktzaq chirij.
Pumul naq chir kritzlaj rixlal, june' k'o chpam qu'mal, xoq'je' chpam qu'mal kb'inwa', xoq'je' ret'amta jalchi' k'ew chi', mpa' tz'ab'tel b'aq'wach rimal qu'mal.
Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix taq wilk'wa'l, mpa' ix sachtaj imak pub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo.
Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix chuch qajaw, mpa' xiwet'maj uwach Jesucristo chir k'ochik re'chir xtiktajlaq uwach lew. Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix, elb'om ch'il eltom, mpa' xixkon chuch'akik jn tzel.

Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix taq wilk'wa'l, mpa' xiwet'maj uwach Qajawxel. Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix chuch qajaw, mpa' ix xiwet'maj uwach jun chir k'ochik re'chir xtiktajlaq nejel. Kintz'ib'aj chiw ix, elb'om ch'il eltom, mpa' ix, ix kow, ruk'ut utzij Qajwal Dios k'o iwuk', xoq'je' xixkowan chuch'akik jn tzel.
Miloq'oj uwach lew, xoq'je' miloq'oj chpa'kux rech uwach lew. Wa k'o jnaq kuloq'oj uwach lew, june' k'ot loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios ruk'.
Mpa' nejel chir k'o chwach lew: Jn uriyb'al tyo'jil ch'il uriyb'al qab'aq'wach, xoq'je' jn nimal rech k'aslemal, je't kipe ruk' Qajwal Dios, xa'ne' je' kipe chwach lew.
Jn uwach lew ch'il nejel tzeltaq uriyb'al xa' iq'axel, pumul naq chir kub'an rajwerem Qajwal Dios mijumul ksach uwach.
Ix taq wilk'wa'l, uk'isb'altaq q'ij chik ojk'owa', jla' chpa' xito'o chir kpena jn anticristo. Tne' chinime' sub'laj che anticristo xikaynek, chri' k'ut qilwa' chir uk'isb'altaq q'ijchik ojk'owa'.
Ire' chqaxo'l xyelwa'b'ik, pumul it qech, mpa' xa't iqech ik'otnere' quk' chinime', pumul xyelb'ik rechwa' k'utnek chir kinejelt iqech.
Pumul ix xik'am Loq'laj Santil chir xuya' Cristo chiw, xoq'je' iwet'am iwenejel jn saqlaj tzij.
Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw rexta chir iwet'amt jn saqlaj tzij, xa'ne' kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw mpa' ix iwet'am jn saqlaj tzij, mpa' nejel jo'sb'altaq tzij je't kipe ruk' saqlaj tzij.
¿Naqk'ut jun chir kub'ij jo'sb'altaq tzij, re' tuk'ut jun chir kukojta chir Jesús Re' Cristo? June' re' anticristo, re'k'ut chir kukojt rech Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kukojt rech Cristo chir Uk'ijol Dios.
Nejel naqpla' chir kukojta chirwa Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, june' k'ot Dios ruk'. Naq kub'ij, Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, june' k'o Dios ruk'.
Joqo'qb'la' iwuk' chir kux ito'omlaq re'chir xmajtajlaq, wa kajeqe' iwuk' chir kux ito'omlaq re'chir xmajtajlaq, xoq'je' ix, ix jaqal chirij Dios xoq'je' ix jaqal chirij Uk'ijol.
Rek'ut ri' jn jitneme' chir ujitom knaq Re' chqe, jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Kintz'ib'aj chiw chikij ni'j chir kixkisokaj.

Pumul ix xik'am Loq'laj Santil chir xuya' Jesucristo chiw, k'ot rajwixik chiw ix chir jnaqchik kuk'ut chiwach. Mpa' Re' Loq'laj Santil prechwa' kuk'ut nejel chiwach, saqlajtzij utyojnik Re', jo'sb'al tzijta, kixjoqo'qb'la' ruk' Cristo. Chpa' ityojxik ub'onom Loq'laj Santil.
Ruk'ut chinime', ix taq wilk'wa'l, kixjoqo'q chirij Cristo Jesús, rechwa' kub'e' qak'u'x chirij re'chir k'uten jumulchik, xoq'je' kjuya'twa' chpam k'ixb'al re'chir Re' kpetek.
Wa ix iwet'am chir Jesucristo suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios. Chiwet'majb'la' chir nejel naqpla' chir kub'an jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, ruk' Jesús k'se'naqwa'.
Chiwula'much, sub'laj loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios uyo'om chqe, rechwa' chir kb'ix rilk'wa'l Dios chqe, rechi' wnaq chir k'ot Dios kuk' ket'amt qawach, mpa' xkit'majt uwach Dios.

Ix qaxlal chir loq' kix wilo, chinime' ojchik rilk'wa'l Dios, tne' maja' k'utnek chir kux qilik, re'chir kojo'pen chwach Dios, qet'am k'ut oj, re'chir Jesús kpetek jnamchik qab'anik chpa' Re', mpa' qilna uwach Re', jla', chpa' ub'anik re'.
Naqpla' uyo'om jn ukub'ul uk'u'x chirij Cristo, utikel kuch'aj ranme', jla' chpa' Jesucristo sub'laj ch'aj ranme'.
Nejel naqpla' chir kmaknek, xoq'je' kuxolq'opij pixab', mpa' mak jn uxo'lq'opxik pixab'.
Iwet'amchik ix, chir Jesucristo xk'uten chwach lew rechwa' kresaj mak, k'ot mak chirij Re'.
Nejel naqpla' chir k'o chirij Cristo kmaken te'chik, nejel naqpla' chir kmaknek rilomt uwach, xoq'je' ret'amt uwach Cristo.
Taq wilk'wa'l miya' iwib' chpam sokb'al, naqpla' chir kub'an jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, june' suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios, jla' chpa' Cristo suk' uk'aslemal.

Naqpla' chir kub'an mak je' kpe ruk' tzel, mpa' jn tzel, re' umojomlaq ub'anik mak suk'te' re'chir xtiktajlaq uwach lew. Rimal k'ut mak xpe Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios chwach lew rechwa' kusach uwach uchak jn tzel.
Nejel naqpla' chir je' k'se'naq che Qajwal Dios, kmaken te'chik, mpa' ruk' Qajwal Dios alexnaqwa', kmaken te'chik mpa' ruk' Qajwal Dios k'se'naqwa'.
Chri'k'ut kik'utenwa' rilk'wa'l Dios, xoq'je' chri' kik'utenwa' rilk'wa'l tzel. Nejel naqpla' chir kub'ant utzil, xoq'je' kuloq'ojt rixlal ruk't Dios petnaqwa'.
Re'k'ut ri' utzij chir ito'om re'chir xmajtajlaq, chir rajwixik qaloq'oj qib' chqawach.
Jnamta chpa' xub'an Caín, chir xok tzel pranme' xukamsaj uchaq' ¿kuxk'ut rech xukamsaj uchaq'? Caín xukamsaj uchaq' mpa' re', uchak tzel ku'no, pumul uchaq' suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios.
Ix wixlal, mtzaq ik'u'x chirwa wnaq chir ket'amt uwach Dios kixkitzlaj.
Qe'oj qet'am chir xjel laq chpam kamikal xojq'ax chpam jn k'aslemal, k'e qaloq'oj k'ut qaxlal, naq chir kuloq'ojt rixlal, june' jaqal chpam kamikal.
Nejel naq chir kritzlaj rixlal, june' ajkamsenel, iwet'am k'ut ix chir k'otnaq aj kamsenel kajaqe' ruk' re' jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik.
Chri' k'ut xqit'majwa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x, mpa' Re' xuya' uk'aslemal pe kamikal qamal oj, xoq'je' oj rajwixik qaya' qak'aslemal kimal ire'.
Pumul naq chir k'o umib'i'l rech uwach lew, kutuyuj rixlal chir k'o rajwixik che, pumul kutz'apij ranme' chwach, ¿kux ub'anik kajaqe' loq'b'al uk'u'x Dios ruk' june'?
Ix taq wilk'wa'l, mqaloq'oj qaxlal xa' ruk' qachi', xoq'je' xo'wt ruk' qaq', xa'ne' qaloq'oj ruk' chak ch'il ruk' saqlaj tzij.
Chri' k'ut qet'majwa' chir oj rech saqlaj tzij, qajaqb'a' k'utna qanme' chwach Qajwal Dios.
Tne' qanme' qoj uqasaj xe' mak, Qajwal Dios nimna ub'anik Re' chwach qanme', Re' nejel ret'am.
Loqlaj taq wixlal, wa qanme' qoj uya't xe' mak, k'o ukub'ul qak'u'x chwach Qajwal Dios.
Nejel kuxpla' qata' che, Re' kuya' chqe, mpa' qab'ono chpa' kub'ij utaqnik, xoq'je' qab'ono chir naq che k'amar chwach Re'.
Re'k'ut ri' utaqnik Re', chir qakojo' pub'i' Uk'ijol Re', Jesucristo, xoq'je' qaloq'oj qib' chqawach chpa' taqnik uyo'om chqe.
Naqpla' kub'ono chpa' kub'ij utaqnik Re', june' jaqal chirij Dios, xoq'je' Dios jaqal ruk' re', chri' k'ut qit'majwa' chir Re' jaqal quk', rimal Loq'laj Usantil chir uyo'om chqe.
Loq'laj taq wixlal, xa' mikoj kech nejel santil, xa'ne' china'na santil nab'e, wa je' ipetnaq ruk' Qajwal Dios; mpa' sub'laj che jo'slajtaq ajq'axal uyoloj Dios kib'in chwach lew.
Chri' k'ut kiwit'majwa', wa jn wnaq chir k'o Loq'laj Usantil Dios ruk', june' kub'ij chir Jesucristo xk'un chwach lew, xb'inek chpa' naq wnaq chir k'o raqan uq'ab', june' je' petnaq ruk' Dios.

Wa naq wnaq chir k'o santil ruk', pumul kuq'aljansajta chir Jesucristo je' petnaq ruk' Dios, jn santile' je't petnaq ruk' Dios; jn santile', re' usantil anticristo, re'k'ut june' chir ito'om ix chir kpetek, ruk'ut chinime' k'ochik chwach lew.
Taq wilk'wa'l, ix, je' ixpetnaq ruk' Dios, xixkon k'ut chkich'akik, mpa' nimna ub'anik Jun chir k'o iwuk' ix, chwach jun chir k'o chwach lew.
Nik'ije' chir k'ot usantil Dios kuk', xa' irech uwach lew, rechi' chir xa' rech uwach lew kib'ij, ruk'ut wnaq rech uwach lew utz kito'o.
Oj, oj rech Dios, naq chir ret'am uwach Dios kuta' qech, naq chir rext Dios kuta't qech, chri' k'ut qit'majwa' uwach jn santil rech saqlaj tzij, xoq'je' qit'majwa' uwach jn santil rech jo'sb'al tzij.
Loqlaj taq wixlal, qaloq'oj qib' chqawach, mpa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x je' petnaq ruk' Dios, nejel naqpla' chir kuloq'oj rijil utz'aq'at, june' ruk' Dios k'se'naqwa', xoq'je' ret'am uwach Dios.
Naqpla' chir kuloq'ojt rijil utzq'at, june' maja'na krit'maj uwach Dios, mpa' Dios loq'b'al k'u'x Re'.
Chri' k'ut xk'utenwa' chqawach jn loq'b'al k'u'x, mpa' Qajwal Dios xutaqlaq jun che Uk'ijol chwach lew, rech qoj k'se'wa' rimal Re'.
Re'k'ut ri' jn loq'b'al k'u'x, re'ta chir oj nab'e xqaloq'oj Dios, xa'ne' Re' nab'e xoj uloq'oj, xoq'je' xutaqlaq Uk'ijol pe kamikal rech tojb'al qamak.
Loq'lajtaq wixlal, wa jla' qaloq'xik xub'an Dios, xoq'je' oj rajwixik qaloq'oj qib' chqawach.
K'ot jnaqaq mijumul rilom uwach Dios, wa qaloq'oj qib' chqawach, Qajwal Dios jaqal quk', ruk'ut loq'b'al uk'u'x tz'aqatnaq chpam qak'aslemal.
Chri' k'ut qet'majwa' chir oj, oj jaqal chirij Re', xoq'je' Re' jaqal quk' oj, mpa' Re' uyo'om Loq'laj Usantil chqe.
Xqilk'ut oj, xoq'je' xqaq'aljansaj ub'ixik chir Re' Qajawxel xutaqlaq Uk'ijol, chkisolik wnaq chwach lew.
Nejel naq chir kuq'aljansaj ub'ixik chir Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, Dios jaqal ruk' re', xoq'je' re' jaqal ruk' Dios.

Ruk'ut oj xqit'maj k'ut, xoq'je' xojkojon k'ut chirij jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir Dios kuya' chqe, Dios loq'b'al k'u'x re', naq kajaqe' chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x, june' jaqal chirij Dios xoq'je' Dios jaqal ruk' re'.
Chri' k'ut xtz'aqatwa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x quk' oj, rechwa' kub'e' qak'u'x che jn q'ij rech q'ataj tzij, jla' chpa' ub'anik Re', xoq'je' jla' qab'anik oj chwach lew.

K'ot nab'alib' chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x, xa'ne' jn tz'aqatlaj loq'b'al k'u'x kresaj pnaq jla' jn nab'alib', mpa' jn nab'alib' k'o k'ajse'b'al wach chpam, rechi' wa k'o jnaq kuna' rib', june' maja' ktz'aq'at loq'b'al k'u'x ruk'.
Qe'oj qaloq'oj Dios, mpa' Dios nab'e xoj uloq'oj.
Wa k'o janaq kub'ij: "En kinloq'oj Dios," pumul kritzlaj rixlal, june' jo'sb'al tzij kub'ij, mpa' naq kuloq'ojt rixlal chir kril uwach, kux ub'anik kuloq'oj Dios chir krilt uwach.
Re'k'ut ri' utaqnik Dios chir k'o quk', naq chir kuloq'oj Dios, uloq'ojb'la' rixlal xoq'je'.
Nejel naqpla' kukojo chir Jesús Re' Cristo, june' ruk' Dios k'se'naqwa', naq kuloq'oj uqaw Qajwal Jesucristo, kuloq'oj xoq'je' Uk'ijol Dios.
Chri' k'ut qet'majwa', chir loq' k'eqil rilk'wa'l Qajwal Dios, chirwa loq' qil Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' qab'ano chapa' kub'ij utaqnik.
Re'k'ut ri' loq'b'al k'u'x che Dios, chir qakol utaqnik, mpa' utaqnik Dios alt uk'amik.
Mpa' nejel jnaq chir je k'se'naq ruk' Dios kowan chuch'akik uwach lew. Rek'ut ri' jn nimlaj ch'ak'nem, chir qakojb'al xuch'ak uwach lew.
¿Naq k'ut jun chir kowan chuch'akik uwach lew, xa'ne' re' jun chir kukojo chir Jesús, Re', Uk'ijol Dios?
Re'k'ut june' Jesucristo, chir xk'unek rimal ja' ch'il kik', pumul xo'wt ruk' ja', xa'ne' ruk' ja' ch'il kik', re'k'ut Loq'laj Santil kuq'aljansaj chirij, mpa' Loq'laj Santil, saqlaj tzij Re'.
Mpa' ixub' (3) kiq'aljansaj pkaj, Qajawxel, uk'u'x tzij, ch'il Loq'laj Santil, che ixub' kib'an xa' jun.
Xoq'je' ixub' (3) kiya' q'alsenem chwach lew: Loq'laj Santil, ch'il ja', ch'il kik', che ixub' (3) xa' janam kib'ij.
Wa qak'omo chir kux kiq'aljansaj chijab', nim k'utna ub'anik chir kux uq'aljansam Dios, mpa' re' ri' q'alsenem rech Dios, chir kux ub'im chirij Uk'ijol.
Naqpla' kukoj rech Uk'ijol Dios, uk'omomb'ik pranme' chir kux q'aljansam chirij Cristo, naq chir kukojt rech Dios, xub'an ajsoknel che Dios, mpa' kukojt jn q'alsenem chir uyo'om Dios chirij Uk'ijol.
Re'k'ut ri' jn q'alsenem, chir Dios xuya' jn k'aslemal chir mijumul k'istechik, re'k'ut jn k'aslemal la' chir k'o ruk' Uk'ijol.
Naq k'o Uk'ijol Dios ruk', k'o uk'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, naqpla' k'ot Uk'ijol Dios ruk', june' k'ot uk'aslemal chir mijumul k'istechik.
Re' ri' xintz'ib'ajb'ik chiw ix, ix chir kixkojon chirij ub'i' Uk'ijol Dios, rechwa' kiwet'maj chir k'o ik'aslemal chir mijumul k'istechik xoq'je' rech kixkojonna chirij Uk'ijol Dios.
Re'k'ut ri' jn uk'ub'ul qak'u'x chirij Re', chir kuxpla' qata' che chpa' rajwerem Re', Re' kuto'o.
Wa qet'am oj chir kuto'o kuxpla' qata che, qet'am chir qak'omo chir kux qato'om che.

Wa k'o jnaq kril naq rixlal chir tijen kmaknek, mak chir rext kamikal, chuta'b'la' puwi' chwach Qajwal Dios, ruk'ut Qajwal Dios kuya'na kik'aslemal ni'j chir kimaken ruk' mak chir rext kamikal. Mpa' k'o mak rech kamikal, pikiwi' nik'ije' kimb'ij en chir kta'taj.
Nejel jech'laj q'atb'altzij mak re', pumul k'o mak chir rext kamikal.
Qet'amk'ut chir nejel jnaq chir k'se'naq ruk' Dios kmakentechik, mpa' Re' Uk'ijol Dios kchajen rech, ruk'ut jn tzel kuchaptechik.
Qet'amk'ut chir oj, oj rech Dios, ruk'ut nejel wnaq chir kikojt rech Dios, je ik'o xe' uq'atb'altzij tzel.

Pumul oj qet'am chir Uk'ijol Dios xpetek, xk'un uya' qachomb'al rechwa' qet'majwa' uwach jn qatzijlaj Dios, ojk'o ruk' Jesucristo chir qas saqlaj tzij. Re'k'ut Re' jn qatzijlaj Dios xoq'je' jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
Ixtaq wilk'wa'l, chichijij iwib' minimaj wachb'al. B'antajaq b'la'.

En, chir en nimaj wnaq chik, kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' che jn cho'omlaj chuchu', xoq'je' kintz'ib'aj chke ral, ire'k'ut chir loq' k'e wilo chpam jn saqlaj tzij, xo'wt en, xoq'je' nejel chir ket'amchik uwach jn saqlaj tzij.
Xa' rimal jn saqlaj tzij chir jaqal quk' xoq'je' kije'na quk' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.

Jn loq'laj ritzil anme', xoq'je' jn loq'laj k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, xoq'je' jn uxunem rech anme' chir petnaq ruk' Dios chir Qaqaw, xoq'je' petnaq ruk' Jesucristo, chir Uk'ijol Dios, kojoqb'la' iwuk' chpam jn saqlaj tzij xoq'je' chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x.
Sub'laj xinki'ktek mpa' xinraq jujun chke awal chir tijen kib'in chpam saqlaj tzij, jla' chpa' taqnik chir xuya' Qajwal Dios chqe.
Ruk'ut chinime' kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw at nan, reta chir kintz'ib'aj b'ik jn k'ak' taqnik chaw, xa'ne' re' jun chir yo'om knaq chqe re'chir xmajtajlaq, chir rajwixik qaloq'oj qib' chqawach.
Re'k'ut ri' jn loq'b'al k'u'x, chir qojb'inaq chpa' kub'ij utaqnik, re'k'ut ri' jn taqneme': Chir kixb'inaq chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x, jla' chpa' ito'omlaq ix re'chir xmajtajlaq.

Mpa' sub'laj che ajb'i'nel sokb'al tzij xyel laq chwach lew, chir kiq'aljansajta chir Jesucristo xk'un chwach lew chpa' naq chij chir k'o utyo'jil xoq'je' k'o ub'aqil. Naq chir jri' ku'no, re'k'ut jn ajsoknel xoq'je' re' anticristo.
Chpa' naq che' chir kuya' uwach, pumul xa' ksach uwach che jla', chiwula' iwib' ix piwechwa', rechwa' kisacht uwach ichak, xa'ne' chir tz'q'at rijil uk'ixel ichak kik'amo.
Naq kusach ub'ej xoq'je' kjaqe't chpam jn tyojnik rech Cristo, k'ot Dios ruk', naq chir kajaqe' chpam jn tyojnik rech Cristo, june' k'o Dios ruk', xoq'je' k'o Uk'ijol Dios ruk'.
Wa k'o jnaq k'un iwuk', pumul re't jn tyojneme' kuya' chiw, mik'uluj piwichoj xoq'je' miya' jn utzlaj petb'al che.
Mpa' naq chir kub'ij che june': "Utz apetik," re' jun ruk' chub'anik ni'j tzeltaq uchak.
K'o sub'laj yoloj kintz'ib'aj b'ik chiw, pumul kwajtena chinime' utz'ib'xik chpam wuj ch'il tz'ajb'al, mpa' wiyi'em b'enem iwuk' rechwa' qojyolow chqawach, rechwa' ktz'aq'at qaki'kte'mal.
Kitaqb'ik ritzil awach ral achaq', jun chir cho'om. B'antajaq b'la'.
En, chir en nimaj wnaq kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' che Gayo, loq'laj qaxlal, re'k'ut chir loq' kwil psaqlaj tzij.
Loq'laj wixlal, re' uriyb'al wanme' en, chir at karaq sub'laj che utzil, che nejel chpa'kux, xoq'je' chir k'ot ya'b'il pak'aslemal, jla' chpa' awanme' sub'laj uroqom utzil.
Mpa' sub'laj xinki'kitek re'chir xik'un qaxlal chir xkiq'aljansaj jn saqlaj tzij, xoq'je' chir xa' jun atk'owa' chpam jn saqlaj tzij.
K'ot jnaqchik nimlaj enki'kte'mal chwach june', chir kinto'o chir wilk'wa'l tijen kib'in chpam jn saqlaj tzij.
Loq'laj wixlal, at, xa' jun ayo'omwa' akojb'al re'chir k'e animaj qaxlal xoq'je' re'chir k'e animaj qaxlal chir kipe che jnchik tilimit.
Xkiq'aljansaj uyolik jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o awuk', chikiwach jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel, utzk'ut ka'no chir k'e ato', rechwa' kitaqej kib'ej chir kimojom, mpa' re' la' k'amer chwach Qajwal Dios.
Mpa' ire' xyelb'ik rimal uloq'xik ub'i' Qajwal Jesús, k'ot xkik'am ire' chke wnaq chir it aj Israel.
Rechi' chir rajwixik k'e qato' ire', qaya' kiwarb'al, rechwa' qojto'n ruk' jn saqlaj tzij.
En xintz'ib'aj b'ik jun wuj chke jun ch'ob' che qaxlal chirij Qajwal Jesucristo, pumul Diótrefes chir kuk'ul uk'u'x taqnem pikiwi' ajkojnel, re' krajt kuk'am qaq'atb'altzij.

Rechi', wa kimb'e iwuk', kinnatajna che re' ni'j uchak chir tijen ku'no chir tijen kub'ij molomtaq tzij ch'il sokb'altaq tzij chiqij, pumul kub'e't uk'u'x ruk' ri', xoq'je' kyuk'ulujt qaxlal, xoq'je' chirwa k'o jnaq kraj kyuk'uluj, re' ke uq'atuj, xoq'je' k'eresajb'ik chikixo'l jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel.
Loq'laj wixlal, mab'an awech chpa' kub'an jn qaxlale', xa'ne' b'ana' chir kux utzil. Naq kub'an utzil, june' rech Dios. Naq kub'an k'ax, june' rilomt uwach Dios.
Kinejel utz uq'aljensesik Demetrio xki'no, xoq'je' utzij Qajwal Dios jla' kch'a'w chirij, xoq'je' oj jla' qab'ij chirij Demetrio. Iwet'amk'ut ix chir jn q'alsenem chir qaya' oj, re' saqlaj tzij.
K'ona k'iy chir kwaj kintz'ib'aj chaw, pumul kwajt kintz'ib'ajb'ik chinime' ruk' wuj ch'il tz'ib'al.
Mpa' re' kwaj en, kwul awach cha'nim jla' qojyolow chqawach.

Re't b'la' jn uxunem rech anme' kije' awuk'. Kiya' pnaq ritzil awach ni'j qaxlal chir ijenk'isik quk', xoq'je' b'ana' toq'ob' ya' pnaq ritzil kiwach ptaq kijujnal qaxlal chir ijen k'isik' quk'. B'antajaq b'la'.

En Judas, jaqlel ajnimnel rech Jesucristo, en uchaq' Santiago, kintz'i'b'aj jn wuje' chiw ix, ix chir ix loq', xoq'je' ix sik'im rimal Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw, xoq'je' ixkoltel rimal Qajwal Jesucristo.
Kiyaqb'la' iwuk' ix jn k'axb'al k'u'x ch'il jn uxunem rech anme', ch'il jn loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios.

Loq'laj taq wixlal, sub'laj enkuwim itz'ib'xikb'ik' chirij jn solb'alqib' chir xa' janam ub'anik, xoq'je' rajwixik chinwach en chinime' itz'ib'xikb'ik, rech kinta' jn toq'ob' chiwach, rechwa' kikoj ichoq'ab' chuchajxik jn kojb'al chir xya' chke tyoxtaq ajkojnel.

Mpa' ik'o ni'j chijab' chir ruk' jo'sb'altaq tzij xyok chixo'l, ire' k'ut chir sub'laj jer tz'ib'tal knaq chikij, chir ire' irech nimlaj k'ax, itzeltaq chijab' chir kik'ex jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios chwach jn k'axlaj tzq'aptejem, xoq'je' kiq'aljansajta chir Qajwal Dios ch'il Jesucristo, ire' ijun che Dios.
Tne' ix iwet'amchik, pumul kwaj en kinna'taj chiw chir Qajwal Dios, nab'e xye resajlaq wnaq aj Israel pujuyb'al Egipto. Tere' xusach kiwach naq chir xkikojt rech.
